name: Mekenzie Oswalt
text: Dr. Whitlow went above and beyond to take care of our sick yorkiepoo. He followed all the guidelines to keep everyone safe! He spent quality time caring for him and explaining the diagnosis and treatment plan. He truly cares for his patients and provides excellent care. We are so grateful! Thank you Dr. Whitlow!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words. I hope Chewy is feeling better!

name: Joey Fraime
text: Wasnt there long enough to do anything they were booked up

name: Linda Love
text:
My Poodle of 11years got very sick, and had to be put to sleep. Dr. Whitlow was so compassionate and caring.  Gave her a shot to relax her first and administered the final shot. Molly passed away peacefully.   The staff made the arrangements for her cremation with Paws.  I picked her up the next day. Her ashes were inclosed in a little wooden casket, with a placard that said "In Loving Memory " MOLLY.
A few days later, I  received a nice card from Dr. Whitlow with his sympathy on the lose of my Sweet Molly
If you ever find yourself in this position,  Dr. Whitlow and is wonderful staff will be there for you.
L. Love,  Florence, Alabama

resp.text: So sorry for your loss of sweet Molly. We understand how hard this is to lose such a loved part of the family. I hope the happiness she brought you lives on in your heart! You will always have her memory with you and you can rest assured you made the kindest decision for her. She would thank you for your compassionate decision.

name: Heather Baugher
text: Been taking animals there for years.  Affordable!

resp.text: Thank you so much! We love taking care of Ozzy

name: Cassandra Patterson
text: I love the way they  take care of my puppy

name: Zack Goodwin
text: Only doing things by appointment, had an emergency and they wouldn't allow me in

resp.text: We are sorry that you were not pleased because you were not allowed inside the office. We are following State Health Department, AVMA and CDC directives concerning CoVID precautions. I have spoken directly with Dr. Landers of the Alabama State Health Department and she assured me we are following the proper protocol. As of 11-20-20, we have had to close our doors and the entire staff go into quarantine until 12-1-20 due to an exposure to CoVID.  We had been taking emergencies and new clients, but only the patient that needs the treatment has been allowed in, much like our human hospitals are doing. Unfortunately, this is not being followed uniformly and the lack of control of CoVID is evident. We all are unhappy with many of the  the situations we find ourselves in during this pandemic, but the protection of human health and life outweighs the sacrifices we must make in order to slow the spread of this disease. The pandemic has created a lot of uneasiness, fear, anxiety and frustration throughout our area, state, nation and world. I am sorry you felt it necessary to give us a one star rating. I believe had you ever experienced our care before, you would have a different opinion as many of our existing clients have stated. We hope your pet has recovered and is back to a healthy state and that no one you know contracts this potentially fatal disease. Stay safe.

name: Megan Spurlock
text: Most expensive vet clinic in town!! Quoted me approximately $300 to neuter a cat - outrageous! I got it done for $60 and the vet I chose couldn’t believe they would dream of charging that for such a simple procedure

resp.text:
Ms. Spurlock, thank you for inquiring with Auburn Oaks Animal Clinic about neutering your pet. The price to neuter a cat at our clinic is actually $150.
It is important to compare apples to apples with quoted pricing. There are subsidized spay and neuter clinics that will be less expensive. In addition, many quotes do not include pain medication (during surgery and to go home) and intravenous catheters (critical in the case of possible but rare emergencies). In addition, is the patient intubated (this allows us to keep the patient under anesthesia longer if there is a problem such as excess bleeding and allows us rapid access for CPR if needed), and are the patients’ vitals being monitored before, during, and after surgery? These are standard procedures and best practices at Auburn Oaks Animal Clinic.  All of these are important considerations when selecting someone to perform surgery on your beloved pet.  The most common time for a young patient to be lost is after surgery due to improper or lack of monitoring.
We welcome this opportunity to address the topics that you have raised in your review. Our goal at Auburn Oaks Animal Clinic is to be a full service animal clinic that provides the highest quality care available for our clients and patients by using the latest procedural techniques and medical therapies, state- of-the-art monitoring equipment, thorough diagnostics, and most importantly by making ourselves available for follow-up during and after hours.  Unfortunately, we cannot provide all of this with the sole goal of being the least expensive on a particular procedure. We do put a priority on making ongoing care affordable. I encourage you to compare our pricing on vaccines, commonly used medications such as Rimadyl, Apoquel, Cytopoint and preventatives such as Bravecto, Revolution to others in the area, including Chewy and 1-800 Petmeds.  You will find that Auburn Oaks Animal Clinic is very competitive and less expensive than many others. Please take the time to come meet us and take a tour of our facility.
Sincerely,
Matt Sullivan, DVM

Even though we are still curbside, Dr Rider and staff were exemplary in their communication, concern, and treatment of my babies upper respiratory infections. They even followed up to see how they are feeling on the medicines to ensure everything is working as it should. I could not ask for a better Dr and staff for my babies.

text: Awesome job!!

name: Sara Byrd
text: This vet clinic and it’s staff are outstanding in every way. Seriously, if I could even begin to convey their kindness, excellence, affordability and professionalism in one paragraph, EVERYONE would be using them. The facility is super clean, great atmosphere and you never have to wait long to be seen. The kindness from the staff is like medicine for your soul, makes you want to go out and do good deeds and be happy! I leave there every time feeling equally as satisfied and happy as I do when I leave church. I know my fur babies are in the hands of some amazing people! The level of care and compassion is worth it, believe me!

name: Jacqueline
text: The staff is wonderful here! And Dr. Mahan is the most kind and caring veterinarian I have ever met! I have been bringing my fur babies here for many years!!

name: Dora Mahaffey
text: New to area with a sick dog and was pleasantly surprised by the rapid appointment.  The care and attention to detail was wonderful. EVERY person I encountered over the three days was friendly, helpful and professional. Definitely will use their services again.

name: Chaplain Marcus Allison
text: I am so thankful for the kindness that was shown to me and my beautiful cat, my little man, Jerry Christian from Dr. Dixie and all the staff. Although Jerry couldn't get better and had to leave for heaven Dr. Dixie was so compassionate to us it really helped. They also sent a wonderful card that means so much .

name: Adam Graham
text: I have been using Westside for over 10 years.  They are always very helpful and will get what you need done to your animals.  If you have a problem with a pet I suggest you bring them here.  Very friendly staff,  great with animals.  I have a rednose pitbull named Star!  They treat her so well when she comes if like she doesn't want to leave,  so trust me when I say they know what they are doing here.  They do almost all animals from dogs, cats, cows, horse, and many more so if you are looking for a great animal doctor.. please visit them and tell them that you were referred by Adam Graham.  Thank you for taking the time to read my article

name: Cassandra Gibbs
text: This is hands down the best vet in town!  They truly love and care about every single animal that comes into the place!  They are always friendly and professional.  When my dog had cancer they went beyond my expectations and treated him like he was part of the family joining in on the fight.  Zorro didn’t make it but he lived longer than he would have thanks to these good people!  I have always and will forever use this vet for all my animals ❤️

name: T.roy
text: Great service, friendly staff, we've taken both our dogs and horses here.

name: Jason Morris
text: Great customer service extremely nice employees

name: Danielle M
text: Just moved from FL to Arab and was lucky enough to be referred to this animal hospital! Our dog suffered 3 seizures out of nowhere last night and they got us in first thing this morning for care! Pleasurable experience from the very beginning starting with the lovely lady, Angel answering my phone call, so caring and efficient   in helping us get my dog in ASAP. Due to Covid19 their lobby is still closed, but immediately on my arrival I called and someone came out to greet us and bring us in the side door to avoid traffic. Dr. Lauren Ellenburg came into the room quickly and already had briefed herself with the information about my dog’s blood work from another hospital the night before. She is so compassionate, knowledgeable, and thorough with explaining what she feels needs to be done for your animal. She listens to you and doesn’t make you feel rushed! You can tell she genuinely loves her career and cares for the animals! Amazing is all I can say. She and her whole staff 5 ⭐️. Dr. Lauren Ellenburg answered my million questions and personally got on the phone to update me on my dog’s treatment. They don’t do any procedure without talking to you first and getting your approval and they’re so affordable (not like FL). She is so reassuring and sweet. We will be returning here for sure and highly recommend this animal hospital! Thank you all so much for treating our Oliver.

name: Kat Lopez
text: Thank You for always taking such good care of my babies! Y’all are just simply amazing!! Trouble Dery says Thank You!!!!

name: OTG 76
text: Wonderful open house yesterday excellent staff . The only place I take my kids aka pets!!

name: Barron Latta
text: I had a stray cat that showed up at my house so I started feeding him. After I saw that he decided to make a home at my house I took him to Westside to have him neutered and to get all of his shots and anything else that he might need. The staff is very friendly and helpful. I can't remember the attending vets name but he was great. The price for all they did was very reasonable. My cat looks and feels so much better. I am very happy with their service and will be returning as needed.

name: Kimberly Ferris
text: Dr Mahan is a wonderful vet to all of our dogs. She has helped us with many foster dogs also. We have been going there for almost almost 19 yrs.  Wouldn't think of going anywhere else.

name: Amber Rigsby
text: We love Westside! This is the only Veterinary office we will ever use. Our main Veterinarian is Dr. Mahan and I cannot say enough about how amazing she has always been. Yesterday I ended up having to take our cat up there unplanned. We saw Dr. Wilks & I couldn't be more pleased. He was so amazing, took his time, interacted with our cat and made sure to thoroughly go over everything. I would definitely recommend them every time!

name: Amber Wilson
text: Used this vet for all my animals. Set up payment arrangements and have paid it off several times. Even paid a bill for an animal that wasn't mine. Staff acts like I've never paid bill. What I don't understand is why the staff is acting in this manner.

name: Peggy Ashburn
text: They have been our veterinarians for over 25 years.  All of our pets have received excellent care from everyone there.  I would not dream of going anywhere else! We have also boarded our pets there several times and they are cared for just like members of the family.  They are simply Top Notch!!

name: Billie Ellen Simpson
text: This has been my vet service provider since 1999. Everyone connected to this hospital is dedicated to the care of both the pet and its owner. They are professional,compassionate,understanding and always willing to work with you to achieve the best level of care possible for your pet. I wouldn't go any where else. In my opinion they are the best in the area.

name: Gary Ferris
text: We love veterinarian Dixie Mahan. She has always gone over and above for our various dogs and cat. She is patient and willing to discuss all options and answer in detail any questions that we have. And the prices are much more reasonable than in Huntsville to which we live closer.

name: Sandy McDonald
text: We've been using Westside Vet for over 20 years, wouldn't use anyone else. It doesn't matter to us which doctor we see, because they are all so friendly, caring and patient with our animals, and don't leave us until all our questions are answered. We've boarded our dogs there a few times and never worry about them, we know they are taken care of and loved.

name: stevenjsmith
text: Multiple visits I realized they add certain things to your bill without asking the customer . For example I took my cat and four kittens up there for shots and told them that is all I wanted and they charged me for a feline leukemia test and told me they do it for all adult felines. After calling and asking why they did it the female over the phone hung up on me. This I not the only time they have added charges to my bill. I don't think all the people leaving these reviews are actually looking at their invoice afterwards.

resp.text: Hi Mr. Smith, we are certainly very sorry that you were unhappy with your visit. On Thursday, you dropped your cat off to be spayed and requested that she receive all vaccinations recommended for an outdoor cat. We spayed her and gave her a rabies vaccine, feline distemper vaccine, and feline leukemia vaccine. We did not test her for feline leukemia. It is not our office policy to test all adult cats. A feline leukemia test is $50. If you check your invoice, I think you will find that this procedure was not done. We make every effort to ensure that we follow the client's requests to the best of our ability. On Friday, your wife brought in 4 kittens for their first vaccinations and deworming. They each received a thorough physical exam, their first feline distemper vaccine, and a dose of dewormer. A 20% discount was applied to the vaccinations because you have 4 kittens. Your wife paid the entire bill at checkout. Angel was the receptionist that you spoke with on Thursday when you dropped off your cat for surgery as well as who you spoke to on the phone when you called back with concerns over the bill. Angel is one of our lead receptionists and does her very best to ensure that all of our clients are happy and their needs are met. Prior to this visit, you had not been in our office since 2016. Again, we are very sorry for any confusion and we wish you the best in finding future veterinary care. Sincerely, Dr. Lauren Ellenburg

name: Kileigh Bagwell
text: The best vet in town! The renovations are beautiful inside and out. Dr. Tom Ellenburg is very informative and caring.

name: joanna deatley
text: I absolutely love this clinic. I have used many vet clinics in the past but will never go anywhere else now. I have decided that even if I move I will still use this clinic. Dr. Mahan is phenomenal with my cats and remembers every detail about them each visit.  She always calls after visits and ensures that they're both doing well and to check if I need anything else for them.  The staff always remembers me when I come in for medication refills, to board the cats, or call with a question. I love the remodel and nee facilites now as well.

name: Joy Garner
text: I don't even now where to begin saying all I have experienced at this Vet hospital. ALL the staff and Vets are excellent! They have performed impossible surgeries on some of my animals that saved their lives. A local vet in the town I live in, performed a routine spay on my pet. The nightmare began. Her intestines ALL fell out on the floor. Westside performed emergency surgery and saved her life. I totally expected and was prepared for them to tell me she did not survive. I knew I was kissing her goodbye. No vet can top this team. I drive almost an hour one way to use this facility.

name: Michael Sypniewski
text: Best treatment you can buy for your loving pets in the area. Whenever it came to serious problems, this is the vet I came to. Best staff to deal with, period. They are a little pricey, but you get what you pay for here. They have the equipment that most don't have and they will go out of the way to find the issue. I had a doberman that got very sick and was having autoimmune problems. We had an issue finding out what was wrong and her not eating or drinking was making things worse. They had to keep her for a week and I was told that the techs actually went to a grocery store to buy sandwich meats just to try to get her to eat. All of the staff here are very caring and go above and beyond to care for their patients.

name: Carolyn J Bonin
text: I am a breeder with a large number of small dogs.  I spend a fair amount of time and a great deal of money at the vet.  Over the years I have used several very good vets in the area, but I am most happy with the care, the service and the prices at Westside Veterinary Hospital.  Whether it is routine screening or an emergency C-section at 4:00am, they never let me down.  I work mostly with Dr Dixie Mahan, but I also have a high regard for Dr Andy Wilkes and Dr Jarrod Harney.  The techs and the reception staff are also first rate.  All are knowledgeable, but also willing to listen.  Prices are always fair.  Good vet care is not inexpensive, but I never feel that money is the most important issue at Westside.  Their focus is invariably on providing the very best possible care for my dogs.

name: Tammy Kelley
text: Our family has been using Westside for decades and it's always a pleasant experience.  Everyone is always so kind and helpful.  Couldn't ask for better service.

name: Jonkristjen Eubanks
text: We would not take our pets any where else.  The staff are very courteous and we have always been pleased with the service.  Large or small, you can be sure your pet will not be just another patient, the WVH staff treat each pet as it is their own.

name: Marcia B
text: Everyone from the front desk back very helpful and friendly and go out of their way to make pets and "parents" feel comfortable and welcome.  Prices are reasonable and staff outstanding.

name: Ashley Green
text: We went on a week long vacation and boarded our very anxious puppy with them. They have made his anxiety worse by kicking the kennel doors closed on him because he was getting mad, we will never use this vet's office again. He is crate trained and house broken, so he should have been fine.

name: K McIntyre
text:
Take all my pets to Westside and have for over 10 years.    They have always treated them with love and care.

I was really impressed with the young Vet Tech who asked the same questions that Dr. Wilks did when he came into the room.  I don't remember her name but you obviously are on the right path

name: cindy lindsey
text: Always  kind, great  with both of our dogs

name: Ramona Mcmurray
text: I jus love Dr. Dixie an all the staff.you need a veterinarian ,then check out Westside veterinary hospital for all your pets.you will be glad you did.

name: Terri Needham
text: Westside Veterinary Hospital has the most loving, caring and understanding staff ever!!!! They have been my Vet for all my animals for years now, and I wouldn't have it any other way!! I panicked when my nosey little Lab got a fish hook stuck in her lip in the late evening, but one call to Westside and she was in the hospital, fish hook out, and I was assured she was fine!!! No more tears and Miss Dixie took such tender care of my nosey baby and me!!!!!! I would highly recommend Westside to anyone who loves their pets and wants the best care for them!!

name: Sandy Charest
text: I wouldn't take my dogs to another place.  They are the best.  One of the vets has even met me in the middle of the night during the power outages due to the 2011 tornadoes and saved my dog's life.

name: April Jones
text: They have taken really good care of my dogs. I would recommend them. My puppy was so sick then got an allergic reaction. They worked with us until we figured out the cause and they where very patient with us.

name: Janet Ricroft
text:
We have been using Westside for fifteen years now and I would not take my dogs anywhere else.  They have the best, most caring doctors I have had the pleasure to know.

Mostly I would like to thank Dr.  Dixie Mahan for being so caring to all my animals and very understanding of their humans.
J. Ricroft

name: Aaron Sumner
text: Westside has by far the best Staff and Vets.  They love the animals that are under their care, and are very empathetic to the humans as well.  They are well worth the drive from Huntsville!

name: Benny Pendergrass
text: they will take very good care of your animals and make sure you understand what you need to do to take care of them yourself when they leave there from their carrier and I also care about your animals that's hard to find

name: Elizabeth Smith
text: Love Westside Veterinary Hospital. We have taken all our pets there for the last 30 yrs. The staff is wonderful and so very helpful. Dr. Mahan and Dr. Ellenberg have always gone above and beyond for us.

name: Thomas Reese
text:
We have been going to this vet for years after leaving Huntsville. Our family has adopted many cats and dogs that wandered in to our lives over time. They have  always treated our pets as if they were a part of  their own family. The staff even calls to check up on them days after the visit. They have fair rates and don't put your pet thru expensive tests that often aren't neccesary. They.always inform you of all the treatment options that are available and let you decide.
They seem to be busy at times and they are growing. It's a smart idea to call first but even if you don't they always get you without much wait.

name: Jacob Bittle
text: We would like to publicly  thank and applaud this vet , especially dr dixie, for their excellent car of our dog rocker. Their ability and willingness to explain the how and why was fantastic. We plan to use them for all of our future pet needs.

name: Fred Hoffman
text: Thay have been great with our cat Samantha who passed on at 21 years, and with our dog Zack currently. We highly recommend them.

name: Holly Andries
text: They have always been there to help whenever I need them.  Always professional and curious.

name: Tom Dewille
text: I have a LARGE dog, the doctor (Harris)  came out to the car to  treat him instead of making me bring him in.  The service is spectacular and very competent.   It's a 45 min drive from my house and worth it.

resp.text: Thank you, Mr. Dewille, for your kind words.  We appreciate your business!

name: David Dreitzler
text:
I have used the services of WVC for years.  They are professional and caring.  It is a great animal hospital.

Dave Dreitzler

name: andrea taylor
text: My Callie had a medical emergency on Thanksgiving Day 2016....Dr. Ellenburg met us at the office at 4pm and gave her excellent care and she is now happier and healthy!!!....The staff and Drs at this office are FANTASTIC!!

name: Poison Apple
text: Westside Vet Clinic is the best , I could not ask for better in the care of my pets , Patient , kind and loving ,Tom Ellenberg , Dr Wilks and the rest of the staff are knowledgeable and up to date on the newest medical procedures , medicine and preventive care and through in questions on medical issues , i have one pet that gets very nervous when we are called back to a room , Dr Wilks and Vet techs Rita and or Jess will take the time to calm him down and no mussel is needed , All the staff at Westside is awesome !! i will never go anywhere else !!

resp.text: Ms. Saint, thank you so much for your sweet comment! We really appreciate your business.

name: P. Lyons
text:
We love Dr. Mahan, she always returns calls at the end of the day, even if its after business hours and that means a lot to us.  The staff is friendly, clean rooms, prompt appointments.

The Lyons family, Arab.

name: Nancy Lockhart
text: Excellent care, just had two dogs spayed and they are doing great.

name: Debi Blackmon
text: Terribly expensive.  The same treatment and meds at 3 other comparable vets in the area are way more than half of what they charge.  We did not get a diagnosis/cure there either.  Just bandaids.

name: Jessica Ross
text: Westside Veterinary Hospital is the greatest vet I have ever been too, My Gizzmo got his eye knocked out by another dog and Mr Tom Ellenburg made sure we got took care of at 11:00 pm one night because all the vets around me would not see us. So now this is the only vet I use, Thank ya'll very much.

name: Liz Hardy
text: Dr. Mahan is the best veterinarian we've ever had.

name: Stephanie Mier
text: We take all of our pets to Westside Vet.  They have always taken really good care of our fur babies.  And our larger livestock too when we had them.

name: Steve Collins
text: What a great staff. They are pros all the way. Very respectfull

name: Dena Bedsole
text: Dr. Wilks is always thorough and great with my animals!

name: Beth Riley
text: In all my years of having dogs, this is the best Veterinary Clinic I have ever been to. The most knowledgeable, caring, loving doctors and staff ... they are the BEST !!

name: Dennis Buckmeir
text: Westside is the best friend Benji and Milo have.

name: Ronnie Hornsby
text: Great place to take your pet.

name: Greg S
text: They are by far the VERY BEST veterinary facility we've ever used!

name: valerie ball
text: Friendly staff, quick service, and affordable

name: Dawn Dyar (makeuplady)
text: Wonderful caring doctors.

name: Renee Eiland
text: They do it for the pet's not the money, my babies love their Dr.

name: Darlene Evans
text: Couldn't ask for better Dr's or staff, my bella luvs luvs to go up there..

name: Ellen Burdick
text: We trust them 100% with our fur babies!

name: Cindy Phillips
text: I’ve taken my dogs and cats to Cullman Veterinary Hospital for years and have always been impressed by the compassion, honesty and respectfulness of all the doctors and staff. They help you triage your pet’s needs according to your budget and they understand how much our pets become part of our families.

name: Josh Foster-Lloyd
text: The staff here is very friendly and welcoming.  I use them for work. They are great with small animals and reptiles.

name: Stephanie Fontaine
text: Dr. Welch is wonderful! He takes time with you and your pets and explains everything thoroughly. He also doesn't try to over treat. Great vet!

name: arci crawlynn
text: I wouldn’t recommend this vet to anyone. Thanks to his mercurial policies our two year old puppy died. We called the clinic, it was a definite emergency. Our dog was unresponsive and had started bleeding from her rectum. He wouldn’t let us walk her into the clinic until we paid them first. My husband sat in their parking lot waiting for me to arrive with the credit card. We begged, pleaded but were told, “Sorry, we can’t see her until you’ve paid. We didn’t owe them money. This is the clinic we’d used for our dog before. So After we paid, then they  went to go find the stretcher to put her on. She died less than ten minutes later. Money is definitely more important to this Vet than animals. Beware!!!

resp.text: Dear Arci Crawlynn, This is Dr. W.R. Welch at Welch Veterinary Clinic in Wetumpka, Alabama. I sincerely hope you mistakenly addressed the wrong clinic or veterinarian. There are at least 2 other Welch Veterinary Clinic in the US. I have been here for 46+ years and my records have no such Arci Crawlynn on file nor do any of my staff recall such an event as you described. If you are using an alias please reply with you real name and I will address you accordingly. Just so you know I have no mercurial policies in my practice either with Webster's first definition of "pertaining to mercury" or second definition of "quick, changeable, fickle, etc", though I must commend you on your command of the "King's English" . In the State of Alabama, state statues do not allow a case to be handled as you describe. Likewise, it is against the Veterinary Oath and Veterinary Medical Ethics. I know the law well since i served on the Alabama State Board of Veterinary Medical Examiners for many years. There are mechanisms in place with that board to file a formal complaint against  any practicing veterinarian in Alabama. I encourage you to file such a complaint if an event such as you described actually occurred with me or any other veterinarian. I can assure you a full and formal investigation will be made. If the events you described did not actually occur at my office or did not occur at all or if you do not actually exist, I demand an immediate and public apology. If all of this is a figment of your imagination, I encourage you to seek professional help.  Sincerely,  Dr. Welch

name: Sue Macko
text: I love Dr Welch. He has been wonderful to our dogs. His staff is warm and welcoming also.

resp.text: Thank you very much. You and your pets have been a pleasure to serve

name: Danielle Lussier
text: They were very supportive.

name: Gina
text: Dr Welch and his staff are kind, caring, compassionate people. We have taken our pets to him for years. He found out what was wrong with our new kitten we found in Florida, where the other vets in Florida failed to see it on the x ray. He always takes the time to explain everything and they were all wonderful when our 18 year old cat passed. I wouldn't go anywhere else.

name: carolyn mcfarland
text: You definitely do not get it your way !

name: Shelly
text: I took my chihuahua to Dr. Welch for a routine teeth cleaning. Everyone was wonderful and my little came home with beautiful white teeth.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words and for trusting us with your pet's health care.

name: Roger Murray
text: I have been using Dr. Welch since moving to this area about 4 years ago.  He and his staff are always great. He takes his time with you and explains everything to you.  I have learned a lot from him and I would not go anywhere else.

name: Tonya Clark-Palmer
text: Could not ask for a more compassionate vet and staff are friendly and efficient. When my dogs have been really sick there has been no long waiting for an appointment.

name: TJ Amadore
text: Top notch service and care!

name: Martha Tack
text: Dr. Welch is the best!!

name: Cindy Peake
text: They are treating one of my dogs for heart worms and we're in the 3rd month. It's a little rough watching Buster's breathing at times. He is doing well on the treatment I do believe! I'll let you know in 6 months, it takes that long before they get the heart worm test to see if it's still there or cured. Everyone is very kind and the Vet is amazing!

name: Elizabeth Hughes
text: By far the best vet in town. I will only take my pets there because they always recieve the best care. Rolling pet is the most affordable vet care in town too!

name: Tonia N.
text: NO, absolutely do NOT recommend! Vet is super rude and condescending! Horrible place!!! Do not take your babies there!!! Will never take another of my fur babies there! I found myself apologizing to my poor cat after picking her up from that place! They kept her overnight and didn't even feed her! Her tummy was sunken in like 2 inches below her ribs! That's just one example of their negligence!!!

name: Christina Wages
text: Dr. Micki and her staff are wonderful! I've taken my dog and cats here for two years. Today we brought in my daughter's rat...a first for me, but not Dr. Micki. I would recommend this place to anyone who wants the best care for their pets!

name: Terri Tribble
text: This is the greatest veterinarian in this area! Mickie and her team are awesome and so caring! As long as she is a vet she will be our vet!

name: Amelia Stoneking
text: Best vet in town love the way she loves my furbabies

name: Stacey Venable
text: Super friendly staff. Down to earth. Personable. Knowledgeable. Fair pricing. Love Dr. Micki.

name: Tracy McDonald
text: I love these guys!  They helped us figure out what was going on with one of our cats when another vet had given up. The whole staff is so helpful and encouraging.  I highly recommend them!

name: jennifer land
text: I give Rolling Pet Mobile Vet 5 stars! Dr. Micki and her team are the best of the best. Always there when I need them, always going above and beyond. For the first time in a long time, my elder dog isn't scared of the vet. She goes in with a wagging tail, and leaves with a wagging tail. Definitely my first choice vet, and would recommend to anyone. You are in good hands with this team!!

name: Mark Atchley
text: She's the best vet in scottsboro. I would drive from Skyline to Stevenson,  when she was there. Dont listen to any negative comments. They dont know what there talking about. Used her for years and will continue.

name: Kaedis
text: We have seven dogs, ranging from a 120 lb. hound to a tiny chihuahua. Rolling Pet came to our house, performed heart worm tests on each dog and gave all of our pooches rabies shots. They were professional, friendly, and worked wonderfully with our all our dogs. Plus, the fact that they could come to our house and perform the examinations on-site made their services that much more wonderful. I would highly recommend them.

name: Skull Kitty
text: Friendly staff, Dr. Micki is so helpful she will actually talk to about your pet.

name: dewayne wadsworth
text: Perfect crop on our dobie. Best Ive seen.

name: Brandy Willeford
text: Not very happy with the nursing staff (vet seems caring) took our sick cat there... he was scared never been in a place like that before. Instead of letting my wife hold and calm him during the check up,the nurse kept scruffing his neck (which was not workin) and tapping him on the head harder than what seemed necessary my wife ask why the nurse said it was to distract him. All it did was make him worse. (she stopped doing it after the vet walked in the room?) Vet said couldnt find anything wrong with him but we could pay 130 for testing and another 30 for a pill to calm him down my wife was upset and just brought him home. We read on the internet about cat respiratory infection. Took a damp wrag with lavender oil on it to help him breath. He started another sneezing fit and I saw something on his nose and pulled out a six inch piece of grass that had somehow he got up his nose and gotten infected. So we wont be taking our pets back to there again.

name: Sid Jones
text: Micky Jones is a pleasure. Loving and kind. In fact everyone there is special to me.

name: C Bearden
text: I've used this animal clinic for a couple of years now for my two dogs. Today, I took one of my dogs in for a change in behavior evaluation. Naturally, anyone who loves their pet would be concerned. The doctor was both abrupt and condescending. She talked to me as if I was a really stupid person and had the gall to ask if I knew how to research using the internet. First of all, I'm a Registered Nurse but even if I wasn't... this blatant insinuating, condescending tone was totally embarrassing and unprofessional. The person who was with me was so angry and stated that they would NEVER use this doctor again. He was appalled by her attitude. He can rest assured that I won't be a returning customer nor will I recommend this vet!!!

name: Shannon Murphy
text: OMGOSH I don't know where to start with our Micki. She has got to be the best vet in the world. I truly would be lost without her.  I am that person that is moma to ever stray from 8 dogs, 1 Macaw, 5 cats, 9 fish,  and 1 iguana. I have not had an issue to face with any of them that Micki has not been able to  fix. She is the best at what she does not only because of her knowledge of her job, but because of her attitude towards you and your babies. I love her and probably could keep going on with this review about her.  But I promise if you go see her you will not be regretting it. Her and her staff (Niki) are part of our family, go make them part of yours.

resp.text: Awww we love you my sweet friend

name: Aaron Michael
text: Great vet, great groomer on site (although you must make appointment 1-2 weeks in advance for groomer) only downside is the parking situation. But whatcha gonna do.

name: Betty Dodson
text: Very friendly and they explain everything to you. Hours are great, location is great also.

name: Sidney Jones
text: Great friendly people and great care

name: Joyce Dillingham
text: Dr. McClanahan is the most knowledgeable, skilled, caring and loving Vet in Scottsboro and probably all of Alabama.  Her facility is professional yet comfortable for pets (and owners).  If you have a choice, choose Dr. McClanahan.

name: Regina Baugh
text: The people are nice and friendly

name: Little Homestead In Alabama
text: Dr. And staff are the best.

name: Wanda Dalton
text: Great service and staff

name: Darryl Bailey
text: I take all my pets here.

name: Connie Mead
text: Best vet and crew in town

name: Cc ccc
text: My animals and I love Rolling Pet Mobile Vet!

name: Eric Prewett
text: Excellent vet

name: Disney Nerd27
text: Thanks....Great work

name: Pam Abell
text:
Dr. Brown came to our home to put our sweet 14 year old to sleep. She had doggie dementia and  many other health problems. She needed to go to the vet but she was extremely stressed about being put on a leash. She did not know us and we could no longer touch her without her becoming aggressive. It became time to put her down but we could not get her in the car.
Dr. Brown came to us and was so nice to our old girl. She did a great job and we cannot thank you enough for your help at such a difficult time.
Thank you,
The Abell Family

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experience with others. We strive to make the experience as peaceful as possible on everyone involved.  Very glad we could assist during this difficult time.

name: Jennifer Rademacher
text: Dr. Brown is a caring and thorough veterinarian. She is always on time, prepared and extremely professional.  Her teeth floating skills are the best I’ve seen. Her advice regarding the best care for the horse is always on point. She serves the best interests of horses and their owners. I am grateful that she serves this area so my horse receives the best possible care.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words!

name: Bernadette
text:
Dr Brown is truly wonderful, caring and compassionate.   Our family is so lucky to have found her.  Thank you for being so patient and kind.  You’re the best vet!
-The Davis Family-

resp.text: You are very welcome! Thank you for your kind words!

name: Lynda Biggs
text: We have continued to use Dr. Brown for several of our animal babies. We first contacted her when our sweet dog Jenny was ready to leave this earth. She was very professional and caring and made the experience so much easier for us and Jenny. Next we contacted her as one of our Nigerian pygmy goats was having fecal problems.  After worming both of them she went above and beyond sending off several lab samples.  And she always checks on them. She's so thorough and they love her. You won't find a more nurturing vet. We all love her.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words! Working with clients like you is always a joy.

name: jodie johnson
text: Dr.Brown was recommended to me by a Friend of mine My 12 year old lab needed attention asap .and she not only came to our home it was after hrs. She texted me after the  visit and several times the next day to see how my lab was doing. She was just so careful and Caring with Sweetie. She goes above and beyond what she would have to do to help you and your Fur babies. Shes very Professional but very caring not only to your animals needs but to yours as well. I Highly recommend Dr.Brown for all your animals young old little or big shes wonderful with them all.

resp.text: Thank you for your very kind words!

name: JAMES JOLLY
text: Dr. Brown was right on time for our appointment at my farm!  She was very thorough in examining my horse and dog, both I have just acquired.  She answered all my questions completely and addressed all my concerns.  I believe I have found a very reliable and highly experienced veterinarian! I would definitely recommend her to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words! Look forward to seeing your crew again!

name: Izabella Stanley
text: Had my horses teeth floated. Loved her service! Would definitely recommend! I will be using Browns from now on!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words and for taking the time to leave a review!

name: Nichole Jarrell
text: Called Browns about one of my sick goats. She came out the same day in the worst of weather and took care of my goat. She is so friendly and professional. She went above and beyond for us and could not be more satisfied with her service. She has also called and checked my goat since then and my sweet goat is doing 100 times better. I would recommend her to any one who needs a mobile vet. She is my new vet for sure. Thank you so much!!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words! Hopefully next time the weather will be better!

name: Sandy Baxley
text: I was looking for someone to come to my house for vet visits for my 2 Great Danes since it is quite the chore to take them anywhere. I found Dr. Brown through another "vet to pet" service. She was very thorough, knowledgeable and reasonable as to what I should expect with my kids. She also suggested options for taking care of their teeth and my male Dane's dysplasia. Lab work was done here and results were virtually immediate. I think its a great option to have the vet come into your home . . less stress on mom and kids. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with others!

name: Linda Elliott
text: Dr Brown is excellent-- professional, knowledgeable, and truly compassionate.  She helped us through the process, ensuring a peaceful transition full of love and prayer.  My baby boy, 14 yr old black lab, is now finally out of pain, and was able to leave us in my home,  accompanied by friends and love.  I am forever grateful his last moments were at home and not on a steel table, to be left behind.

resp.text: It is always difficult to say goodbye to our companions.   How blessed he was to have been at home until the end, surrounded by his loved ones. ❤️

name: Robin Hanna
text: Dr Brown was very caring and compassionate with my dogs.  She came out and provided a wellness check and shots.  This was much less stressful than taking them into an office.  I would definitely recommend Dr Brown for your pets and farm animals!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with others!

name: terrell dixon
text: Dr. Brown was able to come and check our goats out within just a day or two of being contacted who were limping pretty bad. Very responsive and quickly got back to me to schedule an appointment. I am happy to report that after just a few days on the antibiotics, they were jumping and playing and have been 100% better! Also, we are new to the goat world and Dr. Brown gave me pointers and things to look for with our new goats which was much appreciated! Thanks Dr Brown!!

resp.text: So glad to hear the happy report of kids acting like kids! 🐐

name: Rachel Buczek
text: Dr. Brown went above and beyond to provide a peaceful euthanasia for our beloved cat. She was able to come out earlier than planned as our cat took a turn for the worse. This was so appreciated and kind of her to do. As well as this, she provided such good care for our boy, and was so professional with her practice. I highly suggest Dr. Brown to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave sweet words.  Much love to you and yours during this difficult loss.

name: Tarinawyatt Wyatt
text: Dr. Brown came to our home to give our two large dogs a well check and their immunizations. The dogs were nervous but she has such a calming demeanor, they warmed up to her quickly. We will definitely be using Dr. Browns services again. I can't tell you how much we appreciate her.

resp.text: It’s very rewarding to ease the animals anxiety and make it as easy as possible for them and their owners! Thank you for the kind words.

name: Tina Renfroe
text: We reach out to Dr. Brown this morning and she responded very quickly. We explained our situation with everything that is going on with this virus situation. We were informed of the fees for a house trip, which definitely made my life easier seeing I had 9 kittens to deal with. The fees were very reasonable and everything was quick and easy. Highly recommended!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words and for sharing your experience!

name: Barbara Psalmond
text: Dr. Brown was able to squeeze me in when I needed an immediate appointment for my mini-horse. She was very informative to my non-medical understanding self and explained everything in a way I could understand. She was great with my mini and he's back on track to wellness. Thank you Dr. Brown!

resp.text: Very welcome! Glad to help!

name: G TB
text: We are brand new horse owners.  Our two horses arrived on Monday and Dr Brown came out on Friday.  She was very pleasant to talk to and took time to answer our many questions, provide tips, recommendations, and even demonstrations.  After talking with her, we were finally able to take a deep breathe, relax and enjoy our horses!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with others! Welcome to the horse world!

name: Noelle Nargi
text:
My family and I love Dr Brown. Hardworking, diligent,  and always there when you need her! Goes above and beyond what I expect a vet to be.

My dog had cut his pad and within 3 hours she was able to come take a look at him after all of her other appointments. (Vets all around weren’t able to see him until the next morning)  she also will come out to you which is amazing! Highly recommend her. (:

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience, your words are much appreciated!

name: Amanda Strickland
text: Dr. Brown is compassionate, yet realistic and and puts your animals well being first.  She is brilliant, yet will refer to a specialist when needed.  It’s so nice to be able to have someone knowledgeable come to the house and treat my animals where they are most comfortable.  Try her...you won’t regret it!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words!

name: Katrina Stoess
text: Dr Brown arrived within the window she specified. Relieved our concerns on the health of Fiona, our donkey. Fiona is still spooked as we have only had her 4 days, so Dr Brown took the  time to tell and show us what steps we need to take to ease Fiona and Shrek into their new home. Well most definetly keep her number in my phone.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with others

name: Tommy Richardson
text: Dr. Brown is the best. Shows up on time. Pleasant to be with, makes you and your animals feel relaxed during her visit. Highly recommend this service.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words!

name: TIK TOK COMPILATION
text: My horse needed a spay done and the doctors did it on short notice. The spay was done professionally and good quality . They seemed to really care about my horses. I will indeed use them again for my animal . HIGHLY RECOMEND

resp.text: Pleasure meeting you and your horse. Thank you for the kind words.

name: Eric Felock
text: Doctor Brown was great! She was wonderful with our two German Shepards and Golden Retriever.  Our one GS is anxious around other people but Doctor Brown calmed her and was able to complete the exam. With the pandemic and changes to some vet practices, Doctor Brown has restored our faith in great animal care. The big bonus was she was able to come to the house to conduct the appointment. What a life saver! Even after other vets allow customers back into their practices, we will be staying with Brown’s Farm Animal Veterinary Services.

resp.text: Always glad when an anxious dog does well!   Great meeting y’all and looking forward to the next time. Thank you for taking the time to leave a review!

name: Renay Davis
text: I wish I had found Dr. Brown sooner! I have an aging dog and transportation to the vet is quite challenging.  Dr. Brown is very kind and it's obvious that she cares about what she does and especially the animals. She was a godsend for us! She was also very helpful is us determining our dog's quality of life. He's still hanging in there and is in less pain. We are grateful for all her help. Highly recommended!

resp.text: Thank you for your sweet words. So glad to be able to help and prolong his time with you.

name: Carol Ann Conner
text: We rescued a pit, a beautiful dog. We haven't been able to get a collar on him, or get him to the vet. Our dog trainer. Teresa Nichols, set up an appointment with Nikki Brown. We had a very positive visit and expect good results with her,

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with others 😊

name: Chelsea Megan Ivey
text: Dr. Brown is very quick to respond and scheduled a visit in a very timely manor. She is compassionate and put me at ease about what was going on with my pup. She took excellent care of us and we are so thankful for her! We will definitely be seeing her again.

resp.text: ❤️ Thank you for the kind words, I know just how much your pup means to you!

name: jennifer caudell
text: We had the very best experience with her.  We have 6 dogs and with COVID trying to take the dogs to The vet and drop them off at the door wasn’t even something we wanted to try.  She was very professional but also caring and made us feel at ease right away.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with others and for the kind words! So nice to meet you and your crew!

name: Tyler Wesley
text: Dr. Brown is both extremely professional and helpful. She answered all of our questions regarding the health of our horses and goats. We will definitely be using her as our Veterinarian for all of our animals’ health needs to include our horses, goats, and dogs. Very thankful that she was referred to us.

resp.text: Glad we were able to help. Looking forward to meeting the rest of the herd!

name: Diane Rawn
text: Dr. Brown has been my vet for over 13 years now.  She is the best vet that I have ever used for my horses in the 40+ years I have had them.  She is very professional, thorough and dependable.  She always communicates very well and answers texts and calls. She explains everything that is going on and answers all of your questions. I am very fortunate to have her as my vet!  If I am worried about something, I will call her just to hear the confidence that everything will be OK. And, it shows how much she loves what she is doing.  Love this vet!

resp.text: You are too sweet! All your animals are blessed to have you care for them, as well as the neighboring animals!

name: Chad Carpenter
text: We have known Dr Nikki Brown for over 5 years now and I can honestly say she is Top Notch. She has always taken the time to explain what she does and how she is doing it! She comes to you in our case 45 miles from her real home even though she is a mobile vet.... the fee for doing this doesn’t cover the cost of gas let alone anything else and what’s she offers is complete  care of your animals large and small. As the owner of our sweet Clara Belle (12 yr old Mare) for our entire time I couldn’t ask for someone more responsive, punctual, professional and down to earth and she has three children at home!! An incredible lady who I can count on and whom lots of others in our area do!! She will always text you or call you back, And I know when other professional can’t get there in time, she has does and will . It is an honor to call her our Vet and also a friend..... W/r Chad and Madison Carpenter

resp.text: Thank you so much for glowing review 😊 it definitely feels like I’ve known y’all longer than 5 years though! Looking forward to seeing y’all at the new barn, but hopefully not too soon 😉

name: LATIN MAD
text: Excellent service, will recommend. Attention to detail and very diligent about getting results.  Best experience ever with my giant fur babies. I have two great danes and is very hard for me to take them to the vet. She came to my house and got all the exams done and medications, all in one trip.  Will follow up timely and help you understand the needs of the dog.  Very experience and shows love and affection to the animals.

resp.text: Wow! Such kind words! Thank you!

name: Tandee Eiland
text: Dr. Brown is absolutely amazing! She is such a sweet person and a wonderful vet. Having her come out to our home instead of having to go into an office is an absolute lifesaver.  We love her and I know you will too.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words! Always a pleasure! And you’re so right on how much easier it is for me to come to you for all the critters!

name: Eleana Hickey
text: Dr. Nikki Brown is a godsend as far as vets go. She is a genuinely kind person who really loves what she does and the animals respond accordingly. She has a quiet and caring way of putting them at ease. The house calls are 1000 times better than taking your animal to the vet. I highly recommend giving her a call, your animals are much more comfortable in their own home versus a vet's office. I am so grateful to have her as my vet!!

resp.text: Your cat can never be forgotten with his antics! Truly glad I am able to help. You’re absolutely correct that I love my job!

name: Kathy Launius
text: I started using Dr. Brown a few months back to care for my standard poodles. I have one that is bad about having ear infections and she was so good at treating him she called after she saw him to check on him  to make sure he was feeling better.  She came again yesterday to do their annual check ups and shots and my dogs just love her so much she is so gentle and patient.  She has always responded anytime I have called her very quickly. I have other family members that use her also and they just love her like us

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experience with others! Always a pleasure to help!

name: Nancy Wright
text: Today was the first time Dr. Brown visited my home to treat my dog. She arrived on time and was professional and friendly. She took the time to listen to my concerns and come up with much improved course of treatment for my dog. To my surprise, she had everything needed for the visit in her van (testing supplies, medications, supplements), and she was able to run a quick urinalysis. I couldn't be more pleased, and I highly recommend her services. It was especially helpful to have her come to the house instead of loading up my elderly anxious dog and take her to an office.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with others, especially in detail! Hoping to help your dog stay comfortable for as long as possible.

name: Michelle Caves
text: Dr. Brown came to my house to take care of my 18.5 year old cat.  She is sick and I did NOT want to stress her out even more by putting her in the car.  Dr. Brown is very professional and responds quickly!   I would highly recommend her.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review! So glad it was less stressful on your cat! It makes a significant difference!

name: Garnet Dana
text:
Being new to the area, it has truly been a blessing finding Dr. Brown. I love her patience. She was also very helpful giving us information pertinent to our new area. She did an amazing job sewing our gelding’s head wound back together. She has a customer for life.
George n Garnet

resp.text: I am so very glad I was able to help you on the day you were in such need! And glad to have helped in other ways!

name: Marie Kessler
text: Dr. Browns, extremely sensitive manner as a vet is positively unmatched. Sad I had to say goodbye to my 15 year old Boston, Bob, but so grateful it was Dr. Brown at my home and making a very difficult situation, ease with her expert knowledge, caring and kindness. Forever filled with gratitude for you, Dr. Brown. You were right, each day gets a little better. Thank you for everything you do.

resp.text: It was an honor to have helped you and Bob during the most difficult time.

name: Donna Gallimore
text: Dr. Brown was such a blessing to us. My 20 year old mare had a suspicious skin tumor and Dr. Brown came out this morning and was able to perform a successful surgery right here at the barn. My horse Reba Honey is doing well and we appreciate Dr. Brown's skill and compassionate care. I will highly recommend her to all my friends.

resp.text: You are so kind, I am blessed to have customers like you!

name: John Burdette
text:
Well, with the Virus in full swing and the Nation shut down.
Nikki was gracious enough to  come out for my 5 horses and my dog, Itchy on a Sunday. Leaving her family to drive over and care for my animals. NIKKI'S wonderful at what she does... caring for my animals as if they were her own. Thanks a bunch, Nikki. You are a GOD send. Couldn't ask for any better service. John

name: Karen G
text:
Dr. Nikki has been taking excellent care of my fur babies- big and small- for several years! It is wonderful to have a vet who comes to my home so that I don't have the stress of loading up 3 horses, a donkey, two dogs and a cat to take for their vet visits!
I  HIGHLY recommend Dr Nikki and all her services!

resp.text: Stress free is the way to go!  So glad I can help save you the time and stress of not loading up the whole crew!  Plus, it’s a pleasure to visit with you and your animals!

name: richard jersey
text: Outstanding Vet! Very punctual and amazing service. Our horse had a bad reaction to a vaccine and Dr. Brown made numerous trips doing everything possible to make sure he recovered. He is back to his amazing self and very animated personality. We are grateful to her and everything she did to help us.

resp.text: So glad your horse is doing so much better after an odd reaction!  We always want the best for them! Glad to have helped him and you!

name: Dawn Gentry
text:
I have found Dr. Brown's services to be excellent. She demonstrates empathy and compassion for my animals.  She is a one stop shop for all vet services including floating my horse's teeth to euphanizing a horse.  Her rates are very affordable.
It took me months to find a vet that services my area and am thankful for Dr. Brown.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words. I understand how difficult it is to get help in a rural setting. Glad I have been able to help you and your animals!

name: Barbara Stokes
text:
Dr Nikki is great. She makes house calls for the convenience of her clients.   We have used her for several years, ( and even helped our past fur baby cross the rainbow bridge last year). . Very caring.
This time Had minor skin abcess removed from  our Border Collie on Monday.  Was very focused and caring explaining what she was doing and how Sadie was doing.  Answered and explained any concerns.  Followed up with asking how Sadie was doing.  Great to have a vet that cares and makes house calls for our fur babies. Highly recommend .

name: Kelli Wyrick
text: Dr. Brown is very experienced and provides vet care that exceeded my expectations.  I would highly recommend Dr. Brown.

name: liz phelan
text: Dr. Brown is a great equine vet! Moving from Texas to Georgia and trying to find someone I trusted with three of my horses was a stressful experience. Dr. Brown was a blessing to find. name: jamie smith
text:
Dr. Brown has been our equine  and canine vet for years. The knowledge,  professionalism and compassion that she has demonstrated to all our animals and their worried owners is above and beyond what's expected from a vet visit.
If you're looking for someone to shoot straight with you and provide your animals with the best care,  Dr. Brown is for you.

name: Tommy Richardson
text: Dr. Brown is the best. Shows up on time. Pleasant to be with, makes you and your animals feel relaxed during her visit. Highly recommend this service.

name: Lauren Lawrence
text: Dr. Brown is truly a Godsend. name: jennifer caudell
text: We had the very best experience with her.  We have 6 dogs and with COVID trying to take the dogs to The vet and drop them off at the door wasn’t even something we wanted to try.  She was very professional but also caring and made us feel at ease right away.

name: Christina Nowlin
text: Dr. Brown  Is great with my animals and is always very friendly and professional, I would recommend her to anyone looking for a great vet!  Not to mention the fact that she is mobile makes Dr. Brown's practice even better and convenient!

name: Angie Henderson
text: Nikki is awesome! It is so nice to have her come to our house and take care of all of our animals in one trip! We do not have to fight getting our cats to go in the kennels which makes it stress free!

text: Dr. Brown came to my Mother in Law’s home today to give her cats a checkup... Unfortunately, one of her older cats had passed in the night.... So it was a hectic yet sad situation... Dr Brown came in and spoke with my MIL like they had known each other forever... Dr Brown checked both her other cats and was kind, compassionate and extremely helpful... We highly recommend to anyone needing on site visits...

resp.text: You have such a sweet family, and I wish only the best for y’all going forward.  Glad I was able to assist during this sad time.

I moved an hour away and still don’t trust anyone else with my Stella’s health so we make the commute even with the car sickness. Now that’s love!!

text:
I used Dr. Brown when we were stationed here at Benning the first round and now that we are back, I finally got my favorite vet back.

She is amazing to work with and has the patience of saint to deal with my Hancock 😂.

As long as I can be near where I can use her, I will always have her as my #1 choice.

resp.text: You’re silly! He’s not THAT bad 😀. It’s always fun seeing clients who have moved away and then return! Glad to have you and your horse back!

name: Taylor Allen
text:
I have an extremely dog aggressive dog. My husband has been kicked out of vet offices for him trying to start fights despite the staff having knowledge of his aggression and making him sit in the lobby with other animals.
South Memorial was very welcoming and accepting of me and my pet. I called to schedule and appointment for vaccinations, and was told they could fit me in any time (usual for a vets office). They were very kind and affordable. They do not charge an office visit unless you need to see the vet which is great when you have 3 pets!
But where they really shined was when I told them about my dogs aggression issues. They asked what time to expect me and I was told they would have a private room ready. When I walked in I was immediately ushered into a room and vaccines were given. We then went into the lobby and another dog (I believe a staff members) was coming in. They asked her to wait outside and locked the door while they took care of my payment and paper work.
I never once felt like me or my dog were unwelcome due to his issues and they did everything they could to accommodate me. I will definitely be using them for all my vet needs!

I am so happy my animals go to this vets office. My animals are truly cared for and the staff is all so caring and knowledgeable.

Today I took my dog in there when she got a string wrapped around her toe nail and I was unable to remove it. They were helpful and quick while also being considerate of her being scared. I’d recommend them to anyone with animals!!

text: I have been bringing my pets to Dr. Laura Park for nearly 30 years. She and her staff are not only excellent with animals, but it's also evident that they love them. They help find alternatives for expensive procedures and medications, because they understand when budgets are tight. I would not consider any other veterinary services in this area; none can match their care for pets and consideration for owners. They truly understand that family pets are family MEMBERs. text:
DO NOT TAKE YOUR PET HERE!!!!

My mother took her dog there because he had a large bump above his eye.  Dr Gammage said she had to sedate him, take a biopsy and send it for testing ..... Price $300 dollars.  What Dr. Gammage actually did was ... while he was awake draw a little fluid from it with a needle and sent it for testing.  Dr Gammage did not sedate the dog or do a biopsy and still charged her the $300 dollars anyway.  She took ADVANTAGE of a woman on a fixed income that would do anything to help her dog!   Don’t let her take advantage of you too!

text: I was taken back at how this Vet office operates (or fails to do so). There is no animal control or any type of shelter in the area, and they refused to take three  one day old kittens that were starving to death. The mother was a sick stray that had them and had no milk to feed them. I explained this to the receptionist who acted as though she had better things to do. The vet ( I hate to even call her that) would not spare a little compassion for the animals, but had plenty of time to call me back and act like a complete idiot when I told them that they should be ashamed, I understand that they don't take in strays, that is not what they do. Given the situation I would have expected a person who claims to have compassion for animals spare a few cents to put an end to their suffering. they are the only vet in the area and they could have been a shining example. Instead, they were a poster board of greed.

I believe everyone there really cares for the well being of each animal they see. Another nice thing is that appointments are usually staggered, and I don't have to wait long or with a bunch of other animals that might scare kitty even more. text:
My latest rescued senior Chihuahua Jack had a swollen face on the left side. A bad tooth and an abscess were giving him so much pain . I called 5 animal hospitals around the area in Montgomery. Jack travels with me cross country in a semi truck. It's very difficult to find kind people who understand our problems. It starts with parking the rig and ends withdelivering on time.
Dr. Hasting took us in right after lunch. Late afternoon Jack had a dental cleaning, 3 teeth removed and his nails clipped, and he was back with his family in the late afternoon. How, that was more than I expected. Dr. Hasting and his assistant did a great job. We long haul truck driver never stay very long at the time at one place. Thank you for your understanding and help.

Not once did they take her temperature or run tests of any kind except for parvo. No one even looked at her or would tell me what type of mange or why she had diarrhea. Never going back.

Jobies jaw was broken in 3 places.
His canine tooth along with the 2 nearby teeth were snatched out along with the JAW BONE they were attached too.

These wonderful people took such wonderful care of him and us as dogie parents.he was in shock.
They acted quickly with shots for pain & to sedate him. An i v and watched him over night.
He was routed to a wonderful canine vet in mobile and is hapoy and healthy now.
Thanks to this wonderful staff at Loxley animal hospital

text: They are super sweet and always take great care of my babies.  VERY reasonably priced too!

name: Karen Shelton
text: Love Mitchell Animal Clinic! They always remember us and our puppies, even if we only go to our annual check-ups. They don't unnecessarily pressure you to come in when you call for advice, frequently giving you an "over-the-counter" solution. If you're into essential oils, they also know which ones will help your critter. They also try to find the most economic options when dealing with a problem, such as offering the generics and not upselling you on the name brand. Don't let the small size deter you, because you will get the best personalized care anywhere.

name: Missy Glibbery
text: We absolutely love Mitchell Animal Clinic! Dr. Mitchell is one of the sweetest veterinarians we have met who truly cares for your furbabies as much as you do! Maggie is also amazing and so kind over the phone and in person. Our pup is so nervous and anxious away from us but they both gave us comfort knowing that our baby would be well taken care of and loved! We have struggled for a while trying to find the best fit for our boy, and someone who would listen and work with us rather than against us. We are so glad we found them and don't even hesitate the hour drive to the clinic! Absolutely highly recommend them for your furbabies care!! Will not see anyone else!

name: Karl Grimm
text: Don't go anywhere else.   Dr. Mitchell is wonderful.  Nice to be taken care of so well.   Not just a number, treated like a family member.

name: Judith
text: Dr. Mitchell is by far the best vet I have ever used in 30+ years of pet ownership!  He was always generous with his time, not only in caring for my pets, but in giving me detailed explanations of what was going on with them and how to care for them after the visit. When my dog was in the clinic for a few days over the holidays, both Dr. Mitchell and Maggie called with updates, even during off-hours.  They always made themselves available for last-minute appointments and emergencies.  Great prices too.

name: Danny Martin
text: Dr. Mitchell is a very nice veterinarian. He did a very thorough job of looking at my cat. All my pets will be going there from now on!

name: Kat Cline
text: Very friendly; answers all your questions. Didn't rush me and has never rushed me when I've been looking for help. Very happy to find a holistic-oriented vet in the area.

name: Andy Huber
text: Fast, friendly, and professional. These folks definitely care about what they do and how they can help!

name: Abigail Schnauzer
text:
After moving to this area, it took my going to 3 other vets before finding the EXCELLENT Dr. Mitchell.  I felt at home the first time I walked in the door.  He gives each of my dogs individual care. He is knowledgeable on a variety of canine areas, including behaviors.  Mrs. Mitchell also works at the clinic and I love the way she staggers appointments, so never find myself trying to manage my dogs in a waiting area full of snapping other dogs and cats.

It took me 5 unpleasant years with other vets until my groomer recommended Dr. Mitchell.  It was worth the wait to find him and his wife.  I tell everyone I know he is the best vet in the area.

name: betty bell
text: Dr. Mitchell is very kind and gentle with his patients.  He takes the time to explain what's going on with your pet which makes it easy to decide what direction to go with treatment.  He treats his "patient's" owners with respect and doesn't think any question isn't important.  I value and appreciate his professionalism and kindness and do not hesitate to recommend whenever I can.

name: Tina Divincenti
text: They take care of your fur babies like their own.

name: Arlene Dean
text:
This clinic became primary care for our pets immediately after moving to the area due to its location.  On the first visit the building & room seemed a bit unclean but the veterinarian, Dr. Mitchell, was so kind and helpful. He even resolved the ear infection our pet was having.
His assistant was a bit brash & clearly stated to me how things work "in the South".  I let it go thinking she would warm up to us as time went by & we visited with our other pets.
Two months later our eldest canine, 17 yrs old, was having issues & nearing the end.  No longer able to get food or liquids into him, I contacted this vet during business hours but there was no answer.  I then called their emergency number at which time the assistant answered and said "please hold" without asking my name or issue.  The emergency number has an area code of 251 (which at this time is not provided on their voice message).  A few minutes went by & I stated our issue. She told me they couldn't fit our 17 yr. canine's emergency into the "schedule" for that day because they were all booked up.  "No openings" she said. Even worse, she didn't refer me to any other veterinarian or emergency clinic for him.
We did find another clinic that day that welcomed us with open arms. Unfortunately our dog did pass away that same day.  We were devastated. I would like to add a side note is that we live near & drove by Mitchell Animal Clinic on our way to the other clinic & saw that Mitchell Animal Clinic was in fact not busy.
Again we loved our only visit with Dr. Mitchell as a non-emergent veterinarian but I simply cannot recommend this clinic due to the above other reasons.

name: LC Mitchell
text: Excellent clinic. The owners are very nice and take good care of your furry family members.

name: Kelly Armstrong
text: They fit our dog in the same day and she's doing much better now!

name: Debbie Paquette
text: Dr. Mitchell is great. Very happy with his time and concern about our little Yorkie.

name: Elizabeth Bush
text: They care for your pet as if it were theirs. Kind and gentle. Always a fantastic experience. I drive an hour to see them, passing many other vets, that should tell you something❤️

name: Keidrick Pettaway
text: Great vet, been taking my dog here for years!

name: David Yarbrough
text: A more caring and loving Vet I have never met.

name: invisible vengence visits
text: My Netherlands dwarf rabbit contracted flystrike. I found out around 7:00 P.M. My husband and I bathed him in hibicleanse (diluted.) and flushed areas with povidone-iodine solution. We both forced ourselves through the motions as it was something out of A nightmare. Started researching vets as soon as larvae stopped coming off him after about 4 baths. I knew he needed a vet who was articulated in exotic breeds. God told me to go with Mitchell animal clinic ( Yep.) Glad I listened He and his wonderful wife made no promises to me. Dr. Mitchell found 5 more larvae. 5 larvae could have devastated my sweet little guy. I was not pressured into anything fancy that I did not need. His wife scheduled us in that morning which time is paramount with rabbit flystrike. Gave Bunzie a schedule of antibiotics and he is resting now. I pray he will make a full recovery. As far as the service we received I would give it ten stars if I could...…..And I'm kind of mean so......Thank you Mitchell family.

name: janet bolen
text: Nicest people you will meet. Our family loves the Mitchell's.

name: SEL1391
text: We took our kitten to this vet and he was great with her! He treated her as his own and we loved it!

name: Laura V
text: I took my dog here when I got him neutered and that was only because of how close it is to my house. The vet was professional and personable, his staff on the other hand is not. The front desk lady is rude and had a nice nasty attitude with me over the phone today as I was calling to continue my business with them. I tried to call 3 different times on my lunch break and each time the line was busy so I decided I would call right when I got off. I called a few times because I am frantic trying to get my dog to see someone because I'm concerned. She made it apparent that the reason she didn't answer my call was because she was helping an elderly customer to their car...trying to make me feel bad for calling? Because I knew they closed at 5:30 and really needed to make an appointment for my sweet baby to get seen. Customer service is very important to me and that is something you will not receive at this office.

name: Christine Klingbeil
text:
I called to make a new puppy appt and I waited on hold patiently for about 5 to 10 mins.  The girl answers my call and I try to ask some questions about my puppy and she literally makes my appt then hangs up on me.  I understand you have calls coming in but I held and waited for my turn, you can have the decency to give me 3 mins for a few questions.  So I called back and canceled my appt.  She apologized but I will not go to a vets office that treats me that way just on the phone.
Learn how to have phone etiquette if that's what your job entails.
Also, treat people like people even when they're on the phone calling.  It's not hard to do that.
I heard good things about this vet and now I don't believe them.

name: Joey Newberry
text: Competative prices. Friendly people. In and out quickly. Says by appt but i have shown up before without one. Called in with symptoms my Bulldog had and able to go pick up med. He had a sinus infection. Cleared it right up. DR. Renfroe is super nice and all staff are very friendly. Hardly any wait time with appt. Recommend highly. As you can see Taz is under no stress at all when I tell him we are going to see DR. Renfroe ☺

text:
While we LOVE the veterinarian, none of his staff was wearing a mask when we arrived. I asked the vet tech if she was not wearing a mask because she didn't have one, or if it was by choice. She said she closes not to wear a mask.  I explained that I am immunocompromised and will not go into the small exam room with someone without a mask, his vet tech put in a mask to help administrator my dog's shots.

Not even the receptionist was eating a mask. I love the vet, but can't put my life at risk for the choices of his staff.

#MaskUpHuntsville

text: Dr Renfroe has been in the business a long time not just with your dogs and cats but birds and several small animals. He has treated my rabbits, dogs, and cats going directly to the source of the problem without trying to dollar out your visit like all the newcomer vets out there. You will pay for what your pet needs NOT his monthly quota!!! Very personable and my pets have all responded great to him. I must add he will work with you as a walk in should that be the case as I have showed up with two pick ups off the road in the past and he treated with no hesitation. Im with him as long as he continues to practice!

text: I have been to many different animal hospitals over the years, and Renfroe Animal Hospital is BY FAR the best! Dr. Renfroe is kind and professional and lets me ask questions without making me feel like I'm taking up his time. The staff is so friendly and helpful! I highly recommend!!

text: Mr.Renfroe I just wanted to say thank you for seeing my old boy today. His previous vet passed so i didn't know without all of his paperwork if anyone would see him but he did. Thank yall again yall are wonderful people.

name: Lewis Hundley
text: Dr. Renfroe has been our vet for over 22 years for 7 different dogs. From routine care to more complex problems he has always been exceptional. When we have to board our dogs we always board them here because we know they will be well cared for.  If you are looking for an experienced reasonably priced vet who will take exceptional care of your pets, there is none better than Dr. Renfroe. The staff here has also always been great. We drive all the way across town to continue to bring our dogs to Dr. Renfroe's office.
