From the receptionist to the techs and even the vet himself, I would recommend u all find another line of work bc none of u should be in this line. Shameful behavior.

name: Ginny Webb
text: We took are 11 week old Goldendoodle puppy here on a Saturday night due to her limping after hurting her foot early in the day.  They told us that her foot was broken and she would require 8 weeks of strict crate rest, only to come out to potty and we would need to carry her out and sit her down.  She came home sedated, in a cast, and wearing a cone.  I was so upset because she was only 11 weeks and I couldn't imagine 100% crating for 2 months.  I followed up with my vet on Monday only to find out that her foot was not broken.  And that it was just a shadow on the X-ray of her dew claw (thumb).  I don't usually post reviews, but this is unacceptable.  We were all traumatized over this diagnosis and in the end, our puppy was not injured at all.  So disappointing.

name: painted rats rattery
text:
AVOID THIS PLACE !!!!  READ ALL THE WAY.  THEY WILL SCAM YOU AND HOLD YOUR PET RANSOM!!!

We rushed our puppy to them last night due to excessive vomiting. We stayed for several hours. The younger lady at the front desk laughed at my puppy’s name, and did the same to another couple behind me . (Who where equally as stressed as me at the time.)
Not only that but I witnessed a vet tech throw a dying dog on the exam table aggressively, with no descentcy to shut the door . She then began screaming the owners name rudely to everyone . I finally reminded her that no one in here I’ve seen owns that dog . Later I find out it passed away, before  the owners could get there they again left the door wide open with zero consideration for those poor people .
So, now my dog is being seen . All of the vet techs where snarky, rude, and  ESPECIALLY unhelpful . The large Ogre of a woman especially . I suppose she had to make up for looks with a nastier attitude .
Anyway, my dog is taken from me. To the back, where I’ve seen multiple dead dogs and crying owners come from . She just takes him by the leash and leaves . My dog wasn’t returned until 3 hours later . The male vet comes in looked me up and down many times, side glanced my husband while talking to us, suggests my dog has parvo only bc of age . And walks out . A tech finally comes back in,  They where doing vitals on my pup in the back . Without any updates on him or letting me know where he was . They came up with a summary of 430$ for a X Ray, a parvo test, and a anti vomiting shot . We said that’s fine we will pay it, ( we-also called ahead of us arriving telling them we couldn’t pay it until tomorrow). And 30 minutes prior to our visit, they said that was perfectly fine . So now our dog can’t be treated bc our card didn’t activate until Monday . The larger tech snatched my estimate board from me and tells me to go to the front desk to apply for credit care . Which I didn’t approve bc I don’t have credit .
So they returned my dog AFTER we gave our card information “to make sure we pay .” THEN he is returned to me . We get home and my dog begins shaking again . Just as before we went to the vet. I call them upset wondering why we even went here, confused how we now owe almost 200$ for a shot . Why my dog to be held ransom from me while he is still in horrid condition . They refused to do any testing on him to find out what was wrong with him !!!!! I called again today to ask why my dog is drooling and what it could mean, the large tech answered and literally laughed on the phone with me, because I was Concerned about my pup . She laughs and goes “ I can’t say what drooling means, but can you find the money to come in and get him diagnosed now ?” Like ??? This place needs to be shut down !!!! I’ve never seen so many upset clients, dead dogs, and unsolved problems . The techs don’t know a single thing and should find another industry ! So ignorant !!! BEWARE!! It’s like they use your emoticons to get your money ..... SCAMMERS!!!!!!!

name: Fallon Phelps
text: I have to give a huge thanks to the ladies at this hospital.  My 7 week old puppy was very sick.  She tested positive for Parvo, which caught us by surprise. At first, we wanted to leave because we felt that Dr. Schussler (sry if that is spelled wrong) was rude and confused. We learned that she just has bad bed side manners but is a GREAT vet.  She has tended to my puppy for almost two weeks off and on and now my puppy is acting normal again, running around, eating and drinking on her own. This hospital saved my little girls life. I cannot thank them enough!!

name: Katie McClenny
text: I took my dachshund in because he was clearly in pain. Up all night, whining in pain, couldn't get comfy at all and very anxious. I was so pleased with how the nurses and doctor treated Rex. Very caring, very thorough. Doctor didn't stop examining him abd talking to us about him until he was satisfied he had solved the problem. Had a great experience. Abd they have a very caring staff.

name: Summer Geddings
text:
I don't mean to be rude an I am not one to complain, but this is the most incompetent place I have ever been.
My fiance was bitten by a stray dog and none of them seem to be able to tell me if the dog has been tested or if we should go ahead with the vaccine or really anything at all.
I have been told five different stories the five times I have called and no one seems to be able to give me a definite answer to something this serious.
I was even told that I was not allowed to know whether or not the dog (that bit my fiance!) Had rabies!
I keep getting bounced around on the phone, put on extremely long holds, and still haven't gotten any answers. It is ridiculous.
Rabies is 100% fatal and none of them are the least bit worried to help me and I could not be more frustrated.

name: Meagan Cagle
text: I came to the Emergency portion of this Vets office and it was TERRIBLE!!!!!!! WORST EXPERIENCE I’ve ever had at a vets office!!!! I was treated TERRIBLE, the staff was not kind to me once after I told them that I was going to have to keep things cost effective, and kept just saying that I could apply for a credit card when I was just trying to ask what options I had!!!! Treated me like I was a nothing but a bother!!!! $211 later and not even 1 hour there, I got nothing accomplished!!! NEVER taking my dogs back here again!!!!!

name: Brianna Eagle
text: I had my dog brought here she was pregnant and was losing her puppies they didn't even look at her and told me to go home well that night my dog took a turn for the worst and she started to go down hill extremely she fast she started puking and pooping blood I and when I brought her back and all the did was give her a shot and some pills for the puking. Finally after a couple more days I brought her back because she was already to far gone they put her down and told me I had to pay another 200 to even get her ashes. I had that dog since she was born and on October 26 2017 I was forced to put her down at the age of 1 1/2 years old. Never go here if you love your animals

name: Shaun Cee
text:
PLEASE DO NOT COME HERE!!

I was tricked into coming here out of fear! All they want is to turn a profit, not help out your animal. I had the worse experience bringing my 8 month 19lbs (that day) old puppy in for an upset belly.

It was Sunday and this was the only place in town open. Next time I am driving to which ever city has an open vet close by weather it be Atlanta, Tuscaloosa, Montgomery, Huntsville or even Nashville. It would have to be life or death for me to come back to this establishment. First of all this place was absolutly disgusting. There were numerous stains on floors, walls, and medical equipment.  I would have rather been seen in a fraternity house bathroom than one of these examining rooms!

Now the vet tech was amazing!She came in and had my puppy playing, rolling over for belly rubs, giving kisses to the tech, my puppy was in heaven! My vet tech was so helpful, professional, and educated I thought she was the vet! And to be honest I really wish she was! Everything was okay at this point other than the cleanliness.

But when this "Vet" walked in her energy was so negative I could sence it of course my dog did too. She took one look at my dog and kicled her foot in front of my dogs face and was shocked somehow when my dog did not like it. And didn't ask if she could mussle her just walked out and came back in with "muscle" a muzzle and a chocker collar!! My baby was terrified I should have walked out then and there! I have never seen an adult to bad with an animal in life let alone a vet.... I was so disappointed in the back of bedside manner this alone. But after only touching her belly for 10 seconds she asked no further questions, she suggested we ran some test and she scared me into it with an infomercial full of a 1000 was for my dog to die if I did not run these tests  IMMEDIATELY. Of course I pay what ever they want to run these life saving tests!

After a miserable 6 hours in the waiting room with chairs that dont have back reats in this filty vet after forking over $675.00 in testing. They now think it is a good idea to ask if I've changed her diet recently. I had and the smart ass response I got back had me appalled. This vet asked ME, why I hadnt brought that up sooner like she was paying me to find out what was wrong with my dog!!!!!!  Of course me not being the vet who appeared to be a doing this for 60 years plus now did not think to bring it up first thing. Before the tests were complete I was sent home and told just tonchange her food back. She was fine after changing her food back of course. Something a vet should have been able to tell me over the phone!

Safe to say you pay for testing up front. I was  beyond pissed!!!
Please do not make the same mistake I did!

name: Kelly H2O
text: we took our dog Bandit there to have some puncture wounds looked at.  It took a couple hours and the doctor and technician coming into our examination room then saying 'oh sorry . wrong room.'.  i told the tech that we gave Bandit a couple aspirin for pain so that she could let the doctor know. i wanted to prevent dr from giving meds that would interact negatively with the aspirin. she never told him. thank goodness he didn't give anything that would interact negatively.  When it was finally time to leave they had Bandit walk out on her own. she had puncture wounds on both legs and had one of her legs off the ground.  she probably didn't want to be walking on the other leg either. why didn't they carry her out to us? I noticed today that they cut her back dew claws and one of them is obviously cut past the quick. that must have been why I heard her crying at the clinic.  poor baby.  i always cut her dew claws. they didn't need to be cut.  that's negligence.

name: Daniel Remke
text: Sadly my families 14 year old dog got ran over and we were rushing him to the clinic and I called to see if they could meet us outside to get him and one of the workers answered the phone and I told her what happened and she responded with oh ok well when you get here bring him inside ok? See ya then. I was like really when I hung up I say she should be fired.

name: Brent Glover
text: To my pregnant girl in in active labor after the first pup was born dead. They immediately took her back and a vet came to talk to me a few minutes later. I was adamant about the need and desire for a cesarean section and cost was not an issue. 30 minutes later someone else comes out with a $2000 estimate and I assume once I agree and sign they are going to do the surgery to try and save the puppies... Boy was I wrong about 2 hrs later the vet comes out and tells me that they started fluids and got a catheter in and they will do.the surgery in about an hour.....and do I want them to spay her while they are at it. This is an AKC show dog that I have invested a lot 9f money testing and showing and breeding no i didn't want her spayed.  What I wanted was for them to save the puppies.... which didn't happen cuz they waited too long. Never never trust these people to know what a real emergency is.

name: Jeff Lentz
text:
this is a terrible terrible place

took my dog here and the first thing they do is charge 750 in order to do any tests. we even told them we think it was pancreatitis. they could not find out the problem so it was 750 wasted because we took her to another vet and within 30 minutes they knew what it was.

avoid this place no matter what, even if it late at night JUST WAIT TIL MORNING and go somewhere else.

name: Jacqueline Dorris
text: Horrible experience! Lots of money spent with what could have been a google diagnosis! Staff was rude when we walked in. Vet was rude and seemed uncaring. I wouldn’t even use this place as a last resort - they don’t care about your pet, they make it known they care just for your money!

name: A H
text: I'm a little shocked at how many negative reviews are on here... even a few recent ones. We had no issues at all when we took our dog to have surgery when she tore her ACL. Dr. Ballagas was wonderful! He was very nice and extremely informative. He drew out a picture to show us exactly what he did during surgery and explained everything in detail. I really think we lucked out and got one of the best vets there. Both receptionists were very nice. They called after surgery and let us know that everything went fine. We didn't have to wait long at all taking her or picking her up. Yes it's pricy but I expected that. I mean.. It is an Emergency vet. $3400 for surgery for a 150lb pit bull. And the doctor found that she actually tore her other ACL, so we'll be back for another $3400. Overall, we were very pleased!

name: Amanda Etheridge
text: I guess this place is ok in a pinch, but if I have an option of going somewhere else, I will. They know absolutely NOTHING about rodents. I called them once when one of our rats was doing very poorly and I was worried about her. They told me no one there knew how to treat rats and they refused to let me bring her in. I was astonished! How could they just turn away a sick animal like that? She could have died! And another time I had to practically BEG them to see my hamster when she was extremely ill over the Christmas holiday and our regular vet clinic was closed, and they agreed to see her only after I told the receptionist that Dr. Atlas at Riverview is our usual vet and that I would call him at home (at midnight!) and ask if he would call the Emergency Clinic and advise them on how to treat my hamster. Then we finally get there, an older female vet nearly had a heart attack when she roughly reached into the box where my hamster was and scared her, making her squeak very loudly and flip on her back in a defensive posture. (Hamsters only do that when they feel very threatened. I'd never seen this hamster do that before.) The vet jerked her hand back in fear, and looked extremely uncomfortable. I ended up removing my hamster from the box, wrapping her in a cloth and handing her to the vet, who then left the room with her for almost 20 minutes, which made me very uncomfortable. I've never had a vet leave the room with my animal before, I like to be there for the exam & diagnosis. But anyway, she gave us enough medicine to get us through 2 days until we could see our regular vet. So if I have a choice, I will definitely NOT be going here anytime soon.

name: Latrice D (Dr. A)
text: My fiancé and I brought our puppy here one night because he was extremely sick. He was given to us and after one week, we noticed our dog's change in behavior and decided to bring him this place. Long story short, this is the WORST place to bring your animal. The women behind the desk are extremely rude and unprofessional. The doctor was just okay, however, she was nonchalant about our situation. We spent over $800 for 3 hrs for NOTHING! We had to take our dog to another vet that was an additional $400 but he got the job done. The people at this place only want your money and they don't care about the health of your loved one.

name: Tom Gary
text: We took our 11 yr shih Tzu in for elevated white blood count.  He had been to our local vet. and was given shots and meds to take to no avail.  Dr.Lothrup and his staff could not have been more  professional amd and informative.  He did blood work,  a body scan and other tests to complete his physical.  We were extremely pleased. I definitely recommend them.  They will tell what's wrong with your pet instead of guessing.

name: Becky Bowie
text: They need to change the name since they no longer take emergencies

name: Emtz Mtz
text: My daughter took her dog because he was throwing up blood. vital signs didnt show anything so they want to keep the dog for test and xrays (very expensive over night stay they quoted to cost between $1100-$2100 just to see if they can find anything....so it doesnt include the treatment....it seem a little high... i wonder if there is anybody out there they can tell us if we are wasting our money or recommend somewhere else..you think they can have results of blood work in minutes now like a regular doctor.....thanks.I will keep up updated.....

name: Lynda
text: I have taken my chihuahua to Dr. Gibbons, via a referral from our Vet, so we had confidence in her. This has been three years ago, took my dog back about a month ago. She diagnosed dry eye, along with the original diagnosis of glaucoma. Her blinking eyes never got better, so we made another appointment, but it was a week away. I looked on the internet and found there was another vet in town that cared for eyes. WOW! Glad I did! She had been treating her for a problem she DID NOT have! This new doctor, did a test she said that Dr. Gibbons did not do, and she really did not think she had glaucoma. She is now off the meds! Dr. Gibbons did also treat her for an ulcer, so I think that her pressure was high because of that, but I am glad I took her to someone else. I really like Dr. Jana Korsch-Dismukes. Glad we have two eye specialist in Birmingham

name: Candy Medina
text: Very over priced and take more exams than they need.. if you love your dog don't being him/her here they just want $$$.

name: brianjennster
text:
STAY FAR FAR AWAY FROM THIS PLACE ! ! !
Paid over $400 for unnecessary botched work, then they did not take responsibility when confronted.
Will NEVER go back to these clowns-

name: Karen McKay
text: Racket, save your money-STAY AWAY! Didn't help my poor sick dog wanted money left and right

name: David Summerford
text: This place was terrible. I took my dog in for a very minor problem at 7pm and it took until 9pm to get the issue resolved. On top of that, the work that was done was absolutely terrible. I will never go back to this establishment and you should not go to this establishment either. DONT GO HERE!!!

name: Eric Jones
text: Had a very sick dog and looked for a 24 vet hospital.  From what I read this place only wants money and could care less of your pet.  I think I'll just take chance and take my pet to normal vet in the morning.   Thanks for the reviews

name: Amanda Scheffer
text: Wouldn't provide care to my animal.

name: Anna Harmon
text: Extremely expensive

name: William Lock
text: Really appreciate the opportunity to speak with the veterinarian about our Maggie health. He explained her issue and was able to help her feel better.

name: Curtis Acton
text: My puppy's love this clinic, Even kitty don't mind it clean. People are very nice and very friendly.

name: Baylie Payne
text: My husband and I just moved to the Wetumpka area a few months back from Prattville. We were going out of town for a few days and needed a place to board our Aussie and Mal-Shi. We tend to do our research when using a new animal clinic so we turned to Google and Facebook to find a highly rated animal boarding facility to take our babies to. I called over a week before our trip to schedule their boarding at Castaway Animal Clinic after seeing their reviews, and the receptionist was friendly and answered all I’ve my overbearing pet parent questions. We were looking forward to going to the facility. Upon arrival on drop off day, we called to let them know we had just arrived on Saturday, but no answer because they are closed on the weekends and only have someone there for drop off and feeding. The lady that we handed our dogs off to seemed extremely rushed to get the dogs inside the facility. We did not get to go inside, although I asked if I could take my dogs in. With COVID-19, I didn’t see this as a real problem, but did feel a bit disappointed that I didn’t get to say goodbye to them before they were hauled away. The lady then proceeds to say that she remembers my dogs from a previous visit to castaway and I reassured her that she couldn’t possibly because this is their first time there. She laughed and says “oh okay.” Then she hands me paperwork to just sign that she gave me no real time to read or put notes on because she was frantically trying to push us out to get to the next customer. I had treats and their dog food still in my hands along with my dogs shot records that she would’ve never gotten had I not spoken up. I left feeling very uneasy about the drop off process and wanted to turn around after we left to go back and get them, but my husband helped calm my nerves with, “well, maybe she was just having a busy morning.” I calmed down and we left for our trip. Because they were closed the next day, I decided to call on Monday morning to check in and see how they did throughout the weekend with no answer. I sent an email and they finally called me about an hour later. Dixie (the receptionist) assured me my dogs were doing fine and I felt much better about the situation. Then, the weather where we were staying on our trip began to get pretty bad and we decided to leave on Monday evening instead of Tuesday. I called Castaway and told them about the change in our plans. I spoke with Dixie again and she said they they would have their baths and nails clipped on Tuesday morning and would call me as soon as I could come and get them. Tuesday morning comes and goes and I finally decide to call around 12:00. They tell me they had their baths, but had not been dried because other dogs took precedent over mine and I can come pick them up at 3:00. The receptionist I spoke with this time was Sarah. I asked if she would call me if they get done any earlier and she very rudely says, “like I said, it will be 3:00 unless you’d like to pick them up when they’re still wet.” I reluctantly said, “okay, thanks,” and she hung up. I decided then that I didn’t want to leave my dogs there until 3, so my husband and I hit the road to go pick them up. When we arrived, It looked as if my Aussie had her bath and she smelled of shampoo but wasn’t completely dry. I was fine with this because we decided not to wait until 3:00, but my Mal-Shi was clearly unbathed as he didn’t smell like shampoo (in fact, he stunk), his eyes and mouth were filthy, but he had a wet head. I believe when they heard us come in, they wet the top of his head to make it look like he had been bathed so that the receptionist didn’t look like a liar because they didn’t expect us to come that early. Regardless, if that’s how they do their baths, I would’ve been very disappointed at 3:00.  All in all, we had a horrible first impression that led to the worst boarding experience we’ve ever had and there’s no way my two dogs will ever return to Castaway Animal Clinic. We would much rather risk the inconvenience and travel further than go back.

name: Karen Carter
text: Excellent care for my horse...came to my barn and did everything the horse needed! Thanks!

name: Georgia Dennett
text: Everyone here is so nice and professional.  They take amazing care of my dogs. They are both my dogs vet and I have boarded both my dogs here.

name: Claire Wilson
text: Compassionate, professional, and responsive. Highly recommend.

name: Tim Robinson
text: Great place for getting pets the help they need great staff of people

name: sherri griswold
text: Dr Randy and his staff take care of my horses and barn cats. He always fully explains his diagnoses and treatment plans and educates me so I can take good care of my animals myself. He's always available when I need him, either in person or on the phone. His rates are fair, and he does not recommend unnecessary treatment. I'm glad he's my vet.

name: Miranda L
text: We love everyone at Castaway!  Amazing staff, very responsible pricing and you can tell they truly love what they do and love the animals they treat. I can’t say enough good things about them!!

name: Lorraine Pruitt
text: They had us in and out in no time. Made you feel at home.

name: Sandy Howard
text: Have been using Dr. Randy for many years. He has treated many of our farm animals and is very knowledgeable and friendly.

name: Stacy Boardwine
text: Doctors and staff are very welcoming, knowledgable, friendly, and caring. Have used Dr. Randy and his staff for both my large animal and small animal health care needs for many years; it is always an easy and pleasant experience for both myself and my animals. Highly recommend this vet and his team!

name: Tony Studdard
text: Always friendly, with exceptional service and care.

name: Shannon Filyaw
text: This clinic is awesome! They care so much for your animals and the owners. I recommend them to all my friends! They go above and beyond! Check them out!

name: Tina Renee
text: I am very comfortable with thier professionalism and quality of care.

name: Castaway Animal Clinic
text: Good people doing good things!  Nowhere I would rather work

name: Chris Sears
text:
I've taken my dog and cat here a few times for flea meds and other minor needs, since it is the closest. But after a few negative experiences, I will no longer be supporting this animal clinic. In all fairness, Dr. Randy was very kind and knowledgeable. One of the receptionists, on the other hand, has been rude and impolite almost every time I have interacted with her. I also feel that they are quick to push unnecessary and costly procedures onto their customers.
The last time I took my dog there, they convinced me she needed many tests and services, totaling over $450. when I asked about the bill, (which included an ultrasound that the doctor told me he would not charge for since it was an incomplete test) the receptionist acted in immediate defense of the high price, and implied that I was being cheap. I then took my dog to our home vet for a second opinion, and asked that Castaway forward the test results to them. When I got to my home vet, the nice receptionist there told me that the girl at castaway complained to her that they were "stealing her customer", when she called to inquire about the test results, (which were never sent, by the way).
My home vet felt of my dog's belly, and told me the same thing that castaway did. For the price of an office visit. This is why I will no longer support this clinic. Don't let the low-price office visits fool you. They have higher prices on services and medications than surrounding vets, and in my experience, attempt to push gratuitous extras.

name: Paul Bridgman
text: Really caring people. I'm very happy to have found them. Dr Randall and is staff are great!!!

name: Chelle 73172
text: Always friendly and down to earth and compassionate.

name: Ashley Sanford
text: Great vet to take your animal to

name: Dorothy Poulson
text: Very friendly people that work at castaway and very affordable I would recommend to anyone they took care of my far baby’s for me when I went on vacation

name: Candice Gulley
text: We are not only blessed to have a quality affordable veterinary clinic in our community, but we have a veterinarian who supports his community.  We are proud to have Dr. Randy as a friend and supporter of the Tallapoosa County Girls Ranch!

name: Michael McGrady
text: Caring people who are always ready to help.

name: Susia Stiffler
text: Very friendly  they love all pets

name: Linda Macom
text: Great with our dogs, cats and cows. Very caring and knowledgeable.

name: John Battle
text: Rescued a dog ...and brought her to them and they took care of it like they would there own dog...

name: Ginny Martin Royal
text: The staff and Doctors are very caring and go the extra mile for our animals.  We board our pets here when we leave town, and we know they are in good hands.  They will come in when their closed for emergencies and they take the time to explain what's going on with your pet.

name: JL New
text: Very friendly,  professional and courteous. They treated my dog really well and were very compassionate when I had to put 2 if my cats to sleep. (Both cats were over 16 years old.)

name: Covenant Farm
text: Appreciate a responsive vet and a friendly staff who is accommodating.

name: Kim Griffith
text: The people here are wonderful. I use them for my animals for all things: yearly checkups, emergencies, boarding, grooming, bathing & all preventative services such as flea, tick, & heart worms. They are so good to send me reminders so my animals are always up to date. They didn't even blink an eye when I carried our guinea pig in to have her nails clipped. Ever tried to cut something's toe nails that didn't want it done & isn't afraid to bite you with her 4 big sharp front teeth? I left it up to The Experts!

name: Debby Hadden
text: The most amazing people, I can not find words to express the love and compassion they have for animals and there families. I would never take my pets anywhere else. Small piece of heaven.

name: Connie L
text: Great place to take pets for everything they need. Friendly knowledgeable staff. Also have a great groomer and boarding facility.

name: Ruth Ellis
text: The staff is always wonderful and helpful.  The doctors are very caring and knowledgeable.

name: Stephanie Dinsmore
text: Caring and kind staff, the Dr took the time to explain things.

name: Sharon Schultz
text: We love the staff at Castaway.  So kind and helpful.

name: Buford Strength
text: Great people, Dr. Randy has helped me out several times with my cows, all the folks at the clinic are friendly and helpful

name: Sandra Phillips
text: Dr Randy and staff are the best, they are very caring and knows so much that I couldn't know they explain things so you can understand what  is happening to your for baby. The only place I take my animal's

name: Charlene Rallo
text: Great vet, very caring staff.

name: lisa culligan
text: Great Drs large and small animal

name: James Watkins
text: Receptionist was rude

name: CF Warr
text: Wonderful vet and staff

name: george williams
text: Large animal specialists

name: Jamal Goodman
text: Great people

name: Pamela Hodgkins
text: Very friendly

name: Leonard Eckles
text: I travel for work and they were able to fit me in and take care of my pet. Very friendly and helpful. All around great experience and price.

name: Vanessa Meares
text: Dr. Ashwander is amazing! He has amazing bed side manner. So sweet to the animals and pet parents. He has many years experience and will do all you can to help your furbabies.

name: Gayla Kiernan
text: They are the best ever. They are so kind and affordable. I can't thank them enough.

name: Tonia Lann
text: He is a wonderful vet!!  I am going to have to make the hard decision to put my dog down and he is the only one I will trust!

name: angelia partain
text: Such a good person and truly looks out for the best for my Ms. Shelby

name: Candi Morgan
text: I, we, have used Dr. Ashwander for 20 plu years and NEVER ONCE HAVE WE EVER HAD A PROBLEM‼ Excellent staff as well‼ I will forever use Dr Ashwander ‼

name: Davina Patterson
text: Took our baby in due to a bad tooth and a cough. Had our wonderful vet send records to this vet. He did an amazing job as far as the tooth problem. He prescribed him some cough pills which didnt help at all. If he read the records from previous vet he would have known. Here it is 2 weeks later and he refused to write the cough meds that helped him from the other vet. He has a collapsed trachea which is very painful. Vet said the meds had a narcotic in it. Who cares this is our baby suffering and he wanted to give him vitamins. Thank God we found an amazing vet to take care of him so we can all get some sleep.

name: Noah R.
text:
Great staff! Friendly and always helpful every time I come to see them.

I can tell that they really have a passion for taking care of animals.

name: Teresa Greene
text: Dr. Ash is a wonderful vet and is very knowledgeable. He has treated our dog and 3 cats. His staff is very friendly and always accommodating to us and the needs of our pets. I highly recommend his vet services.

name: Lucy Carr
text:
Dr A. Is awesome. Shows so much compassion.
He always has his patient’s best in mind.

name: Charlotte Moncrief
text: Terrific vet! Really knows his work. Always allows me to go in with my animals to help hold them or just watch. That means a lot to me because I know that the test was conducted and how on my animal. Always gives good advice.

name: Angel
text: I appreciate the experience Dr. Ashwander has as well as his commitment to the community.

name: Lydia Jones
text: Dr. Ashwander has always been attentive to my animals! I wouldn't take my fur babies to any other vet!

name: Miranda Miranda
text: My husband's parents used to bring their dog here years ago. We have been taking our cat for two years now, ever since she was kitten. We take our 3 senior dogs there as well. Dr Ashwander and his staff is knowledgeable and experienced. Small, loving office that takes great, straight-forward care of our fur-babes.

name: Regan Bell
text: I would not take my animals to anyone else. Dr. Ashwander listens and does what’s needed in order to get my fur babies well.

name: Debra Caldwell
text: Ok

name: David Patterson
text: New here and we took our dog to them. He has a collapsed trachea and the only thing that helps him is a prescription cough medication.  We had his records sent to this "vet" and he refused to give it to him. He suggested (Vitamins). Our dog is suffering until we can get him to a real Vet.

name: Emma-Glenn Roby
text: I love this place i’m coming here my whole life and I love it the service is nice they’re all nice and it is such a wonderful place highly recommended!

name: Pam Young
text: There is NOT ANOTHER vet I would take my fur babies too. I absolutely love Dr.Ash and his staff. I have moved from the Morgan county area and I still make the hour trip to see the the best vet in Morgan county.

name: George Johnson
text: Very good doctor.  Place is kinda run down, but that's because they've been around so long.

name: jay Roberts
text: They take unnecessary advantage of people.

name: Blake Singleton
text: Wonderful! Always friendly. Had to have emergency surgery on my yorky and they did a fantastic job. Always helpful. Highly recommend.

name: Kyle Cottingham
text: Highly recommend using Dr. Ashwander as your vet. He saved my Aunt's Second oldest inside fur baby.

name: Susan Stubbs
text: The Dr there is a very very caring vet he is awesome

name: Deborah Walker
text: They have taken great care of all our cats - Bela, Candy, Merlin. Tory (RIP), Boop, and Dinah.

name: David Graham
text: Dr. Ashwander is very nice and very good with our animals. The staff is always very accommodating and helpful.

name: Ella Wolf Alpha
text: Best veterinarian and staff in the world!

name: Jessica Harrelson
text: Dr Hendrix is hands down the best Vet I have ever been too! He’s caring, professional and just all around a wonderful human!! Highly recommend Dr Hendrix!

name: Brian Padgett
text: Very knowledgeable and friendly staff.

name: Deaunqua Bryant
text: Dr. Donaldson is one of the best and most professional veterinarians in the wiregrass area. He has helped me take care of my last five dogs I love this practice.  You can't go wrong at Animal Health Center.

name: J H
text: Always a great experience

name: Larze
text: Excellent institution

name: Hannah Parker
text: Dr. Hendrix is the best vet in the Wiregrass. Hands down. I have taken my dogs to many different vets across AL, TN, and VA, and while some were good and some were bad, Animal Health Center is the best vet I have ever been to. I recommend them whole heartedly. The staff LOVE my dogs and are very friendly to me also. No questions are unanswered and I never feel rushed. Need a vet? You found it.

name: It's Me
text: Dr. Hendrix save both my dogs lives.  He skipped his lunch so I could rush in my dog. AWESOME staff

name: Amanda Allums
text: I wish there were a negative star for this rating. I took my maltese to get groomed at Donaldson's and I am very NOT happy! I specifically said that I wanted my dog's fur to be trimmed just a little and they did just the opposite. Her fur (what's left) is all gaped up, bald spots, and the scissor work is terrible! I have never wrote a review, but for the money I paid there is no reason to get this kind of result.

name: Della Fuller
text: I had to ask repeatedly to see the boarding kennels that my pet was staying in. Every prior visit was under Covid restrictions, and no one was allowed in the building. Finally a tech allowed me to look thru a window. I had to ask for my blanket when picking up one of my pets, and my leftover food was not returned back to me. The charges were ridiculously high.

name: Susan Grace
text: All staff I encountered were so helpful and friendly. This is definitely my boarding choice when I attend the annual AKO reunion in Opelika. I know my sweet dog receives lots of TLC including the turn down service for which I gladly pay a little extra.

name: Fern Compton
text: Very helpful, specially how many times we had to cancel dates because our move dates kept changing. We appreciate your ability to help us. The animals came back happy and healthy. Thank you.

name: Shawna Bell
text: We were referred to Goodwin when we began to look for another  Veterinarian to work with our rescue, The Shire Rescue & Sanctuary, Inc. We are beyond pleased and blessed to have found such an awesome clinic. Dr. Faqua and the staff are amazing. I know that our seniors will be well taken care of here. I highly recommend other rescues to add them to their network of Vet services. You will not be disappointed!

name: Capricia Devoe
text: Our Pekingese is the first dog in our family and let me say Goodwin Animal Hospital and Pet Resort has been heaven sent.. all of my questions that I feel like I should know they reassure me and keep our baby in tip top shape!! My first experience in boarding they sent me pictures and updates daily.. I couldn’t ask for a better vet because they make us feel like family!!

name: Gayle Oden
text: My dog loves the Day Care. The staff is friendly. We also use the vet's there who are very caring and helpful in taking care of my baby.

name: Amy Jones
text: My fur baby loves going to their doggie daycare! They post pictures every day so you can see you dog in action too. He’s always so exhausted on the car ride home and is always excited to go again the next morning. It’s fairly priced and the staff is so nice. I would highly recommend them!

name: Erika Poikey
text: I've recently switched vet offices and now I'm SO HAPPY with my choice! Awesome service, on time, very consistent and explained everything to be very well. Highly recommend!

name: Rett McGowin
text: Dr. Katie, and Ashley, and the receptionist were awesome! Kudos to all!

name: Kristina Stephens
text: The staff is always so friendly and helpful. I travel a hour just to keep my dog with familiar faces who know his issues and take special care of him.

name: Linda Fuqua
text: Great professional staff and a very clean environment !

name: Mike Bradley
text:
Update June 2021. I am still happy with staff however I would definitely compare prices when it comes to over the counter meds.  I could of saved $60.00 by going with Amazon. Dasuquin $33.02 on Amazon,  $94.00 at Goodwin.
I find the staff polite and professional.  The staff truly seems to care about my dog.  I would,  however,  be pleased to see a report on how my dog faired during his boarding.  Did he eat? How did he interact with others?  For the money I spend on boarding a report would be appreciated.  Thank you.

name: Kris Lynch
text:
I can’t even begin to thank this Hospital enough.
We came in as an emergency while traveling for work.
Dr. FIelds met us in the lobby, and immediately made us feel at ease.
From the front desk staff, to the techs, to the Dr, everyone was so so nice !!
After an initial exam and xrays, we received the diagnosis of a torn ACL.
Dr Fields took the time to explain all of our options.
We scheduled her surgery the following Friday 7/5/2019
We drove 5 hours back to this hospital for her surgery !!
We dropped her off, I cried , they reassured me, and we left her in their capable hands .
Stephanie called me immediately following her surgery with an update and we returned the next morning to pick her up.
I’m so completely impressed with this hospital !!!
We will return with the rest of our pack, if the need should arise !!

name: Gayle Cowan
text: Hobo had a wonderful stay. Plenty of love and attention. Thank you! We will be back

name: Dominque Torres
text: Goodwin Animal Hospital and Pet Resort has been our vet family since 2015.  We have always appreciated the sincere kindness and professionalism of the staff, amazing medical care and outstanding facilities.  Most recently my two French Bulldogs were scheduled for grooming and at the last minute I asked if they could get their annual exams completed and stay overnight.  Aliyah was wonderful with arranging our boarding accommodations and scheduling exams and documenting information in their records.  I received two calls from physicians, one after their initial exam and she thoroughly explained everything to me and offered to complete dental cleanings for them.  She was able to get them scheduled and completed as soon as possible.  Additionally, they now offer a turn down service where my babies were provided a walk and cuddles in the middle of the night.  With service like this, I am completely at ease leaving my babies with the Goodwin family.  Thank you so much for the amazing job you did.  I genuinely appreciate it.  Sincerely, Dominque Torres, Mom of Weezy and Lu Lu

name: bill crowder
text: the people that work there make this a great place   we have been so happy with them    our 16 week old lab loves to go there     i would recommend Goodwin Animal to anyone

name: Tori W
text: Originally we took our pup to a different vet bc they also boarded. Recently I took a tour after hearing several positive comments about Goodwin & I was blown away! Zoe did my tour & was fantastic. She answered all my questions & concerns. I immediately booked my dogs next boarding reservation here. They have an indoor salt pool, which is also is solar heated in the winter months! That's right, check out my pics, you can see the doggie hotels from the lobby. They also have separate entrances for dogs & cats. The back play area has astroturf so you don't have to worry about allergies.

name: Tiffany Williams
text: The staff was very helpful and pleasant and assisted me with getting my pup all squared away for his stay!!!

name: Shannah Bonner
text: Always great service! My pet gets the best care at Goodwin, which is why I keep going back.

name: Brittani Franklin
text: Everyone here is so wonderful. Have yet to have a bad experience ❤️

name: Peggy Haveard
text: Our pets had a wonderful stay!! The staff is always caring and professional.

name: Ronnie Poole
text: Very good experience the veterinarian was very professional and answered all of our questions.

name: Karin Hager
text: Our dogs absolutely love going here for boarding and even general vet visits!

name: Leila Cockerel
text: We just recently moved to Alabama and we already love Goodwin Animal Hospital.  Dr Fields is an intelligent and caring Veterinarian.  Also, his team was extremely helpful and friendly.  They took such great care of my dog and while we were there, they were able to get my dog's yearly vaccinations and examination.  Thank you Dr. Fields for being so nice, helpful, and flexible during our first visit.  Highly recommended.

name: Lance Neven
text: I keep asking my dog how it went, but she’s not talking right now.

name: Janice Norman
text: I am always pleased with the care my pet gets. The staff "goes the extra mile" to make my pet feel loved and comfortable. I cannot imagine leaving my pet any other place.

name: Sky G
text:
Absolutely, hands down, the BEST veterinary staff on the planet.

I will drive from 4 states away to keep coming back here.

name: Nina P
text: The whole team is amazing!  Super friendly, warm, and courteous.  They put my mind at ease every time I board my pup there.  Any issues that may arise, they let me know immediately.  Thank you!!

name: Brittany Graves
text: Great service and friendly staff.

name: Dawn McCoy
text: I had an emergency call with my cat late at night. And they still took him in. They are so nice and professional with him. I am glad they were honest when they could not find out what was wrong with him. But Dr. Kallam was so determined to help him she figured out the probably cause. Im following her instructions and he is all ready improving. Definitely bringing my baby's back to her.

name: Chris Bennett
text: Everyone is very friendly and helpful.  Never had a bad experience.

name: Kay Ware
text: Dr. Fuqua is the best veterinarian.  So compassionate. Our dog Banjo has loved her from day 1. Just like M.D’s, not all veterinarians are alike. When you find a great one, stick with them. We love Dr. Fuqua. Wish we could take her with us to Louisiana. I highly recommend her and this clinic.

name: Andrew Moulton
text: Everyone is always so kind and helpful. They treat my animals like they would their own, and genuinely care. I wont go anywhere else.

name: Stephanie Enloe
text: We love Goodwin Pet Resort for boarding our dog. He is always happy to be dropped off and the staff are incredibly sweet to us and to the pup. Our puppy always leaves with a wagging tail, well fed and hydrated, and overall happy! We would highly recommend them for boarding!

name: Jim Sheppard
text:
Had to make an after hours visit to clinic on Saturday for our aging cat, Missy.  Both Dr. Rigsby and the tech Ashley, were personable, helpful and very kind to Missy.  We spent waaay too much money, but felt it worth the cost to get Missy some relief from her ailment.  We have used the Goodwin clinic on Atlanta Highway for several years and have never failed to get excellent, caring service.

Have recommended you to several friends over the years and will continue.

name: Susie Pang
text: My two pups love it there!

name: Lisa Steadman
text: Everyone was amazing from the time we walked in.  This was our first visit as we are new to area.  Dr. Fields was great as well as his assistant (I cannot remember her name).  What an amazing practice!

name: Marie Mcgarry
text: Great place and it's nice and clean, great people/staff and they sure do care about your furr babies did not expect for a follow up call to check on our Little "Tank".  First visit and I'm glad i choose the right place, always check for a google reviews. Highly recommend it to everyone, you won't be disappointed on your first visit, Trust me.

name: bridgette jarry
text:
I really love taking My Maltese Lucky here.
They are really nice and take really good care of my pet.

name: Marina Ford
text: Dr. Jane Snead was awesome in an online consultation (my girl had an abscess, she's all good now). Thank you.

name: Jeffrey Jernigan
text: The vet is the sweetest the technician was great and all around good place to take your fur babies.

name: Dani's Do's and Don'ts
text: Dr. Fields and all the staff are great. They explained EVERYTHING in detail about my puppies surgery. Vanessa was on-call over the weekend. She answered numerous calls from me. Dr. Fields is personable, professional and seemed to genuinely care about for my pet.

resp.text: Dani Thank you for being part of Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort!  We appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughts about Dr. Fields & our team.  Thanks for the kind words and the recommendation to other pet owners!

name: Leigh Smith
text:
Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort has become like family to Jenni, Lola, Maggie and myself. They were there for us throughout our loss of Cooper and have taken amazing care of Lola and Maggie. The staff is incredibly friendly and quickly turn into family. They not only ask about your fur babies but also about you. I couldn't imagine going anywhere else.

We love you guys!

name: jst4kxs
text: Goodwin Animal Hospital and Pet Resort is more than a business, it is an extended family.  They make you feel at home and there is never a worry when your pets are left in their care.  As someone who travels often, I find myself with comfort knowing they are always well taken care of.  From the time you walk in the door and greeted by smiling faces to your time in the back with the vet and staff there is never a moment you feel like you are being rushed.  Everybody takes time to explain things and always goes out of there way to take care of any issues no matter how big or small.  Wouldn’t trust anybody else in Montgomery!

resp.text: Every client & patient that comes through our doors is a member of our Goodwin Animal Hospital family!  THANK YOU for the kind words and recommending us to others looking for a new veterinarian in Montgomery.

name: Cassandra Gipson
text: I have been with Goodwin for a little over a year...started with grooming to taking care of my Baby(great grooming service!!!)...They have a an Awesome Staff friendly staff  who recognizes you and your Baby by name the second you walk in. Even when I called as a walk in last-minute appointment, they go out their way to fit me in that same day and No waiting. Fast, Friendly, and trustworthy. They made me feel/and my Baby special as if he was their Baby. Would not trade Goodwin & it's Staff for the World!!  Thank YOU for ALL YOU DO!!/Kudos!!!! PS...oophs forgot...AND the doctors are so knowledgeable and great!..Thank You Too!

resp.text: We appreciate you & your fur baby being part of our family!  Thank you for recommending Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort to other pet owners.  Thanks for sharing your thoughts!

name: Jacob Johnson
text: I brought my dog in for daycare a couple of weeks ago and he was still full of energy and reeked of urine after getting him home that afternoon. Clearly they are not running these dogs hard enough or making them sit in kennels all day long. He was so thirsty when he got home too. Drank the entire bowl of water only to throw it all up a few minutes later. Very disappointed in my experience here and will not be back again.

resp.text: Jacob Our goal at Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort is to exceed client expectations and provide personalized care to each pet.  We apologize the experience was less than exceptional for you. We want to reach out to you but cannot find a client with your name.  Please give our manager a call as we want to discuss this with you.   Often dogs do not eat or drink as much as they do at home because of excitement or nervousness, which may be way he drank more water than normal when he went home.

name: Bet Baldwin
text: The Doctors & staff are amazing!  They are a full service facility from medical care, to boarding, to daycare, to grooming!   They treat your pets like they were your children!  I appreciate all that they do for my dogs & cats & would never take them elsewhere!  The rates fair & reasonable! Thanks for all that you do!

name: Antonia Rodden
text: Y'all are amazing, compassionate, and just all around wonderful people. We feel lucky to have y'all as our Vet/groomers/boarding place.

name: Joe River
text: From the moment we walked through the door we were greeted with a friendly and warm smile. We did not  have to wait for a very long time and to be seen. I was very happy with Goodwin Animal Hospital. I highly recommend them and their services.

name: Patricia Lassmann
text: love Goodwin Pet Resort.

name: Gary Daniel
text: Everyone was great from Vet to Boarding to Grooming!  Highly recommend!

name: Mildred Price
text: The staff at Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort is amazing! They are always attentive and we trust them to take care of our kids everyday with day care. Our three are always so excited in the morning because they can't wait to go! You guys are awesome!

name: Carol Roberts
text: We board our dog here whenever we go out of town. She's a tiny chihuahua mix and we worry about her like she was a child. We always get her a suite as it has the feeling of just being on the back porch with a screened door. She's a picky eater but the pet resort weighs her and monitors her eating throughout the stay to make sure she's ok. They take very good care of her there, and the people who take care of the pets are especially nice.

resp.text: Carol - We appreciate you & your dog being part of our family! Thank you for recommending Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort to other Montgomery pet owners. Thanks for sharing your thoughts!

name: Ralph Hill
text: Excellent experience.  Friendly staff.  Knowledgeable Vets.  We had one concern, but Dr Goodwin completely resolved it.  I will definitely recommend Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort to family and friends.

resp.text: Ralph - We appreciate your feedback. Thank you for recommending Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort to other pet owners. Thanks for sharing your thoughts and for the kind words.

name: Kathryn Jones
text: I can't say enough great things about the wonderful care the staff has provided my dogs over the years.  Everyone there is very warm and friendly.  It 's great to have a place to take your animals where you know they are in good hands.

name: Donald Wyse
text: Highly recommended. Superior service. Have boarded and cared for my dog at this establishment for 2 years as if this writing and I have not a single complaint about it. Wonderful, caring, understanding staff with capable and patient doctors.

resp.text: We appreciate you sharing your thoughts - thank you!

name: Gwendolyn Hill
text: I had to let my Fibi go to sleep due to health issues. I got to hold her, tell her how much I love her, and how she would miss her. The staff was so supportive and still are supporting me now. I thank God blessing me with their service. Goodwin Animal Hospital is the best.

name: Ray Alvarez
text: I am very satisfied with the services my pet received at Goodwin Animal Hospital. All of the doctors are great and they really do an awesome job taking care of our 4 legged children. I highly recommend them.

name: Betty Law Morgan
text: Always friendly and helpful they take great care of our dogs and keep us well informed of everything.  They deal with the fact that our two can't be separated much better than previous vets

name: A Redoble
text: We love Goodwin! Though we do not live in Montgomery anymore, we will use them anytime we are in town and so happy to have them there for our pups!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words!  Please come visit us next time you are in Montgomery!

name: Stella Dallas
text: When I first came to this location a year ago I posted that I was not greeted at the front door and they looked at me like why was I there. I was pleased with their boarding photos so tried to give them another shot. They are not honest on what they tell customers and they are rude unless you are spending money on vet services. I heard them and a patient laughing about the review about the ladys cat having a UTI. I am really torn their other location is good but they both are owned by the same company or corporation so they stay in business no matter what location you. Remember a lie is a lie and a business that will lie about something small will tell you anything to get money out of you. Also a lady had posted a review about her cat dying and having a UTI and today I heard a patient and staff at Goodwin laughing about that review.

name: Hannah Ingram
text: The doctors are great and take awesome care of my puppy. Love this place. First time pet owner and they are all very helpful and friendly. Thank you everyone!

name: Ex Libbin
text: Great staff that is always eager to help. Also, the groomer Alli is out favorite. She always does the best job!

resp.text: THANK YOU!  We appreciate you sharing your thoughts.  Thanks for recommending us to other pet owners.

name: David97
text: Professional service and great customer service for all my pet questions.. Highly recommend!!!

resp.text: Thanks David97 for recommending Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort to other pet owners - we appreciate the feedback!  We are grateful you recommend us to other pet owners.

name: Andrew Jones
text: Dr fields, dr rigsby, and nurses who are reviving a sick puppy. Office staff is very friendly and helpful.

name: Heather David
text: Great doctors and staff have always taken the best care of my dog, Molly!! I can’t thank them enough esp Dr. Glasscock, Dr Fields and all the awesome staff that took care of my sweet Molly this past week!! We can’t wait to come see y’all soon!!

name: Roy Daniels
text: I am happy to say that Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort has continuously completed a job well done. We are very satisfied with the service provided and the special care given to our pet. I have been with Goodwin Animal Hospital since 1996.

name: Penny Crawford
text: I had a little emergency with my pet  and the staff and Doctor's were  fantastic and so caring. I live close by 5 months out of the year so I'll go back if needed ..

resp.text: Penny - We appreciate you recommending Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort to other pet owners!  Thanks!

name: Erik Perthel
text: Overall the boarding was adequate, but if they ask if you want them to give your dogs a bath watch out cause that is a pretty penny.

name: adam esaw
text: Awesome staff that were professional and extremely personable.

resp.text: Thanks adam for recommending Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort to other pet owners - we appreciate the feedback!

name: Tanesha Smith
text: Dr. Field and his staff are amazing

name: Carly Livingston
text: All the staff and doctors have always taken great care of my sweet fur baby. We have never had any problems or complaints when it comes to the services and the wait time.

name: Loita Mc
text: Kind, friendly, and attentive service.

name: Margie Lambert
text: Pet care center sent us to AU for totally loss of eyesight . Then sent us to Dr Donnie and Dr Frank for her enucleation. Very impressed I need to see come get her meds refilled

name: Dan Haskall
text: The staff at Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort are all so courteous and friendly to myself as well as my pets when we come in for their appointments. I definitely would recommend the animal hospital to others.

name: Anne Tabitha
text: I have been bringing my cat to Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort and they are terrific.

name: 3c Students
text: They are amazing, always helpful and informative!!!

name: James Barnes
text: The people at Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort really cares about my animals.

name: Thomas Patrick
text: Everybody at Goodwin Animal Hospital is very friendly and kind. They take the time to listen to me and make me feel welcome.

name: Linyuan Guo-Brennan
text: We have always received friendly and professional services. Thank you!

name: Margaret Peters
text: The time we checked in to when we were put in an examination room was short at Goodwin Animal Hospital and Pet Resort.

name: Alaker Brisinger
text: don't get a job here my cousin did and there fired her for being about half an hour late but they said it was ok before when she told them on the phone.

name: Mitzi Mantooth
text: Dr Mahan and all the other members of Westside's professional staff, from front office onward, continue to show a very high level of care and compassion for all their patients!  I would never go anywhere else.

name: Angie tidmore
text: The staff is very friendly and helpful

name: Dawn Ross
text: Awesome veterinary hospital

name: Susan Brooks
text: Dr. Amanda Parker is an amazing veterinarian in every way.  I could go on and on; but suffice it to say that we are so pleased and impressed with Dr. Parker and her staff that we drive from Huntsville to Decatur to take our beloved Anna to her.  Need I say more?!  We love her.

name: Killian Kilmister
text: The vets and the techs are so sweet, and knowledgeable. If you have a budget you have to stick to, they do their best to stay within it. They genuinely care so much about their furry patients.

name: Grunyan Adams
text: Everyone treats you like family, and feel your pain when fur babys are sick

name: Victoria Matthews
text: Dr. Parker is an amazing vet! She also has the best boarding clinic in town. If you’re looking for a veterinarian this is the place to go!

name: Wanda
text: We boarded our Golden retriever with them and liked them well enough to have her spayed with them as well. Dr Parker is such a sweet lady and is so kind to the animals that she sees. Gypsy is happy to give and take love when she meets the staff there...so much kind heartedness in those ladies!

name: Justin Parker
text: Dr Parker and her team is awesome!!

name: Bob Schade
text: Excellent care for our dogs! The vets and their staff are wonderful!

name: Cindy Mcconnell
text: I really love the veterinarians . They are all so good to my fur babies. They are also good and respectful to me.

name: Jennifer Wilson
text: Vets and techs truly care about your pet. Veterinary care, grooming, and boarding at reasonable rates.

name: Brooklyn Turner
text: Dr. O’Leary is incredible. My partner and I brought our cat to him due to a fever and, later, breathing problems. Dr. O’Leary gave our kitty the best care we could have asked for while also checking in with us to see what we could afford and what we couldn’t. He frequently keeps in contact in with us to make sure our cat is doing okay and see if we have any questions. He is extremely intelligent and understanding. We cannot recommend him enough!

resp.text: It was an honor to provide the best care for your kitty! We truly care about the health and well-being of every pet that visits us, and we're delighted to have earned your recommendation thanks to the knowledgeable, understanding, and helpful service you received.

name: Joelen Ward
text: Dr. O'Leary is a fantastic reptile vet. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you for the high recommendation, Joelen! If you need anything else from us in the future, please let us know.

name: Kaylee Hobbs
text: One of the most professional vets I've been to in the city of Montgomery. I went to get my pet tegu (lizard) examined because they're one of the few vets in the tri-county area that treat reptiles. Dr. O'Leary was extremely knowledgeable and caring and the staff was very courteous. I cannot recommend them enough.

resp.text: Kaylee, we're honored to know that you hold Dr. O'Leary and our staff in such high esteem. Your recommendation is greatly appreciated and we'll be here for you if you need anything else for Tegu. Sincerely, VCA Vaughn Road Animal Hospital

name: Erika Poikey
text: Vet for the rich, good luck getting out the doors for less than $500. 1/10, Do not recommend, they are mostly nice, kinda pushy, and everything is at least double compared to anywhere else.

resp.text: Erika, we're saddened by your review. When it comes to any services we provide, we always strive to be as accommodating as we can be, so it's unfortunate we did not meet your expectations. Feel free to email our hospital manager at Kelly.Greenstein@vca.com if you would like to discuss your feedback further. Respectfully, VCA Vaughn Road Animal Hospital

name: Julie Freeman
text: Brittany did a fabulous job grooming our toy Pomeranian, Pipsqueak. He knows he looks great! He has been so sassy since I picked him up! Showing off his silhouette cut!

name: Lawrence Daniel
text: I found a stray 6 week old old kitten that needed to be certified healthy.  They got me in and the kitten checked out the next day (my request).  Otherwise they would have taken care of the kitten that day.  Fast, friendly service with great attention to making sure I know everything I need to know about this kitten.

name: Linda Weeks
text: Dr. Lamb and her staff are the best.   They are kind, efficient and always have a smile of their faces no matter how busy they are.    I know that my babies are being well taken care of at each visit.

name: Sally Cupcakesandthings
text: Excellent services. Would give 5 stars if they weren't so pricey but you do get what you pay for here, which is excellence.

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing your enthusiastic feedback about our services! If you ever have any further questions, please don't hesitate to ask!

name: Linda Weeks
text: I wish I could rate Vaughn Road Vet Clinic with100 stars.    I have been using them for 20 plus years and they are the best!!!!!    The doctors as well as the vet techs are full of compassion for each furry baby that comes through the door.    I never worry when I have to leave my babies there for any type of procedure - I know they will receive the best care possible!!!    Three cheers to Dr. Lamb and her employees- I don't know what I would do without them!!!!!!😘😘

name: Riketa Johnson
text: I had a wonderful time at my appointment with my dog king they gave me and my dog the upmost respect and the vet gave me great information on my dog and what I can do to keep him healthy we will be back thank you all best staff very friendly and they really care that is what I love the most

resp.text: Riketa, we couldn't be happier knowing that you enjoyed your experience with us. It was our pleasure to treat your dog with lots of love and we'll be here for you if you need anything else. Thank you!

name: Lawrence Daniel
text: I found a month old kitten.  They got her in and checked out the day I requested an appointment.  They took great care of both of us.  I would highly recommend for any of your pets needs.

name: Hilda Young
text: I am leaving yet another glowing review for Vaugh Road Vet Clinic.  Dr. Lamb and Haley performed efficient and thorough exams of my fur babies, making sure the pups were comfortable and unstressed throughout.  Dr. Lamb was even patient with me and answered my many questions.  I also enjoyed meeting and talking to Sarah, the smiling receptionist at the front desk.  I will continue to bring all 4 of my dogs to Vaugh Rd and highly recommend you do the same.

name: Amelia Blackwood
text: The vet techs & support staff are 150% professional pet handlers.  They make pet pandemonium look like its a piece of cake which is much appreciated when someone lile myself is handling, transporting & responsible for someone else's beloved furry friends.  I don't know if my trips to their clinic could ever be so smooth & easygoing without their accommodating assistance.  They never fail to go above & beyond to help regardless of request or simply their nature to help at the first possible situation in meed.

name: Leisa Johnson
text: Started here for the grooming. Stayed for the excellent vet care! The whole staff is friendly and caring.

name: Susy Lange
text: Very impressed with the Vets and staff at Vaughn Road. They always take great care of my dog and me.  Great experience every time!

name: Jim Bonner
text: We always feel that we have received expert care for our dog, and she has had some challenging conditions. All the vets are outstanding, and the atmosphere is always warm and reassuring.

resp.text: Jim, it's been a pleasure to go above and beyond for your lovely dog who always deserves the highest caliber of care and love. Thank you so much for supporting our team!

name: Destiny Caldwell
text: Very friendly and professional staff. I have a cat and they allow dogs to rome without a leash so that made it uncomfortable.

name: Pat Cooke
text: Drs Lamb and Worthy has provided excellent efforts and care in working to get to the root cause of my dog's problem with patience and compassion.  The staff is great too!

name: Glen Struchtemeyer
text: Great staff. Always a positive experience there

name: Thomas Applewhite
text: Great doctors, very friendly and  concerned about your pet's health.

name: Barbara Eaves
text: They always take the best care of my pets.

name: Carlos Harris
text: Fantastic staff. Fantastic service every time.

name: Joshua Tidwell
text: Great care for our dogs and professional customer service.

name: Lakeithia Dixon
text: They treated us like family when we came in on our first visit ❤️

resp.text: Lakeithia, thank you for your kind words as it's always our pleasure to be supportive of your pet-care needs. Sincerely, VCA Vaughn Road Animal Hospital

name: Hillary Yancey
text: Awesome staff and vets...  A+

name: Alva Barksdale
text: excellent pet care

resp.text: Thank you for the amazing compliment, Alva!

name: Tommy Lawrence
text: Great vet clinic

name: Carolyn Elam
text: They are awesome.

name: Enrique Gonzalez
text: All my babies go there 🐶🐶🐶🐶🐶🐶

name: Damian Fowler
text: Wonderful staff

name: Rick Lewis
text: Good service

name: Lisa Lang
text: I have just started using them and just boarded my 2 pugs with them while we were away for 5 days. My pups were clean, super soft and smelled so good when I picked them up. Even though they were super excited to see us when we got there to pick them up they were very calm so I know they were happy while there and not stressed out. I left them at another place several months back and they were shaking and nervous acting when I got there to pick them up but Not here so I definitely recommend and will definitely stick with them!!

name: Ryan Ware
text: A lot of the previous reviews have spoken for me. I would not recommend this clinic to anyone. We had a VERY BAD experience, but the follow up to our concerns were even worse. Attitude of indifference as bad as I have ever seen it. An extremely unorganized drop off, poor communication at best, pick up was obviously bad as my dog was in horrible shape (he was just fine when we dropped him off), and then like I said- couldn't have cared any less when I followed up with them for help on an avoidable $650 SPENT AT ANOTHER VET'S ER RIGHT AFTER LEAVING THIS PLACE!  Do not recommend!!!!!

name: Tiffany Newman
text: 1st time vet visit for my newly adopted pet. This vet was rude. Cut me off in mid-sentence when I was explaining my pets past history. I won’t return back here. Do not recommend at all.

name: Lauren Anderson
text: The front desk workers were very nice and professional, as well as the veterinarian that saw my puppy Draco!

name: Cathee Gipson
text: We use RRVS for daycare and boarding as well as veterinary care.  The are simply the BEST!  Dr. Myers truly loves her patients and always gives us honest advise on a level we can clearly understand.  Our dogs love the boarding suites and enjoy staying at River Region as much as we enjoy our vacations.  The daycare is AWESOME!  We all get to sleep soundly at night after they play so hard all day.  The photo shows them relaxing after a fun day with their friends at River Region Veterinary Services!

name: Kerri Fontaine
text: Just a warning for people who select River Region Vet Services.  The Vet. is very unprofessional and very rude.  I will never again recommend her services nor will I be returning.   Three different times she has shown her true colors of blaming, scolding, and almost yelling.  Nobody deserves to be treated that way.  A new customer was sitting in the lobby with me and after the Vet went back to the back the customer asked who was that?  Clearly seeing her rude bedside manner.  Her prices are too high for the horrible customer service.

name: Sierra Evans
text: Trust that you won’t know the full truth of the low star reviews. Unless something is documented and handed to you first, the price or services might change. Posting under a different name for my own protection, because I don’t think I should be threatened for stating facts.

name: Jeff Brosius
text: Started taking our new furbaby here. Vet is amazing and funny. Took care of our baby very well....

resp.text: Thank you so much for trusting us to care for your baby!!

name: Brittany Little
text: Dr. Myers is the BEST. I have complete trust in her veterinary knowledge and abilities. She knows what the best course of action is for her patients, and is terrific at explaining everything in layman’s terms. We don’t take our fur babies anywhere except RRVS!

name: Terry Farmer
text: Caring and professional,  always excellent communication from veterinarian

name: Carole Dozier
text: Dr Myers and her staff at RIver Region Veterinary Services have been taking care of my dogs (babies) for almost 9 years. I can not say enough about how amazing Dr Myers is!  You can't fake how much she truly cares for animals and has their best interest in mind.  I have been through everything from new puppy care, stomach trouble, spay and neuter to kidney disease and having to let go of one of my babies. Dr Myers would not give up on my dog with a rear condition, even calling Auburn several times to confer with other veterinaries. When it was time to let my baby go she was so caring and hugged me while i cried, reassuring me that we  had done all we could. Just this past weekend one of my babies had to be hospitalized at another clinic with 24 hour care, Dr Myers called the staff there to make sure they had all the information on my dog as well as called me to check in. Above and beyond, even on her weekend off. Dr Myers will always be straight with you about your pet. Yes, some people don't like this but i would much rather have a doctor, people or animal,  tell me the truth no matter how hard it is to hear. I respect this about her. As an owner of two fat Beagles i have gotten several talks on their weight.  But i know this is because she cares about my dogs and does not want to see them suffer with what can happen to them  from being obese. It is not you are wrong and i am right, it is lets work together to help your dogs.  It is not just my husband and i that love Dr Myers and her staff, it is also my dogs that love their vet!

resp.text: Thanks, Carole, for your kind words. We have been through a lot together! We appreciate your trust in us, and love taking care of your babies.

name: Linda King
text:
Dr. Amy Myers at River Regions Vet Services is just the Bomb!!! She is always smiling and I never have to wait long to see her. The quality of care my furry babies get there is terrific!
Dr. Myers staff is wonderful and always so helpful. Ashley, her main technician, is so knowledgeable and informative. Everyone is attentive not only to my pets needs but to my needs as well.
I have other family members that take their pets to River Regions Veterinary Services. I highly recommend you do so as well!!!!!!

resp.text: Thanks Linda! We appreciate the kind words, and your trust in us.

name: Scott Smith
text: Awesome as usual.

name: Scott Frederick
text:
If you care about how you and your pet are treated, don’t use this Vet.

The staff seems heartless and very uncaring, especially Dr. Myers. After boarding my dog there for 2 days, she came home with bumps all over her body. When my wife called to questions this, she was told that they would not being seeing our dog anymore and that if she had bumps, that this was our problem. Dr. Myers then proceeded to curse my wife out on the phone. The treatment we received from River Region Vet Services was unprofessional and appalling.

name: Chelsea Foradori
text: I'm not sure how this place is even still open with the horror stories I hear about this "veterinarian". The fact that my family member left in tears because you refused to help a dog and instead of professionally explaining anything you just demanded the dog be sedated before returning. Without even the slightest explanation. Unprofessional to say the least.

name: CGF
text: Visited with our pug for the first time after moving to this area.  Dr. Myers took the time to explain needed treatment and made recommendations to consider.  She was mindful of costs and wasn't "pushing products."  She and her staff were pleasant and professional!  I'm glad to have found a veterinarian we can trust so close to home!  Definitely would recommend!

resp.text: Thank you so much! We enjoyed meeting you and Link this morning. Can't wait to get him better!

name: ALICE JACKSON
text: Best Doctor and staff within 100 miles! Dr. Myers is the only vet that will take care of my pets. She treats all patients with loving care — she is the best!!!

name: Lori Roy
text: We have been clients of River Region Veterinary for well over 5 years. Our children are grown and our pets are our children.It is such a blessing to have an animal lover like Amy to care for them. We have had many various veterinary hurdles over the years but she was always there for us and treated our babies like they were hers. We have had surgeries which were critical and she spent the night with them when we could not, we had overnight emergencies and she met us at the office before we could get there and stayed with us, we had difficulties giving medications and caring for one of our pets after a surgery and her caring and compassionate staff came to our home to help us, when we and our grown children have lost pets we were called and sent loving and understanding letters. We are older and have had many vets over the years, but no where have we received this level of not only professional and intuitive veterinary care but genuine love and care. Thank You so much for being such an important part of our family.

name: Justin Coleman
text: This place is great! My dogs board here basically every day. Dr Myers is very knowledgeable and helpful. It is also great to walk in and have a friendly staff member like Ashley Coleman greet you as you come in. 5 stars! Excellent!

name: Melissa Stiles
text: Dr Myers and her staff are absolutely amazing! They always greet my fur babies by name. They have been there for me for routine treatments all the way to very serious emergencies.  I recommend this facility to my friends all the time. There are two veterinarians closer to my home and I couldn’t imagine not using Dr. Meyers. River Region Vet Rocks!

name: Britney Josey
text: If I could leave 10 stars I would! I can’t tell you how much my dogs love going to see Dr. Myers and her wonderful staff!! I have been taking them to RRVS for over five years and I know I can always trust them to take the best care of my pets! I will never use another vet, they are stuck with us forever😊

resp.text: We love seeing you and your babies coming through the door!

name: Missy Piatt
text: Amy is DEFINITELY the best vet EVER!!!

name: Niki Treadaway
text:
Dr. Myers and her staff have taken great care of our pets. We were out of town when my dog had a medical emergency and Dr. Myers took excellent care of her in our absence, and even took momma dog and all 5 puppies to her house until I could have my new pet sitter pick them up from her that evening. She has gone above and beyond for us and we love and trust the care she provides.
