It’s unfortunate to see some of the negative comments on here by disgruntled patients. Please form your own opinion by giving this office a call for your pets needs.

name: Mil Member
text: I had a horrible experience with this veterinarian today! Dr Myers was most unprofessional during my visit and I am appalled at her behavior.   I was berated and yelled at while Dr Myers was examining my pet this morning and this occurred in front of her staff!  I was paying for the pet exam not the attitude and personal feelings.  Needless to say, this will be the last time I use Dr Myer's services for my pets.  I have been using her since 2011 and spent plenty of money in her office.  However, there are too many other qualified, competent and caring vets available in the local area to put up with this.  I chose her because she is in my community and close to my home.  I wish I had done a better job at researching her; if I had, I would have found other reviews similar to mine which would have led me in another direction.  I am a responsible pet owner and care for my pets like they are my children.  I would never knowingly do anything to cause discomfort or harm to my pets.  There was absolutely no need for her conduct today.  Now I understand why there are flyers in her office requesting her clients to leave reviews on specific sites (this is one of them) to counter the bad reviews she has received in the past.  Please, please do your own research before selecting Dr Myers as your vet.  I don't recommend her under any conditions.

name: Connor Headlee
text: I started taking my pups here a couple months ago. It has been a great experience since. I am a first Ike dog owner and this place has made it so easy. We rescued a dog and she is in perfect health. I recently rescued another puppy who looked like he was left for dead. He had all types of worms and just poor health. This vet has helped me get my puppy healthy and they call often to check on his health. I love boarding them here as well!

name: David Williamson
text: We love Dr. Myers. And our furbabies love her also.

name: Amy Tyner
text: I love River Region veterinary services!! Wonderful staff who will take such good care of your animals! I especially love Ashley and Dr. Myers, they are the best! Take your animals there! ❤️

name: Becki Roberts
text: Dr. Myers and Dr. Caver are excellent vets. My cat has had several urinary blocks. They have been caring and dedicated to finding a solution for the problem. When they needed to refer him to another vet for surgery there was no hesitation in their referral. Thankfully things have gone well and we are in the recovery phase now. Thank you Dr. Myers and Dr. Caver.!

name: Cameron Lawracy
text: The service that Dr. Myers provides is superior to almost every vet I've ever been to. She's thorough, kind, and willing to explain her treatments. They know my family by first name, and I know they care about my dogs. The only negative is this vet is kind of expensive, but I feel like you get what you pay for. So I believe she is worth it.

name: Terrie B
text: Dr. Myers will go above and beyond for your pet.  She has been treating my pets for over 10 years. She has helped my babies in multiple emergency situations and very kind while assisting two geriatric pets over the rainbow bridge.  I highly recommend Dr. Myers and River Region Veterinary Services.

resp.text: Thanks Terrie! It is clients like you that make us love what we do.

name: Kayla Brown
text: Dr. Myers, the veterinarian, is AMAZING! She has been taking care of allcof my animals since she opened her clinic. She has saved my English Bulldog's life mamy times! The staff, even though has changed, is still extremely nice. They have a doggy daycare that you can take your dog to while you are at work. I can't stress how amazing this place is. And comparatively pricing, she may not be the cheapest (even though you get what you pay for anyway, but she is certainly cheaper than a lot of other vets! Thank you Dr. Myers, for everything!

name: josh smithart
text:
Wouldn’t recommend this veterinarian to anyone. There are many other vets in this region who will love your animals like you do. This isn’t one. BEWARE!
**i have never and will never go to this clinic**
Take a look at the reviews and responses to reviews before you settle on a vet in the prattville area.

resp.text: You have never been to this hospital.

name: jerrold Haskin
text: Well I am in the process of looking for another Vet.  To many strikes in just 3 short months of using this facility.  (1). I boarded my dog for 3 to 4 days and he developed Kennel Cough.  They prescribed medicine that I had to pay for, but he developed Kennel cough at their facility.  He’s 8 years old and never had this happen before.  (2) Took my dog in for grooming at 7 am.  Told it would take 3 hours, after not receiving a phone call I followed up at 1pm, only to be told my dog was groomed, except nails.  He would be ready after groomer retuned from lunch.  Why not finish him, nails take 5 mins???  Well then I go pick him up a hour later and he still not ready.  So the person working the front counter goes back and cuts his nails and now he is bleeding from that experience as I take him home.  (3). While I’m waiting at front counter for my dog another gentleman brings his dog in who is barking quite a bit.  I happen to look back at the Counter Rep and catch her look of disgust of having to deal with this dog. (4) I call on Weekend because my dog has ear infection, Doc calls me back after second message and says it will have to wait till Monday.  Gives me remedies I had already looked up, but no option to get medicine after hours.  I brought my dog in Germany and he has lived in and been cared for Vets on Turkey, Tucson Arizona, Chicago, and Alaska.  Never have we had any of these experiences, and I have all these in 3 short months..  Time to move on and I tried to give benefit of doubt.  Just cannot keep doing it and they really need to have people work the front counter that displays a loving attitude toward pets.  They faces don’t say I love doing this for a living.

name: Melissa Bazzell
text: Dr. Myers has always been professional and taken good care of our animals.  Dr. Myers and her staff were very kind and caring when we had to put our Boxer down because she had cancer.  They are very down to earth and easy to talk to and always answer our questions.  Thanks Dr. Myers and Staff!!

name: T.J. Conwell
text: Dr. Myers and her staff are my first choice to provide care for my pets.  They always get top notch treatment at the clinic, and the staff is exceptional in their knowledge, explanation, and their compassion for not only my pets - but for my family as well.  Thank you for all you do!

name: Kirby Thompson
text: Superb people, awesome facility!  Our puppy, McCue gets the greatest care.  He loves going to DayCare so much he meets us at the door after breakfast.  Once on the property we have to hold him back as he charges for the front door.  We love y'all, keep up the good work!

resp.text: McCue is always a bright spot in our day!

name: Kayla Mason
text: This facility is so nice! All of the staff members were helpful, courteous, and a joy to be around. I would definitely recommend this clinic to other pet owners!

name: Sylvia Coleman
text: Awesome! Very helpful with whatever my dog needs. Great staff especially Ashley Coleman!

resp.text: Thank you so much! We love seeing Tux come in the door.

name: Gipson's Tire Bob
text: Always great and timely service from the friendliest people!

name: Jeremy Pease
text: Vet service is great.  I would not recommend boarding though.  Sunday pickup person was 20 minutes late and not very friendly.  Food we portioned for dogs was not given as instructed and to was urine soaked which leads me to believe they were confined too long.

name: Kathleen Daughtry
text: I have always had a wonderful experience at this clinic. The staff is wonderful and Dr. Myers is always willing to go the extra mile to help her human and animal clients.

name: Alex Ray
text: I took my dog here to be groomed due to the convenience to my house and the price difference compared to other groomers ( other were 80-90, river regions confirmed TWICE it wouldbe $60) They tried to charge $75 when he was picked up claiming they did not know who told me $60. Since my husband picked him up he just paid them $60 and didn't question the cut. The cut looks nothing like the reference picture, I asked to blend the fur so there would not be choppy lines (he is a Great Pyrenees's)  the cut was choppy, uneven, and to WAY to short (he was not matted)

name: RaBin Kim
text:
The doctor is extremely ignorant and unprofessional.

I took my puppy to this vet about a week ago. When I got out of the car the doctor was going to her car saying hello to me. And she left. Went inside and there was a young lady at the counter asking me and my husband “what can I help you?”, we said “our puppy keeps throwing up all day”. And now she says “Actually the doctor is not here for today. We can’t help you” so we said we just so her in the parking lot but it’s okay we will leave.

A day later my husband got an e-mail from the doctor basically saying “Your wife was rude. Please find another vet. We can provide your pets data.”

We were so upset with the doctors ignorance and unprofessionalism but later on we just felt pitty for her bad behavior. We are changing the vet. Please do not use this vet.

What is the point if a vet is open without doctor? This is a totally stupid situation.

resp.text:
We are a single doctor practice, so we work by appointment. We were leaving the clinic to make a house call when you arrived, and I spoke to you in the parking lot. You said nothing about your puppy being sick, and he was running around like he was fine. I assumed you were there for boarding or something else that does not require my presence so I left to see another client.
When my receptionist offered to call me and have me return you were rude and disrespectful. I do not tolerate people mistreating my staff, and that is why you got the email. None of this has anything to do with me being "ignorant and unprofessional", and everything to do with your repeatedly being rude to my staff.

name: Marion Crutchfield
text: We have been using Dr. Meyers since 2012.  We initially had 2 senior dogs who passed in 2013 and 2014.  One of them developed cancer and Dr. Meyers amputated the cancerous leg and gave her another year with us.  We adopted another rescue from the shelter Thanksgiving 2014 and took her to Dr. Meyers who immediately found parasites and identified a broken hip that hadn't healed.  Dr. Meyers said the surgery wasn't absolutely necessary but we scheduled it anyway.  Jan 14th she will get her hip fixed and I look forward to long walks with our new companion because right now a walk completely does her in for a few days..  I have complete trust in and respect for the staff at River Region Vet Services.  They handle every situation with so much grace and make you feel so special.

name: Jason Bryant
text: These folks were very caring and really went the extra mile to look after my cat.  Thank you very much.

name: Lewis Shepherd
text: I was in from out of town and my Shih Tzu started having problems with her eyes. The vet took me right away as a walk in, even guided me in on the phone. Not only did she diagnose the issue correctly, but pointed out some early warning signs of other issues. I'm extremely happy with my experience, and highly recommend this office.

name: TERRY Tanner
text: Excellent people, always take good care of my dogs!

resp.text: Thanks so much Terry! We love taking care of your rotten babies.

name: Roscoe
text: First off I will say I like Dr. Myers.  Used her as my only vet when we first moved to Prattville, a bit on the expensive side.  This being said.  I changed vets due to the fact when I needed her for a new puppy that had parvo, I was told on a Friday to call back on Saturday.  We were told to call on Monday because Dr. Myers was off that weekend.  So now we are using a great vet with better prices and has 24 hr care right here in Prattville.  And our puppy is alive and well.

name: Leslie Donovan
text: I visited this clinic because of the location, convenient to my home.  I realized immediately that the veterinarian wanted to add every service she could think of to my visit to rack up a big bill.  This was almost laughable, because she made a comment about my purse and that she had one just like it.  It was a designer bag that she took to mean I had all kinds of money, and proceeded to try and take advantage of the situation. My dogs have always had continuous care with a vetrinarian and I knew they did not need all she was prescribing. My dog had some allergies and outbreaks on his belly, and all he really needed to start with was a good allergy shampoo, not antibiotics and a special skin condition medication.  I would NOT recommend this clinic.  I always recommend questioning medications and doing alot of your own research.

name: Bill Crum
text: Great for your pets. Mine love paws at play

name: Sandra Hines
text: Dr. Amy Myers has always been very helpful and taken great care of my animals. She has been our Vet. since she started her work in Prattville, AL.

name: L W
text: If I could leave negative 5 stars I would. EXTREMELY unprofessional, non caring. No passion for Veterinary medicine from anyone employed here which is needed to perform in a humane fashion in this type of field. DO NOT take your pets here.

name: Midori Matsumoto
text: My experiece with River Region Vet Services was amazing. We have recently purchased a wonderful puppy named Spike and our visit to River Region helped us alot. The staff was wonderful and the receptionist knew us from our last visit. She remembered Spike and was very kind, helpful, and made us feel as if we were family. I am not sure of the other reviews, but I can honestly say that I couldn't think of a better vet service to go to. As far as being to expensive I really can not agree. When I compared the prices just for Spike's vaccination we would have spent over $200 just to have them see him and do a physical. At River Refions our bill was no more then $75.50 for all his shots and physical combined. I suppose everyone have their opinions but in my personal opinion, I will go no where else for Spike's check ups and vaccinations. My experience there was more then I expected.

name: Chelsea Ethridge
text: If I could give 0 stars I would! Possibly the most unprofessional and rude human being I have ever met.

resp.text: We spent a lot of time with your dog trying to just get our hands on her, even though she has already been banned from one facility. I was nice to you until you laughed about your dog shredding my arm. Your behavior was less acceptable than your dog.

name: Melissa Carden
text:
The vets at RRVS are phenomenal. Some reviewers have posted negative reviews based on the vets "trying to make money by suggesting more services." To these reviewers, I say, they are the ones with the veterinary degrees--don't you think they know what your pet needs? If you just want a vet who will give your pet the bare minimum (basic yearly vaccines), then, by all means, go somewhere else. If you want a vet that will take care of your pet proactively, then this is your place.
The staff at RRVS are wonderful as well. With a very low turnover rate, the front desk staff know us on sight--myself, my husband, and our pet--and always make us feel welcome and cared for.
RRVS is the only vet in Central Alabama that I will use.

name: Jude Crelot
text: This vet, specifically Dr. Myers, did and unnecessary surgery, without my consent on my dog. She lies about prices of things saying a cheaper price so will say ok then when you go to pay its almost double what you were told, I have personally seen her drinking \using drugs. She spreads lies about her patient's owners on social media, and she told someone close to me after a major surgery she had a machine that would help her heal, but for her not to tell anyone. Thinking OK this can't hurt she let Dr. Myersdo this treatment which caused more harm to this person. People stay away from this vet, I do not want unnecessary unethical things done to my furbabies!

resp.text: Jude Crelot has never been to River Region Veterinary Services. This review is intended to retaliate for us taking her friend to court to receive payment for treatments done to her pet. The courts found in our favor, shortly before this review was posted. It is a shame that people can post complete slanderous garbage on this site.

name: Steven Perry
text: Very friendly up to date on new types of vaccinations and treatments

name: Sue Herbert
text: Great veterinarian and friendly staff.

resp.text: Thanks Sue! We are glad you trust us to care for your fur babies!

name: Kelly Brand
text: Rude and snotty. Won't go back!

resp.text: Kelly Stroud has never been to River Region Veterinary Services.

name: Trey Poole
text: Great people

name: Tiana Murray
text: My experience at My Pet’s Vet was great the first time as well as the second time. The nurses there are very caring of your pet and very nice and patient with you. Also, unlike a lot of places with the virus going on, you are not allowed to take your child with you at times, but here at My Pet’s Vet, I brought my son with me and they excepted him. That made me feel more and more comfortable at My Pet’s Vet. I have not had any bad experiences here yet, so far I been twice, and hopefully things stay the same. You looking for a vet for your wonderful pet, My Pet’s Vet is the vet to take them too. Take my word, you won’t be disappointed.

name: Theresa Weise
text: I WAS EXTREMELY HAPPY WITH THE SERVICE WE RECEIVED AS WELL AS THE KINDNESS SHOWN TO MY PETS! DR. GONZALES WAS VERY GENTLE WITH MY BABIES! THE OFFICE STAFF IS VERY KNOWLEDGEABLE & HELPFUL AS WELL. I AM LOOKING TO WORKING WITH THE DR.'S AND STAFF IN THE FUTURE.

name: Ralph Celento
text: We have been using My Pet's Vet here in San Antonio, for 16 months now. They ALWAYS take such great care of our Sasha. The team is professional, great customer service, the quality of care and prices are great. If you have pet then I recommend My Pet's Vet.

name: Jose Manzano
text: Great plae.  Great Vet.  Trust them with my fur baby little girl.

name: rebecca daniel
text: Even though I was waiting for a payday, the staff I dealt with helped me get started with my cat's care. Everyone was very friendly and concerned about how my esa cat was doing. He had more testing a few days later and through it all, the staff has been very honest and made the best of what we can afford to do.  My girlfriend that went with me the first day, will be switching her pets there as she just moved from out of state after how they were working with me. He's still not in the clear, but he's doing better, thanks to the huebner location.

name: Shaunna Gordon
text: Very helpful, quick, and polite staff!  Our puppy has gone for his check ups, his immunizations, and he was just neutered last week. Great service!

name: Jennifer Marple
text: I'm am so pleased with the service my fur baby and I got. I'm so glad that I went in and got my dog situated. She feels so much better and so do I. I will be a customer for a long while. I've even recommended them to a few friends. The payment plan is amazing, everyone should have it.

name: Tim Rose
text: My cats actually look forward to their vet visit. That says a lot.  They are reasonable, caring and they do a good job looking after our fun babies.

name: Nicole Kucharczyk
text: May Vet North is the only place we have ever taken Indiana and it is the only place we will ever take Indiana! He loves the staff and we always enjoy our visits. The doctors and staff make Indiana feel welcomed, which makes his vet appointments a breeze!

name: Christina Shelby
text: My Butterbean was so scared. They were very perfessional and eased my mind on being there. She never leaves the house so she was not used to being out. They took care of her right away. Not a long wait.

name: Alisha Louie
text: My first experience with a vet and I have chosen the best. Dr. May and staff are awesome!❤️

name: Kate Brooks
text: I had a stray cat in heat that I adopted into my home and most vets were not able to schedule a spay for at least a month out. I called on Friday and May Vet had an opening on Monday. They took her in for the spay, vaccines, blood work, and microchip at 8am and got a call she was done at 10:45am. So happy with the care they provided and how quickly they were able to get me in!

name: Paula Jennings
text: My puppy who is very sick with Parvo was just turned away from them despite being referred to them by Emergi-Pet. The fact that their website talks about how compassionate they are is a joke. The receptionist was extremely rude. It does not matter how great the vets are if your office staff is terrible!! I will be calling Emergi-Pet when they reopen to let them know how unhappy I am they referred me to this veterinarian practice. Luckily, I found a compassionate place in town to take him. If you value your furbabies don’t take them here!

name: Paige & Chris Burke
text: Great pricing! Staff is extremely nice & informative. They also call to check in on there patients. Will never go anywhere else!

name: Jim Waltman
text: Wonderful Veternarian! Kind staff and vets with a great bed side manner. We never have to wait for our appointment and are always greeted with a smile. I highly recommend Dr. May and Dr. Gladney.

name: Michelle Hicks
text: My family has been using May Veterinary Clinic North since 1993. We have always experienced excellent service, a caring staff, and knowledgeable doctors and vet technicians. I have always been comfortable leaving my pets if just for the day or for boarding, and all of my fur babies have enjoyed them too! I always receive follow-up calls for any procedures or surgeries. I highly recommend May Veterinarian!!

name: S G
text: Affordable and excellent care! I took my dog kooper in for tooth extraction and cleaning.

name: Kerry Jarvis
text: Dr. May and his staff are Heaven sent! They are so passionate and caring towards the animals and so compassionate and attentive to the parents of fur babies. My kitten recently had surgery and they took the time to comfort me, answer all my questions and even kept me posted on her procedure and recovery. I was a complete mess and they were so comforting and assuring. I truly believe Dr May and his staff are a blessing and highly suggest you use them for all your fur baby needs. Destiny even sent me texts after hours to let me know how my baby was recovering and I simply can’t thank them all enough for their gentle and kind nature towards all.

name: Holly Ha†cher
text: I took my baby here on May 3rd. And on May 15th.... he died. The doctor told me.. your Dog is perfectly healthy. Nothing wrong with him. On May 3rd then 12 days later they told me he was dying from liver failure.... how can a dog go from 100% healthy. To liver failure in 1e days?!?! This Veterinarian clinic killed my dog. Don't let them kill your babies too. It was ONLY about the money here they charged me $300 on the first day then on May 15th the 1st time I brought him in again hit me with another $200 that morning & by lunch I brought him in again & another $200... so for a little under $1000 they will kill your dog.

name: Helen Carter
text: My dog Molly was having dental problems and we hadn't gotten resolution at our initial vet.  Once Dr May saw Molly's issue, he scheduled her dental appointment immediately.  He worked her into his schedule the same week!  An added plus is Dr May charged considerably less than other vets charge.

name: J
text:
Stella LOVES May Veterinary Clinic. She is a now 9 year old black lab rescue where Dr. May has taken care of Stella like she is her own. Maybe Stella is just that lovable, or just maybe Dr. May is amazing!

I will admit, the staff isn't always 100% and even we have had some frustrations with them. HOWEVER, if you want a DOCTOR that is above par, and top class, Dr. May is the best!

name: Patti Sutton
text: I have never had a bad experience with Dr. May and his staff. They truly give you and your pets their full attention. And will go far beyond what they can to insure your pets health. I wouldn't go anywhere else.!!!

name: Michael Johnson
text: Wonderful people.   Very helpful and really caring about your family members health.

name: Alanna Sullivan
text: My husband and I are newly weds and he had a 10yr old Maltese when we met. He hadn't been to the vet in years nor had he ever been fixed. We decided to get a puppy during the COVID craziness and decided to use May Vet North as our vet for both pups. We have been extremely pleased with everything at May. Both of our pups have been fixed now and both had amazing recoveries with no problems, even the very active younger one. We also have used their boarding services for a recent vacation and loved it as well. All the employees I've come in contact with have been extremely professional and helpful and seem to know our pups by name as soon as they walk through the door. We love May and would highly recommend to anyone with fur babies!!

name: Jacob Stewart
text: The staff were extremely friendly and professional. The Vet was very nice and knowledgeable.

name: Robert C
text: Took great care of our dog. Gave him everything he needed and made recommendations to prevent future issues. Open early so I was able to drop him off before work.

name: bob nunya
text: Got my little buddy in quickly. Very friendly and knowledgeable.

name: Alex Smith
text: They are so great with our pets, you can tell they really care about the well being of your pet.

name: Caitlyn Morris
text: Such a good place. Staff is extremely friendly and knowledgeable and the prices are very reasonable. Would recommend for anyone in the area!

name: The Watsons
text: We love Dr. May and his staff!! I have never had a bad experience, we won’t go anywhere else!! Highly recommend.

name: Shalonndra Jackson
text: It was our first visit They were great with Tullulah

name: Nikki Becker
text: Waller and the rest of the staff at May Vetrinary are amazing! He has gone above and beyond for our sweet pup and we are grateful!

name: Thomas gossett
text: My cat was taken on a Friday for urinary blockage (almost $600 also was sold prescription cat food for urinary). Was told that we would have to move him to an emergency vet for observation (another $400) They had to reset the catheter the next day. Was originally told 24 to 48 hours recovery. It's been 72 hours. We now have to pick him up from the emergency vet to take him to another vet for observation in the morning ($?), bc he still has blood in his urine and swelling due to the catheter. We are basically at square one and out $1,000, find someone else to take your pets. This clinic offered little to no information regarding his condition which was apparently downplayed. We got more information from the emergency vet then this clinic gave us and they performed the original "surgery" which still had to be redone.

name: Toleetha Driver
text: How they treat the  pets  like human beings

name: mary taylor
text: Fast friendly service. Took good care of my baby

name: Chris Walker
text: Professional and caring with our little rescue kitty Ms Obi.

name: vickie may
text:
Office manager Denise very rude and unprofessional to my elderly mother. Refused care for mom’s sick kitten which later died. Mother had an appointment and got there two hours early in hopes of being worked in. After an hour and half, left and came back before appointment time and was refused service. Dr. May’s staff has always been very accommodating and all vets there excellent. This was uncalled for!

05/10/2020
Mother received her letter from office manager Denise Behrens-Tranel dismissing her as a client from May vet clinic. After the rude way Denise treated her, my mother had no intention of returning. What goes around comes around.

name: Shaundra Wright bbv uhu hv
text: Its Was nothing to change You guys are great Thank u for keeping my baby Smokey Healthy!!

name: Rene Upchurch
text: What a find! Helpful and friendly staff and drs, simple walk-in policy, boarding right next door. Plus, our Cora doesn't freak out when we take her there. Perfect!

name: Tony Bordeaux
text: The staff and doctor’s are always friendly.  Very accommodating and my dogs love going.

name: K Pacpons
text: Very caring staff!  They are all wonderful!  Dr. May is great at what he does and is very caring.  He called a few days after our visit with Tiger to check on him, the fact that he took even just a few minutes out of his busy schedule to check on our fur baby means so much to us!  Thank you for everything!

name: Jeralyn Bowden
text: The service is fast, sufficient, and excellent. Very friendly staff and they take extraordinary care of my cat KC.

name: bea powell
text: Dr. Waller May has been my veterinarian for many years. I always have a good experience there. Dr. Chris Gladney is also so sweet and a caring veterinarian.

name: Janice Jeans
text: Very clean, nice front office staff.  I have only used them for boarding & am well pleased.

name: Cybrdragon
text: As always, fast and friendly. We trust May vet clinic with all our pets!

name: Shannon Murphy
text: Dr. May at May Vet North (across the street from Publix) has taken care of our pups for four years.  I can't say enough nice things about him and his staff.  Service is reasonably priced, prompt, and friendly.  And their smart phone app makes ordering prescription for my pups super easy!  I highly recommend them!

name: Katrina Hubbert
text: We were extremely happy with the services for Bella. everything was wonderfully handled. Our experience was 100% no more could have taken place. Thanks

name: Kameron Wolverton
text: These people are super nice and gentle with my pets. This is a great place for your furry friends.

name: Debbie Benson
text: Dr. May and staff have been so kind and thorough with my dog Sadie!  They seem to truly care about her health and welfare!  I highly recommend them!

name: Zach Harrison
text:
Update: 10/31/18 - these are good people. We had to say goodbye to a dog we loved dearly. They were sensitive, gave us privacy, reassured us, and took care of her. We were worried about the cost as well on top of everything, but it wasn’t much at all from them. We’ll always be grateful.

They’re the best vet we’ve been to. They’re super attentive and care about your pets and want what’s best for them. We’ve had two recently who had some pretty serious illnesses, and they called and checked on both multiple times. They have animals that live at the office, one being an adorable cat that needs extra care. Their prices are good and always listen and do what they can. We’re moving from Northport soon but will be sticking with May.

name: KevinLisa Pate
text: Very Very friendly, and was concerned about our Nova's bee sting, listened to our questions and concerns, and help with everything we needed for our baby!!!!

name: Ann Hall
text: All the people here express their love and concern for my pets.  They never rush through an appointment and go the extra mile to make sure you know of all the options that are available for your pet.  Several years ago, I was referred to Mississippi State for a very perplexing illness for my precious little dog, Tucker.  I was very pleased that they were so intent on seeing he had the best treatment!

name: Robert Melton
text: Good people and services

name: Darlene Perkins
text: Dr Waller May and staff are wonderful! They are so friendly and helpful. I know that they have Miss Lily’s (English bulldog) best interest at heart, just as I do.

name: Mr. Raney
text: I greatly enjoyed the service they provided for my little fur ball. The staff is super friendly and Dr. May is very personable and informative. I even liked the sweet little dogs just walking around aimlessly.

name: Sonya Cowgill
text: We always feel welcomed, from the moment we walk through the door. The staff is friendly and helpful.   I have complete confidence, that our pets will be well cared for and are treated with kindness.

name: Beth Chapman
text: Dr. Gladney recently did surgery on Ripley and Trixie, our rescue kittens from Tuscaloosa Metro Animal Shelter!! She is a wonderful surgeon and kind!!! Kittens doing great! Thank you!

name: Allie
text: They gave my cats the boardgetella shot without contacting me at all & did not tell me they required it. This would have been fine if someone would have contacted me and explained or asked and not just given my cats medicine without my knowledge. My cats also have not stopped sneezing and having a runny nose since I picked them up this morning. Now I have to take them to my primary vet AMC after 9 nights at May vet. I took them here due to AMC being full for boarding over thanksgiving however, we will not be returning to this vet. You can’t just give someone’s animals medicine without telling them you required it & then not even telling me you administered it until I came to pick them up and had extra charges on my bill. Very upset.

name: Valerie Collins
text: Helpful as usual... gave me minimal information I needed

name: Nicholas Hardy
text: Every time I take my dog here, they take really good care of him. The staff is always friendly. After my most recent visit, I received a call the next day to make sure my dog was feeling well. That just goes to show how much they really do care about your pets.

name: Cynthia Pearman
text: May Veterinary Clinic in Northport is a wonderful clinic to take a beloved pet.  Recently, my children adopted a stray cat, and we needed to have her spayed and a rabies shot.  The entire staff was knowledgeable and very friendly.  In fact, before and after the spay surgery I was in contact with a member of the staff about our dear Yoda.  In addition, when the surgery was complete we received a follow up call the next day.  Which I truly appreciated.  Finally, when the time came to have the stitches removed Dr. May and the entire staff were just so nice, they even let my little girls watch which made their day.  I would highly recommend their services to anyone with a furry friend!

name: Joyce Gurich
text: Dr May and staff take wonderful care of my two pups.  Always kind, concerned, caring, competent.  I always know that they will receive excellent health care at May Vet North.  I always recommend to anyone needing a Vet.

name: Ray Copeland
text: We appreciate Dr. May and the staff.  They are caring and helpful.  Our dog Gracie has regular check-ups and boards there as well.   We tell Gracie she is going to Doggie Camp at Camp May!

name: Bernice Harris
text: They are so good with all my dogs they are very loving and caring

name: Amanda Reyes
text: Honestly, the best vet in Tuscaloosa. It's very easy to be seen quickly, even in emergencies. They are so kind and always remember me and my pets!

name: Heather Sullivan
text: We've taken our dogs to Dr. May for four years now. Wonderful, caring and attentive staff. Dr. May treated one of our shelter adoptions for heartworms. He was knowledgeable, articulate and helped us find the best treatment for a manageable fee. Our dog has been heartworm free for three years and is thriving! Great office!

name: Greg Baxley
text: Always friendly people here.

name: Jenna Reardanz
text: I take both my cats here and they are always knowledgeable and friendly. I was especially appreciative of how willing they are to answer all of my questions!

name: deborah khalil
text: My little Yorkiepoo recently had bloody diarrhea so I immediate called Dr May's office. They saw her in a few hours and put my mind at easy. We have used Dr May since  I got her 3 years ago and I have always had a great experiene there. Everyone is so kind and helpful.

name: Anthony Warren
text: Dr. May and his staff are fantastic.

name: Shannon Formby
text: Amazing family owned and operated business. Put your pet in the best hands and use May vet. They are like family!!

name: andrea barry
text: Dr. May and staff have always been wonderful to all of our pets. They are very caring.

name: Coretta Evans
text: Thanks so much for taking care of chewy my baby is doing great back up running and playing oh of course and eating I would recommend any one to take their dog to may veterinary....

name: Gloria Pittman
text: Wonderful  place to take your pet. Everyone is so caring and they show it with each pet.....

name: Pam Sorrell
text: I am writing this review because it is very important to me that I let everyone, especially Dr May and his staff know how much I appreciate the respect and dignity that they used in treating my precious Kira during one of the most difficult decisions our family has ever had to make. My Kira is a Pitt bull dog who has not always been the easiest pet to treat. Although she was never aggressive towards people she was a little unfriendly with other animals.  Therefore,  the staff of the Dr. May veterinary clinic always provided her with her own entrance and exit and they were never judgemental or unkind to her.  We recently had to have her put to sleep.  I have been with her for 11 years and to say that she was a part of our family doesn't even come close to describing the relationship my entire family had with her.  I will forever miss my sweet Kira.  Dr. May and his staff treated us with the utmost respect during this horrific process and for that,  I am forever grateful.  I want everyone to know that the May Veterinary family offer the best veterinarian services I have  ever used. Thank you from the bottom of my heart!

name: michael graham
text: They are a very family oriented practice

name: Mary Lowery
text: My Baby Bear is only 6 pounds and so fearful of shots and doctor's offices. Dr. May was so patient and gentle with him!

name: Shea Cole
text: Wonderful people.

name: nancy moseley
text: All ways great!!!

name: John Bell

name: Jeanie

name: Roxy Glasscock

name: coldstart tv
text: We took a little rabbit there and the dr was so nice and caring for the rabbit he was honest with us from the start its a wonderful place the staff was also nice this one was Northridge location

name: Paul Bagwell
text: They take good care of rufus for me

name: Sassy Pants
text: Dr. May has been my dogs veterinarian for several years.  He has been always been wonderful and I have always loved the staff.  He has taken care of my boston terrier throughout several things she had gone through in her 11 years.  Over the weekend she became very sick, I needed to take her in and Dr. May was out of town and they referred me to The Northridge location.  They were also great.  My sweet girl passed away this past Monday.  It was heartbreaking!  We would have wanted her regular vet (Dr. Waller May) to be the one to see her, because we were more comfortable with him, but if anyone else could help in this time the Northridge location did an amazing job and Saturday I received a signed condolences card from the entire staff at May Veterinary North.
