text: I went to the large animal clinic for my goat, and they were amazing. Doctor Copedge was very knowledgeable and the students were great too. Everyone was very caring and did all they could to help.

name: Elise Hancock
text: Our German Shepherd  Bella required surgery (cranial cruciate rupture) and the care she received from everyone she came in contact with was absolutely superb. In particular, Dr. Howard King, Clint Martin took great care of her as if she was there own.  We are so grateful to all she came in contact with at your superb facility." Thank you so much.

name: Batpuppies Tahtah
text: Tuskegee posted on their site today that they were being attacked by activist groups. In fact, a lot of people are up in arms because they use live animals that they acquire from the county pound. They say they only take animals that are scheduled for euthanasia. That is not a true statement either. All of the animals they have taken for LIVE experimentation and suffer terminal surgery. They claim they take very good care of the animals. In fact, every animal there whether small or large are fed the exact same amount of food once a day - 1 cup of food. They claim that this practice is done by every other vet university when, in fact, it is not. This practice is only done by three schools total in the US and Tuskegee is the lowest rated school. There are other ways to train future vets without inhumane extreme cruelty to animals. We would not do this to our children. Then why are they allowed to do this. All animals are part of someone’’s family. Those animals would have been taken to shelters, no kill shelters, etc, so that they can find homes and not be tortured to death. Wake up people. This should not be the kind of people we are. Ever.

name: Rochelle Matlock-Charlie
text: My pets have been  customers of the vet clinic for years now.  I love the treatment my dogs get as well as how professional the students and staff are. The clinic is always clean they also board animals. Go Skegee!

name: Sheila Sanders
text:
Tuskegee University Small Animal Hospital is the best. My Snoopy has been ill for over a year and after so many test, ultrasounds, x-rays and false diagnosis I was given a referral to have Snoppy be seen by Dr. Martin and her staff in April of this year. After our second drive from Atlanta Snoopy was finally diagnosed by her and her team. (After trying to get the same results for 11 months from his hospital in Atlanta he's been a patient of for 10 plus years. ) Dr. Mendoza was our first Doctor that helped take care of my baby when he had to stay a few nights to Catlin who on Ranks Supreme. Everyone that knows me knows how much I Love My Baby Snoopy and how I hate to leaving him in the hospital, but Catlin calms my soul. She called everyday for a week sometimes twice a day to give me an update on Snoopy. She  always made me feel at ease after every conversation. Snoopy was discharged over a week ago and she still called after his discharge almost everyday checking on my baby and offering me solutions. Unfortunately Snoopy is back but with the help form Catlin and Dr. Martin I think this time around the procedure they have suggested for Snoopy will get him on the road to Recovery. I've yet to meet Catlin but I hear that today September 13th is her birthday. Have a great one and I hope you will stop in to check on Snoopy. I hope the new person Morgan stepping in to fill your shoes will carry the same torch you did!

PS Morgan will as soon I submitted this post. A few minutes later Morgan called to give me an update on Snoopy now I can rest a little easier tonight.

name: M. Moore
text:
I wish I could post 4 stars, but I cannot. My experience was anything but pleasant. My Miniature Pinscher was misdiagnosed by Dr. Vigg which caused her a major relapse and a 1 week stay at Auburn University Small Animal Hospital.

My Min Pin has a neurological condition and was under the care of the Neuro Team from UGA. 3 weeks before she was seen by Dr. Vigg, she was on the lowest dose of Predinisolone and being weaned off. I had travel to work a project in Maryland and my Aunt was watching her. My fur baby was not eating and drinking and showed signs of neck pain. She was taken to TU Vet school and Dr. Vigg was made aware of her MUE condition.

1 week later, Mahogany could no longer walk and had to be rushed to the ER. The Neuro at Auburn University called me and inquired about her visit with Dr. Vigg and after talking with my Aunt about her med management, it was discovered he made my Aunt take her off the meds and this was why she had the severe relapse . He advised my Aunt to take her off the prescribed Prednisolone by her Neurologist, stating it was making her sick and to keep her crated for 90 days.

Mahogany's meds tripled and her re-checks which were every 3 months changed to monthly.

I could not get TU to call me back and had to almost harrass them before I was able to speak with Dr. Bellamy who refused to address any wrong doing and stated, "what do you want me to do about it! She's a dog!" Dr. Bellamy was unprofessional and I questioned why she wanted to be a Vet. If these animals are only "animals" to her and not a life worth protecting, why is she in the field to care for them?

Dr. Bellamy nor Dr. David McKenize have replied to emails, although they promised they would.

Please make sure you think throughly before taking your pet to this Hospital. I know mistakes happen, however; as a Medical entity, there is a duty to make sure you are licensed to practice in a specialty and Dr. Vigg was not. Dr. Bellamy told me he did not have to be but that is not true and the Neurologists at Auburn and UGA confirmed this. They said you NEVER pull a canine off a steroid suddenly as their system will go into shock and if he were a Neuro, he would know this.

A lot of progress was made to get Mahogany back on track and Dr. Vigg's negligence caused the Neuros to go back to the drawing board which upset them. They told me he never should have treated her for a Neuro condition as he is not a licensed Neurologist.

Please think twice before coming to Tuskegee University Vet Hospital. Auburn is far more rounded and the professionalism/bed-side manner exercised along with certified Medical Professionals who treat your pet with care is reasonating. It gives you peace of mind to know your pet will be given the utmost care. TU, on the other hand, views them as 4-legged property with no regard to the level of care amd treatment they are given.

name: Its Me
text: Dr. Parra is honestly the best large animal  Veterinarian hands down! Very thorough and attentive in all he does! Tuskegee University over Auburn any day!

name: Caitlin Berman
text: This school should be ashamed in letting a student graduate who pretended to be a rescue and sent 50 horses to slaughter. She was arrested twice. Unbelievable.

name: Alexis Adams
text: Friendly service

name: Meghan Jenkins
text: TERRIBLE! Dr. Bellamy is HORRIFIC and bringing that school DOWN TO THE GROUND.

name: Edwin Williams
text: Great staff and doctors!

name: Ashley Mink
text: I highly recommend this place!! This was the fourth vet I took my very sick kitten too and they didn’t even hesitate and told me to bring him in right away and took care of him all day and even offered for me to bring him back the next day since I had no one to monitor him and feed him regularly while I was at work. I could tell everyone here genuinely cared and it was a great feeling. Unfortunately he didn’t make it and the next morning, they called to check on me. Thank you to everyone that helped Shiloh and fought for him.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave this kind review. I'm very sorry about sweet little Shiloh. Please let us know if there is anything we can do for you in the future!

name: Elizabeth Bailey
text: If you want good people to treat you well and treat your animal like it's the only animal around you need to go here these people are the absolute best

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review! We really appreciate it!

name: Jessica Keith
text: Took our 7 week old kitten here for her first round of shots and they were so sweet and helpful. They loved on our kitten and answered all of our questions! Will definitely be using them as our vet from now on.

resp.text: Thank you for reviewing us! It was a pleasure to meet you and care for Molly!

name: Tiffany Lipska
text: We took our German Shepherd to doggie daycare for a couple days while we camped out. They treated my puppy like family and were super nice! He came home happy each day!

name: John Carr
text: During the past twenty-four years, Dr. Whitfield has cares for our four legged family in a most superior way. This includes procedures without anesthesia due to the old age of the pet. We have developed a long standing friendship between his family and ours over this period of time. Once when our Cocker was experiencing seizures Doctor Whitfield made a home visit. Hard to beat!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review. We are grateful for your loyalty and love having you and Freddie as part of our family!

name: Jerry Warnock
text: All of the staff demonstrate a caring and professional attitude.  They genuinely care for the animals and clients well being.  I have never been disappointed with their grooming or  medical care of my dog.  In fact, I suspect they spoil her a bit as she does not hesitate to go with them when I drop her off.

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us this great review! Your suspicions are correct! How could we resist such a "Precious" face?!

name: John Morris
text: I’ve been going to Oakview for almost 16 years. From the beginning they have been professional, reliable caring, and have become like family. They were the first veterinary clinic I used when I got my first pup. Wonderful staff and very personable. It’s like having a vet in a small town. I will continue using them for our veterinary medicine needs for years to come.

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave this review! We appreciate you trusting us with Acre and Bo's care!

name: Robert Chaisson
text: Friendly, caring and knowledgeable people, who are always helpful and caring when it comes to your pets need, would recommended 1000%

resp.text: Thank you for reviewing us! We have loved caring for, and watching Warrior grow.

name: Amy Serrano
text: I love this place!!!!!   Everybody is so caring.  I trust them implicitly with my cat.  Dr.  Robinson always follows up to make sure her suggestion/treatment has worked.  She always takes time to answer my questions.  Way to go, Oakview!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review. We are grateful for your loyalty and love having you as a part of the family!

name: Kim Winsett
text: All the staff is extremely friendly!!!  Never had any issues with anyone.  Everyone is super nice and love animals.  They do not force services on you and always answer all your questions.  My girls are not afraid to visit the vet.

name: Amanda Laddie
text: Swapped vets due to several repeat issues with our prior. The service at Oak View was quick, professional and comprehensive. I appreciated the friendliness of all staff members and the care they had for our furbabies.

resp.text: Thank you so much for leaving us this review! Please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you!

name: Shay Steel
text: Kristin, the groomer, does an amazing job on my two dogs. They are always so clean, smell so good and have the cutest haircuts when they leave. Most importantly, my dogs are happy. The staff at Oakview is kind and caring towards the animals in their care. What a great place!

name: Ellen Neely
text: The best vets around.  Love them.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to review us. We have loved caring for John Parker and Kodiak as they have grown up. Thank you for your loyalty and trust!

name: Melissa J
text: Oak View Animal Hospital has been beyond kind. When I first went there with my new puppy, they wrote me a handwritten note welcoming me to the clinic and had also thanked me for working as a nurse during Covid. Since that time they have given my dog personalized care and answered my questions as an over-anxious dog mom. They also get my pup in quickly if i have any concerns and send me reminders about appointments. Very good vet clinic to go to!

name: Clarissa Powell
text:
Love the staff and Veterinarians at Oakview!

They are all so helpful and knowledgeable and take excellent care of our furbabies.

Service and compassion for animals is #1

resp.text: We appreciate the sweet review! Thanks for trusting us with your furbabies!

name: Brooke McClellan
text: The staff is so friendly and really cares!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5-stars! We really appreciate it! We look forward to seeing you and Cash again!

name: Melissa Hull
text: I have had great experiences with all of the doctors and staff at Oak View! I always recommend them when I get the chance. When I had to put down my 17 yo dog they were so incredibly accommodating and respectful. Dr. Robinson was there to help me along the way!

name: Rider 0401
text: Such a wonderful experience today!  I am a first timer to Oak View and took my newly adopted pomeranian for shots and grooming. The entire staff was so friendly, knowledgeable and took excellent care of my little guy!  Kristin did a fabulous job grooming him, he looks adorable!  Thanks for taking such good care of Hamlet today, y'all are the best!

name: BisonAP
text: They've been a part of my life for a number of years. All the dogs I've had entrusted to their care get the sincerest of effort and the utmost in kindness & compassion, which both animals and their owners can use from time to time. It's not "just a job" with them. They really, really care. And that goes a long way with me. 🐾🐾♥️👍

name: Chasity Gilmer
text: I love using Oak View Animal Hospital for my puppies grooming needs. I have taken all three of my dogs there and they have come home smelling amazing and super soft. The employees are so sweet and patient will my big pups. I will continue to take all three in the future.

name: Tony Oddo
text: Always show me the professionals that they are. Take utmost care of my boy Alex...and always check back with me on care and test results. All around...good people!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us this sweet review! We always look forward to seeing you and Alex!

name: Amanda Counts
text: Very kind, open lines of communication, took great care of our pets while we were on vacation.

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us this review! Please let us know if there is anything we can do for you in the future!

name: Dorothy Sarvaunt
text: I have been bringing my babies here for years and let me just say that even with the pandemic they have gone above and beyond. They are always there when we need them, they are all well trained and professional and above all else they truly care about  your pet and you! I even get follow up calls after a visit from the Dr. to make sure everything is ok. I Can't speak highly enough of this office. Thank you so much!

name: Sarah Tamburello
text: I LOVE this vet. They take care of your dogs as if they are one of their own. I highly recommend!!

name: Sarah Mayfield
text: Oakview staff have been with us through five dogs and four cats. Need I say more?  Everyone there has, provided up-to-date care,  charged reasonable fees, been kind, and showed compassion, especially when our pets got terminal diseases, needed comfort care, and eventually had to be put to sleep.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind review Mrs. Mayfield! We will always be here for you if you need anything!

name: Morgan Pettus
text: Oak view is the best!! I take both of my Boston’s there and couldn’t ask for a better place.  Great customer service and so understanding and able to fit in ASAP.

name: MaryJo Sewell
text: The techs and doctors are Oak View are top-notch!  We recently had to have both of our dogs put down which was devastating for our family.  Dr. Robinson, Julie and the rest of the crew were so kind and attentive to us during (and after) this difficult time.  I absolutely give them the highest recommendation in the world.  Your pets will be blessed over and over to have any of these doctors & their staff take care of your furry friends!

name: Larae Ganger
text: Dr. Robinson is great and is so patient with my VERY ANXIOUS great dane.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review! We hope Chapel is doing well!

name: Whitney Hackworth
text: The staff was great! They were very attentive and prompt. I especially loved that the vet came to the car to explain everything to me so I could understand completely! I will definitely be changing over to this clinic.

name: Victoria Covarrubias
text: Absolutely love them. Just started taking out new fur baby about two months ago and they have been wonderful. Very friendly staff!!!

name: Kaitlyn Poff
text: I have been taking my goldendoodle here to be groomed for about 6 months now and love it! He comes back looking like a doodle and not a poodle, and always so happy! Would recommend Oak View to anyone looking for a great groomer and vet!

name: Rock Fish
text: The entire staff shows that they "truly" care about my pets!

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us  a 5 star review! We really appreciate it!

name: Sheryl Sheppard
text: I took my fur baby for a meet and greet, she is a 6 yr old mini schnauzer and although we live in Pelham now, we were driving to our long time veterinarian in Trussville. I wanted a clinic close to us. After requesting an appointment, the office contacted me and were very helpful and friendly. We had the opportunity to meet one of the vet techs and a veterinarian, who both understood  her and her personality. I only gave 4 stars since this clinic is only doing “curbside” visits, when many places have opened since the COVID pandemic. I wasn’t made aware of this until we arrived and honestly would have postponed our appointment until we could be seen inside. I would have rather see the interaction between the staff and my dog. We’ll probably go for her annual appointment for vaccines and see how that goes.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review! I apologize that our curbside policy wasn't addressed when you made your appointment, but I am happy to announce that our lobby is now open! Please let us know if there is anything we can do for you in the future!

name: Janice Eubank
text: Oakview is like taking our dogglettes to a Pediatrician’s office. They truly care about our little dudes, remember their names and treat us humans the same way. Covid has created some distance in our face to face interactions but we still feel the same way. Julie Jordan Evans and Brandy Skinner consistently treat us as family. Dr Robinson and Dr. Robinson, are not only experts in Small Animal Surgery and Diagnostics, they are also experts in the soft skills of relaying results and treatment in common language. There’s no Vet Clinic that is comparable.

name: Jade Sisk-trott
text: Staff is caring and listened to my every detail about what is going on with my diabetic dog, my elderly dog and all my cats. Much respect. And Sydney is the best receptionist, always sweet and helpful.

name: west W
text: Wonderful experience and very professional. Our Sunny loves Oak View.

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us a review! Sunny is always a sweet boy!

name: Chloe M. Gooden Ministries
text:
Friendly
Quick service
Nice
Didn’t do unnecessary things to raise prices
Will be back for his annual care

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave us a review! Let us know if there is anything else we can do for Milo!

name: Jennifer Kimbrough
text: I REALLY loved Dr. Early. She seemed to really actually care about my GiGi and was so kind to me too! :) GiGi’s excited to see her again in 3 weeks!

name: Maggie Shannon
text: Dr. Robinson and the entire staff at Oak View Animal Hospital are exceptional. They are absolutely the best in total care, follow up, kindness and genuine interest for their 4-legged patients in addition to giving treatment details and compassion to pet parents!

name: Phillip Campbell
text: Everyone there is so friendly and compassionate. We would not go anywhere else!

resp.text: Thank you for trusting us all these years! We love Aunt Bee!

name: Meghan Hall
text: Thanks for getting us in quickly to help our Nala kitty. She's feeling much better and I really appreciate the doctor calling to check in on her! Love Oak View!!

name: Nancy Paschal
text: We are from out of town and our dog became ill. They fit her into their schedule and she is feeling better now. They were friendly and professional.

name: Michelle Spann
text: We have used Oak View for all of our animals. Dr. Robinson is very personable and knowledgeable. We would highly recommend her to anyone looking for a good veterinarian!

name: annie lynch
text: Everyone at Oakview at Fabulous!!!  We love Julie, the staff and all the Doctors!!   They are the best around and very reliable!

name: Traci White
text: They treat Leo well and Sydney makes sure he’s happy.

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave us a review! We all love Leo!

name: omar pittman
text: They are on time and very nice. They take care of your baby as if they were theirs. That’s what you want to pay for when you could go anywhere.

name: Theresa Moore
text: Dr. Robinson and Julie always take care of my Mia!  Never questions the care she gets when she is at the Clinic.  Mia loves going to see them and can't wait to get out of the car!

name: Christina Mahaffey
text: The entire staff is great! Oak View has taken care of our fur babies for a long time and I trust them to be caring and professional

name: Courtney Waldron
text: Dr. Robinson is the best!   My dog only “smiles” at 4 people and she’s one of them. Even though my dog received a shot and dye in her eye during her visit, she still loves her. I drive all the way from alabaster to Oak View because of how nice everyone treats my dogs.

name: Bailey Mills
text: I brought in my dog when I first got her. She was older and I didn’t know the kinda shape she was in. I had a lot of questions and concerns about taking care of her. The doctor helped me work it out and answered all of my questions. I felt more prepared to be a puppy parent after taking my dog to OakView. I was extremely pleased and will continue to take her there.

name: Brian J Less
text: This has been a staple in Pelham for years for veterinary care from back when Murphy was there to now. Great place!!!!

name: Queenmommy Murphy
text: We love everyone at Oak View. They genuinely care about their clients and pets.

name: Lyn Hughes
text: Great people, caring staff! Can’t imagine going elsewhere...

name: Sam Cook
text: First time wellness exam was free and they all enjoyed my dog. Gave me some recommendations for treating his separation anxiety as well.

name: Michael Rowland
text:
We love Dr Robinson
She’s so compassionate and I love that she personally calls to update us on our dog and also check in on our dog to make sure he is ok.

name: Chuck McBryde
text: I didn’t expect to be able to go back with my dog but I did get to and I think that was huge for him.

resp.text: Chuck, we are so happy to hear you had a positive experience with us! We loved meeting you and Cash!

name: Alexandra Smith
text: My big weim boy, Willie Nelson, had to spend a week here while we were in between selling our home and moving to another. Daphne, the kennel manager left a sweet note about Willie's stay and built a feeding system for him with the food we brought. Willie is usually a very inconsistent eater but it seems like he is going to stick to it now. Pricing is always great and fair... especially for the care given. Thank you Daphne and all the wonderful staff!

name: Melissa Paruszkiewicz
text: Dr. Robinson is the best! She always takes time to answer questions, and I don’t feel dumb or like I’m a bother to her.

name: Leigh Morgan
text: Love the staff at oak view! And they love my pups!

name: Jenny McCallum
text: Dr. Early and Julie are so wonderful kind, wonderful and gentle. They are both so welcoming to my dogs.  Julie knows how to make my skittish dog, Jackson, feel comfortable with lots of love and peanut butter! Oak View is so amazing, I am so glad I found them. I always feel heard and never rushed! Thank you for always caring for my fur babies!!

name: marsha bowers
text: I was very grateful that Dr. Whitfield was so patient with my incessant questioning.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. Let us know if there is anything else we can do for Pebbles!

name: Phaedra Galloway
text: Dr Whitfield has cared for our pets for over 20 years. The other doctors and staff I’ve seen at Oak view have been excellent as well.

name: A Google User
text: Love these folks!!! Everyone is so nice and accommodating.  They give full attention to my dog's needs.  Highly recommend!!

name: melanie long
text: Dr Early is very sweet and relatable

name: Cami Velazquez
text: Oak View has been amazing to work with! Our puppy is always able to be seen in a timely manner, and they send helpful emails with reminders about health maintenance. They are always willing to answer all of our many questions and provide excellent care of our puppy! I would highly recommend Oak View to anyone in search of a vet!

name: Johnny Carmack
text: Prompt, professional personal touch.

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave us this review! Thank you for trusting us with CiCi & Cookie's care!

name: Lisa Phipps
text: Staff is always kind. Never had to wait very long to be seen.

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us this review! We really appreciate it!

name: Betsy Schmidt
text: I love Oak View! My family has been using them for years.

name: Cody C
text: The docs and staff here genuinely care.

name: Allen Goodwine
text: Whitfield is so caring.  Willing to take time to speak with us on phone.  Then staff so helpful and friendly.

name: Kelly Brennan
text: I brought in a rescue we named Roscoe. The staff we very professional, extremely sweet, but most important, loving and helpful to this amazing pup who unexpectedly made his way into our lives. They went above and beyond what they needed to in order to make sure he is healthy! They answered all my questions thoroughly and took their time, even though we were the last appointment (that we were able to book right before lunch) of the day (on a Monday at that!). They even made him a goody bag with treats, doggy bags, and a toy for him!! Outstanding care. Kudos to this practice!

name: Debra Milton
text: Everyone was terrific, my sheltie warmed up to the Vet and staff (which he NEVER does) immediately that in itself made me comfortable.  Kudos to the groomer she did an awesome job with our sheltie.  Thanks, everyone.  Debra Milton

name: Butch Burbage
text: I am a long time patron of Oak View. I have always received first class service from both doctors and techs every time I’ve been in. I trust them completely with all of our pets. I wholeheartedly recommend you use this facility for all of your pet needs. On this particular visit, they were able to see my dog Izzy right away for a concern I had. Everything turned out great! Thank you so very much for your care and treatment of Izzy.

name: Bruce Bursi
text: Always kind to my super anxious dog and so nice to deal with.

name: Carolyn S Harrison
text: The staff were kind and professional, as was Dr. Early. They all clearly care a great deal for animals. The price was comparable to other animal clinics. This was our first visit, since moving here from Montgomery. I am so thrilled that we have found a good veterinarian were we live now.

name: Jan Bailey
text:
We have been going to Oak View for 10 years at least. Love the staff and Dr.'s, they are all very helpful and caring.
Had dental work done today, several teeth pulled. Dr. called me after procedure and let me know what all they had to do and assured me my Maya was doing well. Love this place.

Jan Bailey

name: John McQueen
text: Exceptionally great group of Veterinarian doctors that really care for your pets!

name: Kim Downs
text: Our first visit was on Wed and I really liked Dr. Early. Even with Covid restrictions, I felt like she took the time to answer all my questions and make suggestions to help me properly care for Shelby!

name: haley arnott
text:
this was my first time coming here with my dog and they were absolutely amazing!! so friendly, not overly priced at all.. my dog absolutely loved it and she came home so happy.
very, very professional.. i’m going to start coming there regularly.
thank you to everyone for taking care of my sweet pup today!

name: Robert Milstead
text: Outstanding Pet Care Family!

name: Thomas Brown
text: Kristen did a fantastic job!  Best haircut Duchess has had in a long time!

name: Cam AP
text: Vets here are friendly, reasonable prices also

name: Anna Strutzenberg
text: They allowed animal control to take a friends dog away by animal control and then be euthanized. She called multiple times per week to check on her fur baby to make sure he was safe. They lied to her throughout those weeks knowing full and well what they had done.

name: Linda Lemoine
text: I was very pleased with my cat grooming experience. My cat is Phoebe and she had an appointment on 08-14.

name: Lorena Juarez
text: I just adopted two Pomeranians and I decided to take them to Oak View Animal Hospital for a check up. I was surprised of how professional they were and I really liked how they explained everything they did. I highly recommend them.

name: Amanda Dinsmore
text: Dr. Robinson feels like part of our family- she certainly takes care of our four-legged babies.

name: Dan Mabie
text:
Oakview is a truly excellent clinic. We've received some of the best medical care imaginable from Dr. Robinson and Dr. Early, as well as all the staff. They helped treat our dog through chemo, and made it a bearable experience for our corgi, but they also gave us all the options and kept us on the right track throughout the whole process, making sure that we were considering the health and happiness of our pet first and not pushing us to any decision.

We drive an extra 30 minutes to go to Oakview and are happy to do it every time.

name: Patrick J Henry
text: We were attended to right away, given medicine for the dog, and as usual, everything went find.

name: Bryant Cline
text: Excellent communication. Great customer service with a smile.

name: ellana lecroy
text: Dr Whitfield and staff ROCKS❤

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us this review! We love getting to see Roxy Tutu!

name: Clif Render
text: We love the staff at Oak View and the care and kindness that they have consistently shown to me and my family members (both the furry ones and the non-furry ones, too)! They've seen us through fostering, adopting, and navigating the painful process of terminal cancer. They've become a part of our extended family and I recommend that you consider making them a part of yours as well.

name: D Thompson
text: My experience with Oak View has not been very good since Dr. Whitfield left.  The techs  are very courteous and helpful but the new young vets lack the experience, knowledge, and compassion that is needed for our furry family members.

name: Nelson Bates
text: Update: The vet techs lied to me. They euthanized our dog without a court order and so much as a phone call. I gained this information from the Manager of the city of pPelham. We boarded our dog with this clinic on June 1, 2020. We are homeless because of covid. My wife has contacted them several times checking on him and discussed services that they offer. We got a coupon via PetSmart and Shelby humane to have him neutered in Irondale. When we went to get our dog the clinic had adopted him out. Instead of being professional and admitting their mistake and helping us to bing our family member home they blamed my wife. They said that they attempted to contact us. They did not. Because we refused the $475 quote does not mean we care any less for our animal. His name is Axle And is a blonde Rot/Lab mix. He had to have been adopted the last 3 days because she had just declined their over priced  neuter service. We went to bring him home today and they said he had been adopted. They hung up on us numerous times and failed to provide any help. We want our dog.

name: Molly Bennett
text: My first experience taking my pet to Oak View was wonderful.  Caring staff, great hours, perfect location.  Dr. Elizabeth Robinson is the best!  I highly recommend them.

name: becky filler
text: Lee is awesome, she works front desk and always tries to help. Dr. Robinson is so great with my Boston terrier Charlie. You can tell he feels loved. He is always happy to go to the vet.

name: Linda Hall
text: I am from out of state and everyone at the office, the receptionist, the vet techs, and the Dr. were so kind and caring towards me and my sick kitty. They were able to get me in on a Saturday morning for which I am so grateful .

name: Noah Mitchell
text: The Dr’s And staff are all amazing and great people and provide great service for your pets. They always take care of any concerns I have and follow up with phone calls after the visit to make sure everything is good.

resp.text: Noah - Thanks for sharing your thoughts about Oak View Animal Hospital.  Glad we are able to provide you peace of mind and give you the answers you need and deserve. We appreciate you recommending us to other pet owners and are thankful for the kind words & feedback.

name: KD Burchfield
text: The staff and docs at Oak View are amazing! They are always so kind, ready to help, and appointments are on time and thorough. They are gentle and understanding with animals, prices are very reasonable too. They have been taking care of my little @chica.lulu for 6 years and now our newest addition, 14yo Nacho. We HIGHLY recommend them!

resp.text: KD - We appreciate you recommending Oak View Animal Hospital to other pet owners!  Thanks!

name: Rebecca Davis McClard
text: The entire staff is very kind and professional. You can tell that they love the animals as much as the owners. I am embarressed to say I do not recall the name of the young lady who assisted Dr. Robinson with my kitten Myth, but she was very sweet, very informative, and over all very gentle with Myth (plus I think he liked her and that is always a sign of a good person to me). Dr. Robinson was cheerful, informative, and takes the care of her patients seriously and for that I am very thrilled to have her as the vet for my cats.

resp.text: Rebecca Welcome to our family at Oak View Animal Hospital! Thank you for the feedback & taking the time to share your thoughts. We look forward to being your partners in your cat's health.

name: Heather Ramsey
text: The people at Oak View are wonderful. They have loved and cared for my dog for 7 years almost like he was their own! We have a new puppy and we took her right in for a check up with Dr. Elizabeth, who is wonderful. I had a couple of vets before I moved to this area and they ran the gamut from lazy/didn't care to very expensive/pushy sales, and at Oak View I've experienced none of that. They genuinely care, their prices are reasonable, and they LOVE animals. :) I highly recommend to anyone looking for a new vet.

name: Kimberly Bavali
text: Dr. Price and Dr. Robinson take care of our dogs, Lucy and Cody.  We could not be more pleased with the quality of the treatment they receive. We have complete confidence in their expertise.  Beyond that, we greatly appreciate their kindness, warmth and personal approach.  They are just wonderful!  What a great staff as well!  The whole practice reflects a dedication to their mission.

name: Diann Hendon
text: I've always been pleased with the service they offer. Their kindness and concern for my dog is their greatest asset.  No question goes unanswered.  Also, it's great to get a call checking to see how my dog is doing........proves they care about their patients.  Everyone who works there is friendly and cares about everyone who comes to see them (pets and owners).  I will continue to take my pet there as long as I have a pet.

name: Laurie Howard
text: I love everyone that works here. Julie is my favorite. You all care, y’all are friendly, you love the animals. You don’t make it all about the money. Love you all. Thank you from Laurie, Nik, Charlee, and Cooper.

name: Kim Weaver
text: There was no wait time and I was in and out very quickly. Dr. Robinson is very knowledgeable and very helpful. The receptionist is very nice. The tech was great, and the Hospital Manager Brandy is amazing and very helpful. I wouldn't take my pets anywhere else!

resp.text: Kim - We appreciate you & your pets being part of our family at Oak View Animal Hospital! Thank you for recommending Oak View Animal Hospital to other pet owners.

name: Madelyn P
text:
I’ve always had great service here and felt like my pets and even my family was cared for.

Several years back we had a family pet put to sleep here. He was twelve, and it was done in the most respectful, quiet, and dignified way possible. I really appreciated the staff and how genuine and empathetic everyone was.

Now we have two more family pets and I have to come up here with my (almost twin) babies. A technician or the secretary always helps me get my children and pets in and out in one safe trip.

I do not know the name of the technician that my son loves so much, but she is always here during the mornings and picks him up and carries him around and distracts him while I’m talking to the vet and waiting for my turn.

10/10 I’d recommend this vet to anyone

resp.text: Madelyn - THANK YOU! We appreciate you & your pets being part of our family at Oak View Animal Hospital! Thank you for recommending Oak View Animal Hospital to other pet owners and for all your kind words about our team.

name: Dana Tapia, Realtor at RE/MAX of Orange Beach
text: A friend of my daughter's had her five pound kitten spayed and two kitty shots and the bill was $452. That is outrageous. I have no knowledge of the level of care but, I do feel that she was taken advantage of. We do lots of rescue work and have never seen charges like this. Lesson learned, never send a kid to a vet clinic like this one with her pet. I hate leaving a bad review but feel like a warning is necessary.

resp.text: Dana - we wish you would contact us directly with your concerns.  Then we could explain what was agreed upon before any services were performed.  Since you are not a client, we realize you do not know us and that Oak View Animal Hospital prides ourselves on treating each client like family and each patient like our own pet.  Our veterinarian spoke with the client about this situation directly and took steps to alleviate her concerns.

name: MR
text: I’ve been using Oak View for 9 years. Drs. Price and Robinson took great care of my dog then, and my dogs since. Dr. Robinson is always very thorough and listens and responds to all my questions. All are helpful and have been compassionate throughout the lives of the three dogs I’ve brought in to Oak View.

resp.text: We appreciate you & your dogs being part of our family for all these years!! Thank you for recommending Oak View Animal Hospital to other Pelham pet owners.  Thanks for sharing your thoughts about Oak View!

name: Laurabi Lace
text: I recently got a puppy and asked my friends and coworkers to recommend a good vet. Everyone I talked to said Oak View is the best. A few had stories of other vets they had used that they were not happy with. They are so sweet to our little girl. We are very happy with them.

resp.text: Welcome to the Oak View Animal Hospital's family! Thank you for allowing us to care for you and your puppy. We are your partner in your pet's health and here to answer any questions or concerns you might have. Appreciate you sharing your thoughts!

name: Monica Moore
text: I have had so many positive experiences with this vet.  The vet personally called several times to check on my fur baby after surgery.  We went in for another issue and the vet personally called to check on her to make sure she was improving as hoped.  Would recommend them to anyone looking for a vet!!  Added plus the front desk lady is super sweet and helpful.

She remembers you and your pets names. You dont have to tell her who you are when you come in. Great People and God Bless you all.

name: Sara Downs
text: We just recently moved to Pelham and Oak View Animal Hospital is at the end of our neighbor hood! We took one of our two dogs there for her yearly check up and everyone from the front desk to the vet assistant to the doctor were great and very friendly. We loved the Dr. Robinson, she was very nice, took time with us and answered all the questions that we had. One weekend we had my brother in law's dog with us and noticed that he had a couple of fleas and called them on Saturday morning and asked if there was anyway that we could come and get a flea pill for him even though he has never been seen there before and she said of course and was very helpful!! I would recommend them to everyone!!

text: Oak View has taken care of my furry children for almost 16 years; starting with our lovely lady of a dachshund, Lucy; whom we lost to the "Rainbow Bridge" a long time ago, through our grumpy lady, Callie, the tortoise shell cat, who was never pleasant to them, and on to our current pair of feline girls who they take very good care of.  A little over two months ago, we had to make the difficult decision to let Callie go.  The vets and staff at Oak View were very supportive to Callie and us and we could not have asked for better people to be with us at a very difficult time.  I will never forget what they did for us then and what they continue to do.  Blessings to everyone there.

I will never change vet clinics!

resp.text: We appreciate you being part of our family all these years! Thank you for recommending Oak View Animal Hospital to other pet owners.

name: j w
text: Great!

name: Whitney Gay
text: Dr. Robinson, Dr. Price and all of the staff at Oak View are amazing. We started our dog's care here right after we adopted her from the humane society. We loved how she was treated and how we were treated. After that we transferred our cat's care here, because we were not satisfied with our other vet and had had such a good experience with Oak View. They treated our cat's chronic and severe UTI and he hasn't had one in 2 years; where as at the other vet we felt like he was not being fully treated and was having unnecessary testing for his diagnosis. In Sept. 2013 we noticed that our dog was not acting like herself and it was after hours, so we took her to the ER vet and they misdiagnosed her with gastritis. We took her to Dr. Price the next day because she had gotten severely worse. Within minutes he diagnosed her with an IMHA, which is a very serious, usually fatal, diagnosis. He sat down with me and explained the disease and treatment course. He stayed with her through the night while she received a blood transfusion, to ensure that she didn't have a reaction to it. He even called me late that night to give me an update. Now nine months later she is her perky self. I would never trust my pets to anybody but Oak View! They are so compassionate, caring and knowledgeable. You won't find a better vet in the Birmingham area!

name: Jeanette Proctor
text: Treat us and our pets like family,  love Oak View! Absolutely recommend them to anyone in need of veterinary care for their pets.  Also offer expert grooming and boarding services.

text: We found Oak View while fostering for a local rescue group. I immediately could tell how much they cared about the animals *and* the people. There have been several times when he has called over the weekend or in the evenings just to check on our pet who was not feeling well. In all my years of owning animals, I had also never had a vet who gave you their personal contact information and never hesitated to answer right away! The rest of the people at the clinic are wonderful as well and Renee is always such a joy to see when you come in. We can't imagine ever using another clinic and I would follow Dr Price anywhere he moved his practice!

text: Oak View has been awesome in taking care of my 4 year old french bulldog.   She tends to get into things and the doctors and staff have helped her in the major issues with surgery, as well as, the day to day allergies and illnesses.

name: Lenny Ferguson
text: Actually, maybe a .5 star. Oakview Animal Hospital told me I could adopt a perfectly adorable labradoodle, whom I'd begun loving the moment we met. I'd planned to pick him up the next day. Then I got a voicemail saying they'd given him away to someone else. They did not give me any advance notice. Their priority is animals, but their clients are human. OAH ought to really consider their bedside manner. I know OAH originally wanted this dog to be adopted with his buddy, and that's why they gave them both to someone else. But promising me the dog, who ran to me and put his head in my lap upon meeting, and then giving him to someone else is bloody rotten. I pulled all of my current dog's records from OAH and I will  never go back.

resp.text: Appreciate you sharing your thoughts!  Thank you for being a part Oak View Animal Hospital's family! Dr. Stipes & all of our staff are your partners in your pet's health - and especially want to make sure they are ok after scuffles!

name: Tyler Robbins
text:
My story does not have a happy ending but I thank everyone at Oak View Animal Hospital for making the journey an amazing adventure.

I adopted Max from the Birmingham Humane Society. A year old border collie mix of some sort, who knows? I did my research looking for a vet and asked my friends who they recommended. Oak View came up multiple times so eventually i decided Oak View would be Max and mine's vet. I could not have been happier with the choice. They helped me take my firsts steps as friend and pet owner and made both of us feel like we were part of the family.

Max didn't have his first seizure until 3 months after i adopted him. Oak View walked me through the different reasons a dog can have a seizure and laid out a plan to help moderate or even eliminate Max's seizures. Had Max's condition been epilepsy or even one of the many normal conditions that can cause seizures i can honestly say Oak View would have been able to help him. Through the empirical method we tried everything to help Max. Unfortunately Max's grand mal seizures persisted and i lost a piece of my friend after each one. Dr. Price and Dr. Robinson admitted that this may be beyond their scope and I respect them all the more for it. I took Max to Neurologists, pathologists, and almost every specialist at Auburn and in between. No one could put a finger on it.

Within a year my friend was no longer himself. Oak View helped with his final moments and the level of caring and comfort they provided i will never forget. Thank you Oak View. I can never thank you enough for the love and support you gave Max and me.

If you are debating what Vet to use i highly recommend Oak View.

resp.text: Our sympathies on your loss - you worked hard to help him with his seizures and issues.  Our doctors and staff wished we could have helped Max and provided you with more time with him.  Thank you for working with us and other specialists to try to diagnose his conditions.  We wish the outcome was better for you and him.  Thank you for trusting us and allowing us to care for him.  If you do adopt again, we look forward to having you part of the Oak View family.

name: Bryan Stramer
text:
I cant say enough about this vet clinic.  My great dane was being boarded when his stomach twisted...   he was rushed to this clinic and the vet had to do emergency surgery.  I called as soon as i found out and was told my dog was in surgery and they called me several times with uodates.  The entire staff was friendly and helpful and they helped eleviate sone of the stress i was having.

I would highly recommend using this vet if your pet is ever on need of medical care.

resp.text: We appreciate you sharing your thoughts - thank you! So glad your dog is doing better!

name: Deana McGriff
text: These are the best in the world. They became my vets during the loss of my cat Smokie. They were kind, compassionate, and felt that loss with me. I live near Pell City, but I drive to Pelham to see Dr. Robinson, or Dr. Katie. They know me and my cats by name every time we have a visit. Wouldn't trust my fur babies to anyone else!

resp.text:
Thank you for the kind words! We appreciate you and your cats being part of the Oak View Animal Hospital family.

name: Lauren Lewis
text: The staff is so friendly and helpful and Dr. Price is a top-notch veterinarian who is personal and more than qualified to help take care of your pup.

text: I would never take a pet anywhere else! When you're here, you are all family! Don't live in the area? It's worth the drive!

name: JJEubank
text: There's a reason why Oakview has 28 perfect scores. They are the Best! If you are looking for a Pediatrician for your pet, this is the place. Not to mention they don't have to send you here or there to have a test run on your pet. They have an extensive lab and up to day equipment that can give you results most of the time very quickly. If not, Dr. Price has worked very hard to network with other specialized Veterinarians around the Southeast and beyond to partner with the care of your pet. The staff of Renee Porter, Julie Jordan Evans, Brandy Falletta and others have years of experience and work together as a team to ensure that you and your pet have as pleasant experience as possible. Even though Julie is a Tennessee fan. I guarantee that you will not only be pleased with Oakview but you will know that your pet is getting the best care possible.

text: Switching vets is never easy, especially when you have a 100 pound dog who is terrified of everything, including strangers. I can NOT thank Dr. Katie Stipes and the rest of the amazing team at OV for taking such great care of my babies for the first time today! You guys were so sweet to my super timid big baby AND kitty. So thankful we found the perfect vet so close to home! Bubba and Fitz will learn to love you guys, too ;)

Two days ago we had to make the awful decision to let our baby Matilda go home forever, and Dr. Robinson and the staff were so patient, kind and understanding. They care as much about your animal's wellbeing as you do. I couldn't recommend them highly enough, and am so grateful that we have them as healthcare providers.

They also try to make everything they do is as financially feasible for us as possible. i really appreciate everything they do! I will definitely be bringing Roman back to them in the future!!

name: Max Power
text: You won't be going inside with your pet. You won't be talking with the vet about the exam either. It is ostensibly a Covid-19 excuse, but I've done plenty of business wearing a mask, which the staff wasn't wearing inside by the way. I'm not going to speculate that not being present will result in services not being provided, but what is the point if I can't be there to ask questions or be told what is going on. I wouldn't go under general anesthesia for a physical, but this is functionally the same and seems deliberately constructed to take in money with a minimum (really none) of involvement with the customer. Great job taking advantage of the situation from a business that clearly doesn't want pet owners involved in the process.

name: Ashley Johnson
text: If you're needing a good Veterinary Clinic, I recommend this place. They provide great service for your fur babies. As well as having very professional and nice employee's. Thank you 69 South Veterinary Clinic.

name: Madie Taylor
text: Such a wonderful Veterinarian Clinic! It was a Friday and my little dog wasn’t eating and was lethargic. I called them when they opened and they saw me within the hour. She received a few shots, and they helped explain medications and what to do if she were to get worse over the weekend. They sent us home with special food and a plan. Within a few hours she started being interested in food again. They treated my dog like she was a part of their family and assured me of everything along the way. Thank you so much 69 South Veterinarian Clinic! 10/10 would recommend to anyone! (Pic of my pup sleeping once she got home 😊)

text: Great, friendly, professional staff. As first time dog owners we had a lot of questions and needed some direction dealing with the care of our new puppy. They were and still are, very patient and kind to our pet's needs and ours too.

name: Candy Lewis
text: 69 South Vet is wonderful!! I love the Dr.  Riggs and the staff.  They are great and always take time to listen and take great care of our fur babies!♡♡

name: matthew fox
text: Not possible. Y'all were awesome in the way you communicated with me, and respected my cat. From the nurse that took Dude from me in the morning, and informed me of treatment and cost. To the Vet that called me in the afternoon to let me know how everything went. To the tech that brought the paperwork to me, and explained aftercare. Great team you have there.

name: William Townsend
text: Prompt, helpful, great customer service.

name: Katie Marchant
text:
Your prices are outrageous on spay and neutering
The dogs are over populating this country and doctors that want $320. For this procedure should not do it
I found vets that does it for less
This price is ridiculous so don't ask me to bring my dog or cat here.

name: Kent Schafer
text: Great service. Very thorough. Appreciate the passion these people put towards my pet. They took care of her real good. Was able to go above and beyond by recommending various resources outside their services. I will be back.

name: Allison Schmittou
text: Very affordable vet clinic with a host of options. Staff was kind and caring towards me and my pet. They were helpful in explaining options and were very transparent about rates. It was easy to get an appointment and our visit was very thorough. 10/10 will return

name: Bernadette White
text:
Great atmosphere for quality service for your “fur child”!  Excellent customer service, thorough details to all questions, and high sense of compassion in treating your pet.

The Pet Desk app is WONDERFUL!!  Sends out appointment, medication & vaccine reminders so no task can be forgotten.  Only recommendation with the app may be to include a breed-specific weight graph.  To assist such babies as I have (brachiocephalic) to eagle eye weight trends.  Respiratory issues are a major health risk in these breeds so having recorded weights from each clinic visit could assist in deterring obesity.

name: Susan Looney
text: I have been very pleased with the care my dog gets at 69 South Veterinary Clinic.  They are very caring and courteous during each visit I have made.  Susan Looney

name: Jennifer Tiefenthaler
text: We love this clinic and the staff. They are always helpful and friendly. We recently boarded our dogs there and they were well taken care of. I highly recommend 69 South Veterinary!

name: Gunars Cazers
text: Dr. Wagenheim and the staff are great. He is very calm with the animals. They have a very competent and friendly receptionist who takes care of everything. If you have an appointment, there’s usually a very short wait. My dog, Hemingway, has been helped here for years, and we are very pleased with the service. Not overpriced.

name: Adam Miller
text: The staff are very friendly, kind, and knowledgeable. They are very good with cats. They will give you honest evaluations of the cost vs benefit of various treatments and help you know when to try and save an animal vs when it's time to let them go.

name: robert harrison
text: I highly recommend 69S Vet Clinic. They’re super nice, take care of my dog, and I’ve never sat around long at all, quickly in and out and get on with my day.

name: Becky Smithson
text: We had an excellent visit. Highly recommend !

name: April Robertson-Townsend
text: Staff nice, very clean facility, just generally a great experience all around.

name: Cameron Oswalt
text: Very knowledgeable staff, convenient for my location and usually pretty easy to get scheduled. Prices on par with most vet's I have been to locally.

name: Regina Emmons
text:
They are terrific with all pets!  I was late for an appointment because I couldn't catch my cat.  They had no problem. Just bring her when you catch her. I got there and was greeted with a smile and they were wonderful with Onyx.
Dr. Wagenheim is the best! He is so kind and very knowledgeable on anything I ask him.

name: Brett Billings
text: They do a great job. Staff is very knowledgeable and friendly. Place is always super clean. I'm glad that I found them.

name: Laurie Bonnici
text: I really appreciate the attention and care. my dogs get. Particularly nice is that Dr. Waggenheim sees the dogs in the room I am in, not taking them away in the back of the facility. Furthermore, he gets down on the floor with them making them more comfortable than being up on a table. Thank you!!!!

name: Dawn Burton
text: The staff at 69 South Veterinary was very nice and friendly. Everyone was very knowledgeable from the front desk to the doctor. They made me feel very comfortable. The doctor was patient and friendly. He answered all my questions. They took great care of my Roxie.  She felt better instantly. I would definitely recommend them to care for your furbabies.

name: Dawn Butler
text: Overjoyed at finding a great vet for my puppies!  I almost don't want to let anyone else in on this great facility, but that would be wrong!  If you'd like an honest evaluation, friendly service, and reasonable prices...you just found it at 69 South Veterinary Clinic!

name: Lindsey Persad
text: Very caring staff that answered any questions I had about my kitten. Everyone on staff did everything possible to ensure the best care for  her. Plus, as a new cat owner, they showed me how to administer the medication she needed easily and effectively. They have answered countless phone call questions and have been nothing but friendly and informative. The staff seems genuinely invested in the health and healing of my animal. I have not been impressed with a vet for years, until I found 69 South Veterinary Clinic!

name: Peggy Wilkerson
text: This is an absolutely wonderful clinic!  Everyone was great.  I would definitely encourage anyone looking for a veterinarian to give 69 South  Veterinary Clinic a try.  You’ll be glad you did!

name: Everett Rust
text: I would definitely recommend 69 South Veterinary Clinic.  Thanks for getting us in and out quickly.  Peeve is doing so much better.  Thank You!

name: Loralee Janus
text: Our evacuation from Florida, due to Irma, found us in Tuscaloosa and in desperate need of a veterinarian. Our dog cried for 12 hours straight on our trip up and we knew we could not have that happen again, when we returned to Florida. Not only did 69 South give us an appointment within 90 minutes of our phone call, they were so kind and compassionate that, we were nearly moved to tears. Thorough examination in a pristine facility, attentive and thoughtful conversations and, we left the office with the medication they felt best suited for our dog, in that situation. The Dr. was completely correct in his prognosis because the trip home was anxiety free for all of us! I simply cannot say enough good things about 69 South!

name: 69 South Veterinary Clinic Business
text: This place is amazing - so clean!! and so caring.  Dr. Riggs and Beth are so knowledgeable and detailed.  Thank you for taking care of my little Hermione recently.

name: Erin Gilliland
text: Both of my cats love the people here, so there's not much left to improve so far as I'm concerned! They make sure to explain each step they take when treating my cats, whether for UTIs or just bloodwork.

name: Robyn Collins
text: Just took my cat to this clinic and they were so nice and helpful. I'm new to town and didn't where to go for a Vet. I saw this clinic was close to my house and I'm glad I chose to go them. The Dr. and and the nurse were so nice to me and my cat. Definitely recommend them!

name: Amy Phillips
text: We have been using 69 South Veterinary Clinic for our pets care for years! They also board our dogs when we go out of town. They are always so nice and give our pets the best care possible. I wouldn't take my pets anywhere else! I think my pets would be upset as well considering when we take them they want to go straight to the back and NOT go home. Ha!

name: Jenna Pugh
text: I had a wonderful experience here. The vet was very thorough in his examination of my senior dog. He was very helpful and showed sincere concern for her problem. I had previously taken my dog to another vet (out of state) while I was on vacation and the quality of care she received there was terrible. I am so glad I chose to take her to the 69 South Veterinary Clinic when we got back. This is going to be our new permanent vet clinic in Tuscaloosa! I highly recommend it.

name: Jamie Steed
text: Good location, easy to spot from the road. Very friendly staff and helpful, the only draw back is the prices. They are more on the expensive side.

name: Andrea Minear
text: The folks at 69 South Vet Clinic are caring professionals who treat my pups like they are their own!  Thanks, Dr. Wagenheim and Abby and Jessica!

text: I always feel the care given to my pets at 69 South Clinic is sincere.

name: Kayrn Brumley
text: Friendly, knowledgeable and efficient staff; clean and welcoming environment. My fur baby is always taken great care of and leaves happy.

name: Matt Crisafulli
text:
It's ok, not over the top.  Not the best prices, not clean or dirty.  Really just basic.  The building looks nice from the road.  The technicians seem to be lacking in training, giving the impressions of an after school worker and not a certified skilled worker.  Will not be returning, they seem to be nice, but there are several choices for quality vet care in the area.

I don't like when a business rates itself to inflate its reviews.  This clinic did with another account, bad business practice!

name: Dee Smith
text: Dr. Wagenheim and EVERYONE on his team are the VERY BEST!!! They took a lot of time winning my Izzy over!!! I highly recommend this team for all of your fur babies needs!!! Everything was throughly explained and all of my questions were answered!!! I am SO thankful to have been recommended to this clinic!!!

name: Tracy Hardin
text: My pug, Bryant, has been going to 69 South Vet Clinic since he was a puppy. As a very young puppy, he had several health issues and there were times we weren't sure if he was going to make it! Of course, being a new "fur Mommy", I was so worried! The wonderful people at 69 South Vet Clinic discovered the health problems and were so great! You could see they really loved my puppy and were doing everything they could to help him and I am forever grateful for them! Bryant is now almost 12 years old and besides being stubborn and a tad overweight(my fault) he has thrived and is a healthy dog thanks to our Vet and his wonderful assistants! You couldn't ask for a better clinic to take your pet. They will receive excellent care!!!
