name: Kayla Abrams
text:
Absolutely LOVE!! 🤗😻
Dr. Wes Stephens is beyond amazing. 😸
He looks at his fur patients as if they were his very own pets. He does everything he can and does not do like most and automatically say, "put the 😐 animal down" 😔 NO, he is about helping the animals and making sure that they are able to live a long happy healthy life! 🤗 He explains everything at an easy way to understand. He takes one day at a time with them, meaning he doesn't throw everything out all at once; he tries to make sure the animals are very comfortable and at ease. He's a great doctor and I am very confident & very happy to say that he is the best Veterinary Doctor that I have ever EVER dealt with. And I am extremely comfortable leaving my fur kids in his care. I trust all his work and his intentions and opinions. 💯

Dr. Wes Stephens helped to save my fur kid's life and I couldn't be more blessed for Dr. Stephens & his work. He knows exactly what he is doing & what is best for these babies. He will not steer you wrong & he is also very very blunt, meaning, he's not gonna lie to you just because it's something he knows you don't wanna hear. He's gonna tell you rather you like the news or not because your fur babies lives are in his hands and he wants them to be able live long happy healthy lives so he has no choice But to be truthfully blunt. I would rather be faced with the bad news and my fur kid receive the help he/she needs than to be Lord lied to about his/her situation and than my baby die or become worse..

Dr. Wes Stephens is the way to go!

text:
Helena Veterinary Clinic goes above and beyond to make the experience as peaceful as possible for both the animals and their owners!

I've always felt like vets may love the animals but ignore the people. In fact, I've often felt patronized for asking questions about process, time, and money. But Helena Vet Clinic has never made me feel this way, and I'm so grateful for the service both to me and to my animals!

I have two cats and a dog, and all visits have been above expectations! One of my cats is very temperamental, and their focus the entire time was her safety. They perfectly balanced that with easing my anxiety and giving me plenty of information about making the experience better in the future. Dr. Stephen's was especially attentive, and you can tell how much he loves animals and cares about his clients.

text: These people are amazing! Right when you walk in your welcomed in by their office cat and friendly staff. They have been takimg such care of our elderly dog for several years now. Their vet knew right away what to check for and right after got him on a thyroid pill and a medication for his cushings disease. This vet has gone above and beyond for us. We travel alot and they are able to send the rx to the pharmacy wherever we go. We have even recieved follow up phone calls and they have filled out travel documents needed for our pets. We love this place and feel they love our babies like their own.

text: I love love love this vet. the doctor got on the floor and played with my dog and was so personal with her. I have never seen that in my life from a vet; I loved how all the staff members were playing with her in the other room. I could tell by hearing people call her name and one guy was supposedly wrestling around with her. The staff members are passionate about their job and my animal. This was my first visit to this vet and I fell in love. I am moving to Jacksonville Florida and the doctor knows some doctors down there, she took my number down to call me on the names of vets I could go to. I wish I would have found this clinic earlier, not right before I was moving. If you care about your animals like a child i HIGHLY recommend Helena veterinary clinic.

text: Great service and they didn't mind that the kids tagged along..

name: Devon Bissot
text:
This weekend I brought in a 1-year-old weim mix for a simple nail trimming. They brought it to my attention that he was not being cooperative and would need to be sedated. We passed on this at the moment to discuss the $150 fee they were asking.

They did let me know they were able to get his back paws trimmed. Upon returning home, we found that they completely broke one of our dog's back nails. Not just broke, but practically tore it out of the nail bed. It's sitting 90 degrees from where it's supposed to be.

It doesn't take a genius to think this through...if this was the first nail they tried to cut...then of course he acted out the rest of the time. He was hurt!

If it was the last nail they tried to cut and he had been acting so bad to begin with, why didn't they stop?

And...you're telling me you didn't know you hurt him that badly??? How can this happen and you not see it?

Today, he is at another vet who was able to examine him without any sort of sedation. The nail that was injured by Helena Veterinary Clinic will now cost me $200 to fix.

Helena Veterinary Clinic's response to this...it's my fault. I should have practiced with him daily to get him used to having his nails trimmed. The most ignorant comment ever made.

name: Laura Sparks
text: Dr. P was great! Super friendly staff.

resp.text: We appreciate you sharing your thoughts - thank you!

name: Josh Noyes
text: Great staff and excellent vet. Very loving toward animals.

name: Jamie Daniels
text: Great vet !  Awesome staff!  Love the groomer !

resp.text: Jamie Thank you to you & your pets for being part of Helena Veterinary Clinic!  We appreciate that you are sharing your thoughts about Helena Veterinary Clinic.  Thank you for the feedback!

name: Kacey Hydrick
text: You can tell a lot about the character of the doctors and the people who work in an office by the way they react to an emergency situation. We had an emergency with our elderly dog today and when we called the office, they were not compassionate and seemed bothered by the fact we were having an emergency. I don't expect anyone to stop everything when something happens to one of my animals but when an animal is very old and becomes short of breath and semi responsive, you'd at least think the vet office that you call would at least sound like they care even if they don't. In a brief phone call, it was obvious that the person who answered was not concerned, sympathetic, or compassionate. Luckily, there is another office that we were able to contact, be seen, and send our sweet angel to Heaven within an hour. She was almost gone when we called your office and were told you could see us in about 2 hours like it was just some routine vet visit. I hope that the next time an emergency happens and someone needs help from you in an emergency situation that you'll at least pretend to care even if you don't.

name: Rod Riv
text: Ask around. The neighbors tell us that this clinic refused to issue paper prescriptions in order to force you into using their online pharmacy so they can get a kickback. They wouldn't give me a paper prescription either. Their bitter front desk attendent Debra hates men and tosses around the word liar on a whim. Call three times to set up an appt, and they will clip the nails and claim you never asked to see the vet, but charge for boarding. Will run an exhaustive list of tests and generate a 2000.00 balance when those tests are not justified by the prognosis or diagnosis. Other vets claim they can't follow the thought pattern and charts were poorly documented suggesting tests were run to make use of expensive equipment for a return on investment. The crates are kept behind closed doors because the conditions are terrible. They over-medicated my dog by giving her a 3 year shot twice just so they could charge for it. You'll notice Debra pushing those heavily. Same as companion... Same vets...same staff... Stay away. Be warned or you are sure to experience one of these terrible experiences. All this in just two visits.

name: Chris Wilson
text: Professional care, however usually a long wait to be seen

name: Dan Carter
text: Due to their own personal stance on keeping COVID restrictions, I sat in my car for 2 hours waiting for them to take my dog back for her shots. Asked several times how much longer and they said they'd get to me as soon as they can. Never came and got her... just sad... at least give a rough estimate so I can bring my dog back and not have her caged up in the car for soo long. Also I wanted to board her and they said they wouldn't let me see where she was going to be kept because they weren't allowing anyone back due to COVID... give me a video walkthrough then... what the heck???? I have no problem with a business sticking with whatever protocol they want to put in place but the way this VET has handled their own protocol is not efficient and leads to poor quality for their customers and their loved pets

name: Christina Tucker
text: Always takes the time to explain everything. Great vet. Doesnt break the bank.

name: Nicole Post
text: Usually great when they will see you, but aren't actually open most of the hours advertised.  It's taken me a few visits to figure out but the vet doesn't get there until after 9:30, they're closed for lunch from 1-3:30 and stop seeing patients at 4:30. My cat is PEEING BLOOD and the receptionist boredly told me to come back tomorrow because I got there at 4:39.

text: I absolutely love Dr. Threadgill. He's such a caring vet. He has taken care of my kitten Nyla,  since I've had her at 8 weeks.The only thing is, clear your schedule and be prepared to wait. text: A very kind Dr. He brought life back to my dog who had a cyst over his heart. It was like Jack missed his    youth, but after surgery he got it back. He now has a back yard that doesn't stop him from running free. He is so happy. Thank you Dr. Threadgill.

text: He is the most caring vet you will ever meet.  Don't settle for anyone else but the best....Dr. Threadgill....he really tried to help my little boy Triton but I was able to see him one last time.  Thank you guys for your help.  They even sent a card.  They are so caring.

text:
Dr T really cares about my fur baby!  Took her in with a nail broken into the quick. He fixed her up and sent her home, so far so good!
I highly recommend Dr T!  He loves his patients and tries hard to give them his best care!

name: Hunter Cejka
text: Dr Threadgill was fine but his staff is horrendous. I was on hold for 20 minutes twice after asking a simple question on whether or not i need to bring in my dog to get antibiotics for kennel cough. I didn't want to get other dogs sick.  first time the receptionist asked for a callback number and then never called me back. I called back 5 hours later, same reply. I then called back 2 hours after that and was left on hold for 20 minutes before she hung up on me.

text: We love Dr. Threadgill. He is the only vet we trust with our babies.

text: Excellent service for my dog

name: Crystal Gaddy
text: Took my Yorkiepoo to get his ear checked they gave him ear drops and 2 meds he was better in 2 days and completely better in a week.

name: Grace Fisher
text: Do not take your babies here if it's an emergency!!!! I took my black lab in and they made me sit in the waiting room for 2 hours. Knowing my dog was so weak I had to carry her inside. I had called ahead to let them know I was coming. She wasn't eating or drinking. They let my baby sit there as they kept taking other animals back for "dry skin" and "groomin" while my dog was dying on the waiting room floor. After saying something to the lady at the desk they finally got me back. Long story short my dog took her last breath outside the vet office in the back of my car with my 4 year old daughter with me!  A lady offered to pay to euthanize her and I said ok thank you, but by the time the doc came out she had taken her last breath in my arms. Then a week later they send me a card saying sorry for your loss... then months later send me a card saying I need to come get Shadow her shots. Wth do yall really not pay that much attention! She is dead! I well never recomend this place! Thank you to the woman who offered to help us. But please if it's an emergency Dont go here!

name: Mikayla Patrick
text: If I could give this place 0 stars I would. I’m a college student so I’m only familiar with vets in my hometown. I got a rec to put my baby in boarding here since his vet doesn’t offer it, plus it’s cheap and with the holidays at hand budgeting was necessary. $12 sounded kind of fishy to me but my boyfriend & I went with it. He dropped him off while I took finals so I didn’t get to see the place. We both picked him up after 7 days. When I got there it looked filthy & smelled horrible. My dog came out looking terrified and he smelled and looked disgusting. His eyes were almost blood shot, his hair around his face thinned, he had lost about 6 pounds at LEAST & it took him DAYS to get back to his normal self. He was 47 lbs, we made a vet visit the day before boarding and now we can see his ribs! He did not want to put any pressure on his left back leg as if it had been hurt. First of all, what kind of facility won’t bathe a dog who has been in their care for over 5 days?! I’m almost 100% sure he barely ate while there & they did not report it to us. I don’t know what happened at this place but the lady told us NOTHING. I know when something is wrong with my dog & he will never step foot in that place again.

name: Lena Dillon
text: My favorite animal clinic

Pick him up today he has scars and bruises and he’s acting strange. Wish I could post the pictures. He will never go there again!!!

text: Clean, efficient,  and personable. They explained everything in during the visit and took the time to answer any questions. The dr made sure our new puppy was comfortable with each exam element, before proceeding. Highly recommend them.

name: Walley’s Paradise
text:
Another vet diagnosed my baby with heart worms and gave us a couple choices to decide on. When we decided which treatment to go with (that day) we called and they said the vet would call back.  After 3 days of waiting we called MCAC. They retested her and began treatment. My baby is now heart worm free and healthy as can be. Thank you for helping my fur baby.
And did i mention everyone was extremely friendly

They have always taken wonderful care of my cats . Even in an emergency situation they were there and took care of my cat like their own
The Dr is great and caring. They are even watching my cats while we are on a family vacation

name: Shannon Long
text: Dr. Chancellor has an arrogant, passive aggressive attitude towards humans - especially women. I can usually overlook this kind of socially awkward, OCD personality but when he didn't know of an alternative treatment for heart worms that other "fresher" veterinarians knew of and when advising him of this, he has this grimace like look on his face like I just told him the sky was purple and immediately disagreed - I took my business elsewhere. Always good to educate yourself and not be too proud or to stubborn to do so - I've been an occupational therapist for a long time but I can always learn new things and be open to the possibility of something new. Maybe he can't learn new behaviors or bedside manners BUT as a professional, he MUST be open to new treatments to give all patients the best treatment possible. Prices are pretty steep too. The all woman staff is pretty nice but you can tell they are extremely timid of the "Boss".

name: Grace Lane
text: Always went here with my mother in law and her puppy. My mother in law is deaf and she wanted me there to help  with communication. We were treated very well. The vet was very nice and answered all her questions. He was very patient with us and even joked with us a little.

name: Bonnie Heafner
text: For Chancellor Plus the staff is just wonderful thank you guys

text: Great Vet. Nice people.

name: miranda schmidt
text: Always a great experience here!

name: Connie Braswell
text: Reasonably priced vet care. A Dr. and staff that care about your pet.

name: Samuel Mason
text: I never do reviews, and let me start out by saying my dog was never mistreated. However, that is absolutely where the positives stop. On my initial visit, the veterinarian saw a human being and provided medical advice. It was a scheduled appt. I know cause it pushed mine back 30 mins. Not sure if this is normal, but it made me a little uncomfortable for reasons I honestly can't explain. Just seemed really weird. When we got to see the vet he was very passive aggressive toward my knowledge of how to care for an animal or as he assumed my lack thereof. Never personally insulted me by any means but passively insinuated  I was not a vet and should keep my comments to myself. When I left i was told the dog needed to come back in a week. I asked about prices and reasons. I was told by the receptionist that if I stopped by and got the medicine and did not have the medicine administered by the doc it would only be $5. Being on a budget I decided to do that. I was advised to still make an appt in the event my dog was not getting better. Well a week later, I was kicked out at the threat of calling the cops with a $26 charge because I was questioning why the price went up $21. The answer I got was they do not administer meds over the counter. And the vet said he was not going to argue and then asked if I would like the cops called. Baffled at how quickly he got defensive I said yes please. He got angrier, and told me to leave. He said he asked his workers who said it would only be $5 and both of them denied ever saying such a thing. Of course not, why would they right? Again, my animal was treated fine and is getting healthier. But the customer service, lies, anger toward me over questions about price, and seeing a human being before seeing my dog are what led to this ZERO star rating. I do not write this out of anger, simply out of working in the customer service industry for a long time and spreading the word that if you want to be treated well, do not go here.

text: I generally have a great visit each time. The two ladies at the front desk at the Atlanta Highway location, (one older lady with short grey hair and one younger lady) are extremely nice and answer any questions I have. I sent my mother to pick up my 70lb GSD and one of the ladies even helped her get my dog into her car. Highly recommend.

name: Raven Peoples
text:
I absolutely love this location! It is easy to set appointments. I really appreciate the reminder emails.
Unfortunately, Nyla (my fur baby) is less than an angel when she visits and it is fair to say that the vet is the last place she ever wants to go. However, the staff here is very patient with her. They make like of a stressful situation. They are always helpful and offer really great advice to keep her happy and healthy! I love them and from the bottom of my heart I thank them for everything that they do! I have and would definitely recommend them again and again!

name: Carol Smith
text: It's very clean they treat u and your family pet very well..I have taken my pets there forever and never had a bad experience except when I had a puppy die from parvo.. But that couldn't be helped Ed he was t far him be w when it got him there...Dr. Goodwin g him g himself met me the re after midnight one night one night... He lived for 2 days but he passed...I don't think I could ever find another like tinker...he was a miniature yorky...please if u Know anyone with any please contact me..email.is (sweethrtindixie61@gmail.com) thank you

They truly care for your four legged f
amily member

text: Their hours of operation are very convenient for full-time workers, and I can always get an appointment within the week when I call. Everyone on the team is always nice. The surgeries performed on my pets have all been thorough and as inexpensive as possible while still keeping my pets comfortable. The medication is affordable as well. Thank you so much!

name: Judy Moore
text: Always  a good experience.  Friendly  staff and I felt  they were  using safe guidelines  due to the virus.

name: Mikala Mccurry
text: The staff at this location is always excited to see my puppy. He absolutely loves Dr. Sneed and all of the techs there. I also love the convenience of the drop-off appointments and the affordability of the daycare!

name: Curstina Moorer
text: Clean and friendly people

name: Melissa Duke
text:
There is no better Veterinary Clinic out there!! From the time you walk into the door you are greeted with a friendly knowledgeable staff. We can not say enough good about the clinic & veterinarians at Goodwin... They actually care about you and your fur babies NOT JUST YOUR MONEY!!
They saved our baby Bianca's life not once but twice and the 2nd time her odds of survival were very very unlikely, but with their team they beat the odds & she pulled through. Thank God.
In 5 days she will be 12 years old.
We will not take our fur babies anywhere else.
Recommend 100% A++++++++

name: Melinda Welch
text: The vets and staff at GAH really care!  😃

name: Patti Perrett
text: Excellent service

name: Permelia Griner
text: My dog was taken care of and treated like family. The whole staff made you feel important and listened to your concerns and answered all our questions. This is the best place to take your pets too. Well worth the drive.

name: Suzanne Burns
text: We have had our two dogs put down in the last two week.  She was perfect never in a rush, telling me to spend as much time as I wanted.  So kind and soft spoken, sat on the floor with me.  Thank you so much, for making it so loving, to me and my fur babies.

name: Jacob Johnson
text: I brought my dog in for daycare a couple of weeks ago and he was still full of energy and reeked of urine after getting him home that afternoon. Clearly they are not running these dogs hard enough or making them sit in kennels all day long. He was so thirsty when he got home too. Drank the entire bowl of water only to throw it all up a few minutes later. Very disappointed in my experience here and will not be back again.

name: Chuck Hester
text: When our pet (Annie) was hit by a car on Saturday afternoon I called your office on Chantilly after business hours and was connected to an emergency number. After explaining the situation to the young man, he took my contact information and said I would be contacted as soon as possible. Within minutes I received a call from your technician who told me to bring Annie to your hospital ASAP. When we arrived at your offices, we were met by three techs and a doctor who started examining and treating her immediately. All of you staff were professional, proficient, and above all else, caring. I would especially recognize Dr. Jane Sead for the care she is providing Annie in an effort to save her front leg which was severely damaged by the accident. Dr. Snead is very calming and appears to really care about her patients. We've found ourselves a new vet for all our pets!  Thanks to the Goodwin Animal Hospital staff for treating Annie and us so well.

name: Juan Marquez
text: Love this place ...... Great Staff.... My ferret was sick and no other vets would see him without a appointment.... I called Goodwin and they gave me an appointment to see him right away.... Doctors and staff really cares.... THANKS!!!

name: Patricia Allen
text: They are very good at what they do.

name: Jessica Adams
text: If I could give them zero stars I would. I trusted Goodwin with my dog over Memorial Day weekend I was told he was up to date on all his shots by Brittany. When I arrived the receptionist Heather told me that he needed an annual shot and that my total would be $134.00. So I told her okay even though Brittany told me he didn't need any shots. I would just have to pay to board my dog for the weekend. When I go to pick my dog up he has fleas! Also my bill was $200 not $134.00. I asked the older Caucasian Veterinarian that greeted me by the wrong last name why two of employees Brittany and Heather gave me the wrong information he didn't care. He told me my dog needed all the things I was charged. Like it was my fault not the employees. I had to tell him what happened twice so that let me know he wasn't listening or paying attention. To sum it up DO NOT TRUST THIS VET THEY ONLY CARE ABOUT $$$$ and the employees don't know how to do their job.

name: JTF “Ty”
text: We were in a position where our vet had moved to a location that was not convenient for us and we had been shopping around for recommendations. Having known Dr. Goodwin through community activities along with his reputation and recommendations from current clients, we knew we wanted to trust our pets' care there. A situation arose where our youngest and smallest dog was having some apparent GI distress and we called the clinic and Dr. Goodwin took our call and discussed the situation and had us come in. That is a level of customer service you don't ordinarily see from professional-level providers like doctors, lawyers, dentists and veterinarians.  We were greeted by kind and caring front office and technical staff and our pet's issues were addressed in a caring and professional manner. The approach was also conservative rather than a rush to run a litany of tests and get x-rays that might not have been warranted. And it turns out they weren't. After an overnight stay for our pet, we were promptly followed up with by Dr. Goodwin even though it was his day off. We were discharged under the care of Dr. Sterenberg with the same caring and thoroughness of Dr. Goodwin. Our only regret is that we learned during our visit that Dr. Goodwin was retiring and he was the main reason we chose the clinic as our new pet care provider.

name: Charlie Davis
text: Awesome Team!

name: Joseph Bass
text: The Doctors and staff are amazing. You will feel welcome as the staff is courteous and personable. The Doctors are all very professional and knowledgeable. They take even routine visits and procedures seriously, and will be honest and up front with you. We have been extremely happy with Goodwin. They get the big things right, but they always go a step further, for example making quick calls to check on your pet.

name: C. LV.
text: Very friendly staff. My dogs are usually unhappy walking in, but happy walking out.

name: Bill Lewis
text: Always great

name: Bailey Stone
text: The staff here is amazing! We use Goodwin Animal Hospital on Chantilly for veterinary care as well as daycare while we are at work. He is so excited to go every day, and they take great care of him while he is there!

name: Marilyn Law
text: Because they got Jack right in took care of his annual check up gave him his shots that were due and back home we went.

name: Tara Spears
text: Everyone was friendly and great with Koby. They also explained things very well.

name: Kimberly Stewart
text: Goodwin Animal Hospital allow me to feel that I am not just a number when I come in my dogs. The staff has really touched my heart in so many ways. The receptionist knows us and Memphis. Everyone is so kind. I also have complements for the Dr's. We appreciate everything you guys have done for us. Thank you, it really does make a difference.

name: Tommie Scoggins
text: I recently took my Chihuahua to treat his congestive heart failure.  The vet and staff were extremely friendly and were able to get me the right medicine for his condition. This is my chosen that from now on! I love them.

name: Derek Fitterer
text: The staff at the Atlanta Hwy location have taken exceptional care of my pet.  I have seen both Dr. Sternenberg and Dr. Lydia Glasscock for routine and same day pet crisis visits.  They are fantastic!  Contrary to others, I believe their prices to be modest or median at most.  I've used several vets over twenty years with several pets until Goodwin Atlanta Hwy has won my permanent business with great care and very reasonable costs.

name: Courtney Aycock
text: The doctors and staff here are great!  Very friendly, and seem to really care about your pets.  Their prices are very reasonable as well.  I'll definitely keep coming back to Goodwin Animal Hospital!

name: Bo Brabham
text: They treat my dogs like their own.

name: J. Craig Holmes
text: While visiting from out of state we needed daycare for our Airedale for one day.  The staff at Goodwin treated us like we were their best clients.  The facilities were as good as any we have ever used, and we have used some great ones.  It was obvious when we picked up our dog that she was already attached to the staff and that they had taken very good care of her.  When back in Montgomery, we will use Goodwin again.

name: Heather Petersen
text: Professional and loving staff

name: William Smart
text: Excellent experience every time.

name: James Sheppard
text:
The staff at Goodwin Animal Hospital has cared for our two cats the past 8 years, and our dog several years prior.  I am not qualified to judge the competence of the vets or support staff as some previous writers felt compelled to do, but I do know that our pets have been treated with kindness and concern, and whatever ailment that any of them had was cured when they left.  You can't argue with success.

We have an older cat that is in the twilight of her years and Dr. Glasscock has been unfailingly attentive and gentle with her on the many occasions we have had to seek help from her.  She is a credit to what I consider a very fine group of people.  The practice is operated as business and not as as a public service, so they do charge for their services.  Imagine that.  So does our family doctor, the guys who do our yard work and the woman who leaves the newspaper.

I would recommend these fine folks to anyone in need of veterinary assistance for their pets.  I miss talking Auburn football with Dr. Goodwin since he has begun spending his time at the new facility, but we are very pleased with Dr. Glasscock.

name: Abigail Hipps
text: The staff were friendly and helpful during our visit. The prices were more reasonable than i anticipated, and we were treated very professionally. We will continue to use Goodwin!

name: Jed Carnes
text: I was very impressed from the receptionist that answered the phone, the technician that started the exam, the doctor who completed the treatment, and the office administrator who finalized the paperwork.  It was an expensive trip but I feel I got what I paid for.  The staff was great but ultimately they helped get my dog healthy!

name: m mcdougal
text: My poor dog could not stop scratching and it made her miserable . The next day after her visit to you she can rest with no scratching. Thank you

name: Cissy Davis
text: Love these guys and gals. Been using them since 1998. Treat my fur babies with lots of love.

name: Jonathan Robertson
text: Hands down arguably the best animal clinic around! The staff is really polite and they make SURE that they'll do anything to see your pet feel better. Thanks everyone at that clinic for making my moms happy and fixing Toby up from his god awful accident.

name: Misha Pookie
text: I have used Goodwin Animal Hospital for over 8-9 years.  I love the staff and the Vets.  They obviously love the animals and go out of their way to make sure your furbaby is treated well and as comfortable as possible.  I have had to use their services for elder animals last visit and, though heartbreaking, my babies and I were treated with care, affection and respect for the process.  They work with you and great service.

name: Jim Shelton
text: I am so very grateful that the doctors are knowledgeable and willing to work on rabbits. My experience at Goodwin Animal Hospital is always wonderful. Great facility, highly recommended.

name: Ken Furman
text: An extraordinary group of people who offer stellar customer service to its 2 legged and four legged customers ... there could not possibly be a better Veterinarian Clinic/Hospital/Pet Resort in the greater Montgomery area (and dare I say anywhere in the world!!).  I feel blessed when I have the opportunity to recommend Goodwin to friends ... and am rewarded when they too report back to me how blessed they and their pets are to have discovered Goodwin!  My pup spends so much time being loved and cared for at Goodwin's Day Care that I honestly think he considers my home his second home!  :-)

name: Rachel Cox
text: I always feel welcomed by the front desk staff. They're all great and very helpful. Dr. Glassclock is the sweetest vet.

name: Jean Maccinile
text: Been going there 15 years they care about your fur babies

name: Kalyn Pinkerton
text: So my review is from 2014. I took my cat in for a UTI back in November of 2014. He was seen by Dr. Goodwin. I was told he was blocked and had to have a surgery that would basically open up his urethra. So he had the surgery and he came home. He wasn’t getting better. Still in complete pain, losing weight, and straining horribly to use the bathroom. Not only that but he now has a gaping hole in his rear that is exposed to outside air and bacteria and causing infection. We went back to Goodwin in December for them to redo the surgery. Still not successful. At this point he’s being boarded at the Chantilly facility for constant observation. Looking back I’m assuming because they knew they had messed my baby up. So January rolls around and he’s not better. Weight loss, no appetite, and clearly in pain constantly. Dr. Sermon(?) decided to take over and redid the surgery AGAIN.  At this point my cat has been boarded there for over a month and has had THREE SURGERIES. Now I have a cat with constant issues at this point. They said the surgery was effective. WRONG IT WAS NOT. I’ll put a pic in the comments of his rear on the regular due to this complication. He couldn’t even sit down comfortably. He couldn’t walk like a normal cat. And he was constantly crying out in pain and straining. I switched vets at the point and had to spend the next three years of his life at routine visits every 2-3 months to have him sedated and antibiotics and his rear cleaned up. This constant pain eventually took a toll on him. I paid hundreds for prescription food and frequent vet visits and all Goodwin did for me was take a couple grand off my bill and left me with still around a $2k bill for them ruining my cats life. He recently died at only 6 years of age due to his poor quality of life and constant pain and infection caused by this surgery. I’ve investigated this with an attorney and I’m regretful I waited this long as it is outside of the statute of limitations for malpractice or Goodwin would have a lawsuit on their hands. I truly believe they single-handedly ruined my cats life and caused him to be taken from me way too soon. Do not trust these idiots with your babies.

name: Bonnie Powell
text: At Goodwin Animal Hospital the doctors and staff are always extremely helpful and can answer just about anything about any question you may have. The pet resort they have as well is the best in town!

name: James Weaver
text: Goodwin Animal Hospital is amazing inside and out. It is very inviting and filled with an organized, professional staff. I have been going there for years and plan on keep going.

name: Rachel Cox
text: I always feel welcomed by the front desk staff. They're all great and very helpful. Dr. Glassclock is the sweetest vet.

name: Michelle Williams
text: Expensive , but you get what you pay for, professionals in every aspect, great knowledgeable Veterinarian, I recommend this Business

name: Amanda McLemore
text: I called freaked out because my dog had an unknown abscess rupture and i was put on the phone with a Dr right away and she helped me figure out what to do to help my dog! Greatly appreciated!

name: Gale Masters
text: I was really pleased at what a great job Goodwin Animal Hospital did for my sick dog. They gave me very clear instructions that I could understand for the medication and in no time she felt better and she was very happy.

name: Agnes Carter
text: We were very pleased with how well Dr. Goodwin was able to explain everything to us. Th condition and recommendations were very clear and we highly recommend Dr. Goodwin, the staff and services available at Goodwin Animal Hospital.

text: Goodwin Animal Hospital provided an excellent service for my pet. The waiting time was not that long and at other animal hospitals I find myself waiting forever! But not here.

text: Goodwin Animal Hospital provided an excellent service for my pet. The waiting time was not that long and at other animal hospitals I find myself waiting forever! But not here.

text: Very good hospital don't have cash right now no problem they will take payments

name: Alison Lee Jones
text: The whole staff is great!!

name: Robert Brown SHR
text: To damn high

name: Kenny Harper
text: The staff at Goodwin Animal Hospital care about your pets. The wait time when I check in is short compared to other places I have been too.

name: Kyle Houghton

text:
(Translated by Google) This place is excellent, the staff is very friendly☺☺

Este lugar es execlente ,el personal es muy amable☺☺

name: Jessica Creasman
text: My preferred vet. Great people and great service. My pets are very well taken care of there. They also do a great job cropping Doberman ears and docking tails. I only wished you would crop ears sooner than 12 weeks. Like 7 or 8 weeks which is better and helps with posting.

name: Brad Hall
text: Great staff. Very pleasant surroundings.

name: TRADES _ TECH
text: Great service

name: Cheyenne Martin
text: Moulton Vet Hospital always has me covered when it comes to any of my pets or livestock. They are very responsive, and they take the very best care of all animals. I have always had great customer service! I know that when I take an animal to them they are in the best hands!

name: Geana Mitchell
text: They take good care of of our dog when we board her there.

name: Branch Beech
text: Tried twice to schedule an appointment. Each time they said they would call us back but never did. If you're looking for a responsive vet, don't waste your time here.

name: julie mclemore
text: Dr. Lee and his staff at Moulton Veterinary Hospital go above and beyond in caring for your pets, as well as in customer service. We are grateful to have them caring for our 4 legged family members. If you haven’t been there, try them out! You will see! :)

name: Kathy Graham
text: I love MOULTON veterinary hospital and the care they give the animals and the owners of the animals. They are compassionate and take care of all involved.

name: Rose King
text: He looked at our midget white turkey when no one else would.  He was very helpful.

name: Debbie Rappuhn
text: I am Debbie Rappuhn, President of Heart of Alabama Save Rescue Adopt!  We have started taking all of our pets to this clinic because we have run out of places in our area that care about our rescues enough, and what we do to help us with fees.  I am so very impressed with their kindness and service and they are paying it forward in my view, to help animals in need!  Thank you from our HASRA team for caring for our babies in the most loving way!  We really appreciate you kindness and service!!!!

name: Wendell Chambers
text: Took our dog who had parvor “they said”. She is acting like she’s better. That’s not the issue. When we got her back she had blood all over her and a big whole in her chest with infection coming out of it. Had to ask about it and medicine for it. Also charged us 562$ and never mentioned how much it would be until we get there to pick her up and said we couldn’t leave with her until we had the full amount

name: Sabrina
text: I was extremely pleased with the quality of service my pets and I received here. We brought in 2 female cats to be fixed on two different days and they scheduled and preformed the surgeries quickly efficiently. Procedure cost a little more then at other places but not extremely pricey either. Also the cats barely had a incision mark or anything else. The cats were well taken care of and back to normal in no time. I am happy to say I will recommend this place to others.

name: Jennifer Garrison
text: Very knowledgeable and takes great care of our pets and livestock.

name: Dawn Hogan
text: What a difference the laser therapy did for Willie’s ear today!!  He was constantly shaking and scratching at his ear and after the laser treatment he was so much better within an hour !!!!!  As always Willie got the best treatment by everyone there !!

name: Robert Foster
text: Great place to take your pets super friendly and helpful

resp.text: Hello Robert - Thank you for sharing your kind words with us regarding our staff at our Montgomery hospital. We hope all is well and thank you for partnering with us.

name: J Johnson
text: Beyond frustrated with appointment policy. We are on the wellness plan, so I cannot switch vets without throwing that money down the toilet. Otherwise I would change in a heartbeat. They are using coronavirus as an excuse to do everything at their own convenience rather than taking into account the needs and wellness of the pets themselves. They make you bring your pet in in the morning and leave it like some sort of work order or car to be worked on when they feel like it and then picked up much later. This is needlessly traumatizing to my cat who hates to be at the vet. It has been over two hours now and still waiting for the vet to even look at the cat. I’m so angry I could cry.

resp.text: Hello - We are sorry to hear about your frustrations with us and with our Optimum Wellness Plans. We are sorry you haven’t had a good experience. May we have an opportunity to address your concerns? – please reach out to our Client Advocate Team at BanfieldCares@banfield.com to discuss options and next steps.

name: raven mayhan
text: Most amazing vet facility ever! Staff went above and beyond with our dog. The vet called and checked on him twice after we had left the vet. Very caring people. I would highly recommend this vet facility.

name: carl stokes
text: Do not let these people talk you into any of their monthly health plans. It is an absolute joke. They say you get a major discount on all services, what they don't tell you is that they are 3 times more expensive and most of the local vets. Then every time I took my dog in there was always some upcharge. I will never be going back in there and will be making sure all my friends do the same. Many of the reviews say they are very nice ... and that is true... people can be nice to you while they screw you.

resp.text: Hi Carl, we are sorry to hear about your frustrations with us and with our Optimum Wellness Plans. We are sorry you haven’t had a good experience. May we have an opportunity to address your concerns? – please reach out to our Client Advocate Team at BanfieldCares@banfield.com to discuss options and next steps.

name: E D
text: My great dane puppy was in pain and they were able to see him right away rough housing with older sister he got hurt they took great care of him.  Very thankful for the Vet, vet techs front desk.  All were thoughtful and very professional

name: Brianna Moore
text: Friendly and very knowledgeable staff! They always take care of my pets when I visit and call to check up on them when yo leave. They are local, convenient,  and get you in a out in a timely manner. Pictured is my guinea pig Reese being treated here. He was calm and trusting with them so that was a good sign! Love this place and their employees ❤

name: Nicole Etheridge
text: I highly recommend the puppy plan and Dr Randall and of course the staff there is great they all love animals and that's what matters

resp.text: Hi Nicole - Thank you so much for taking the time to share your positive experience with Dr. Randall and our Montgomery hospital! We're so happy to hear that you recommend the puppy plan and our staff's care. We hope all is well and will pass your kind words to the team!

name: Kathrine Barker
text: Great staff! Always helpful. I was a member of their dog health plan, but I recently moved to an area without a banfield location. I'm really sad to have left their services...

name: Tammy Harsha
text: The staff is so nice. And they tell you how much everything is up front so no surprises.

name: Ben Cooper
text: The pet plans are well worth the value. There are also plenty of locations if you happen to be traveling.

name: Tiffa
text: Very upset. I took my dog in for a surgery and check up in July. While I was there, they talked me into the monthly wellness plan for my dog. So I chose the $39.95 option. Not ONCE did they tell me it was some sort of contract that I had to fulfill for a year. Not once did anyone tell me I had to pay $39.95 for an entire year, and if I wanted out, that I had to pay the remaining amount. Are you kidding me? I'm cancelling my plan because my dog doesn't need it and I can't afford it. They even told me I could cancel it at any time if I pleased, not once telling me it would charge me for the remaining months. Now I'm stuck with paying the rest of the $480 when I do not want to, and do not need the service. I JUST switched to Banfield too when this happened. Looks like I'll be looking for another vet since they clearly can not be honest and tell me the IMPORTANT information we would need to know. Just sucking money out of you is all it is.

resp.text: Thank you, Tiffa, for taking the time to bring your concerns about the Wellness Plan to our attention. Please reach out to our Client Advocate Team at 877-500-2288 or email internet.inquiries@banfield.com at your convenience so we can try to address your concerns.

name: Judy Broach
text: I have used Dr. Randle for 2 or 3 years.  She has been excellent with my babies.  I have used Banfield’s wellness plans and have no complaints.  Without the plan, the prices are high.  You get a lot for your money with the plans and best of all I get Dr. Randle.  The staff is also very friendly and caring. My only “complaint” is because of COVID-19, I have to drop off. I have never liked to leave my babies.  As a nurse, I understand.

name: Ralph Griffith
text: an excellent place to go to the veterinarian is very very well-mannered very knowledgeable and he took care of a pet dog Charlie he could a tumor off very very well done office Towne and Charlie is healed up within a week would recommend to anyone if you love your pet this is the veterinarian for you!!!

resp.text: Hi Ralph - We are happy to hear that Charlie is recovering nicely.  Please give your pup a hug from us.  Thanks for taking the time to share your feelings about our Montgomery staff.  We will share your comments with them and look forward to continuing to care for your pets.  Be well!

name: Gretchen Perry
text: Madeline is the best to work with. She treats the pups like her own. She is knowledgeable and caring

resp.text: Hi Gretchen - Thank you so much for sharing your positive experience with Madeline at our Montgomery hospital! We're so happy to hear about the wonderful care she has been able to provide for your family. We'll be sure to pass your kind words along to the team!

name: J Girl Chill
text: The doctors and nurses are super nice. The have a wonderful insurance plan, as well. They really help with the worries that come with getting a new pet.

resp.text: Hi JJ - We're so glad that you enjoy visiting the staff at out Montgomery hospital and that our Wellness Plan has been a good fit for you and your new pet. Thank you for sharing your positive experience and for partnering with us for your pet's needs.

name: Gabbie M
text: This is a wonderful Banfield that you can take your pet to. Excellent staff and they really take the time to address any concerns regarding your pet. The wellness plan definitely does help cut down some of the cost of services.

resp.text: Hi Gabbie - Thanks so much for your feedback!  We appreciate your kind words about the Berryhill Road team and are also happy to hear that the Wellness Plan is a good fit for you.  Thanks again and be well!

name: Danny G.
text: Love Banfield!

name: Bryan Whitefield
text:
Just visited Banfield Pet Hospital, and it was amazing.

Visited this clinic to have my puppy Roger vaccinated. It went well. Everything was fine.

The service though is what it makes amazing. I mean the receiving clerk was very well hands on all the time. From the check in to when we leave. 5 stars for that effort. My puppy was not even stressed for a little bit. The doctor was very skilled. He really knows what he was doing.

The doctor even go for an extra mile by giving some advice on what to feed my puppy and what to not. This will be my first time to raise a dog actually. Yay.

Will really go back here to Banfield Pet Hospital for Roger's updated vaccine. 5 stars for the service. Stay great.

resp.text: Hi Bryan – We're so glad to hear you and Roger love coming to visit us at our Montgomery hospital. Thank you for taking the time to let us know about the positive experience you had. We hope all is well and look forward to seeing you and Roger at his next visit.

name: russell barrow
text: A very good place for your doggy

name: David Clark
text: The staff were so friendly and helpful with getting paperwork and checkup for our dog while we’re evacuating from hurricane Michael! Hey were able to get her shot records even with our other location off line. Thanks so much!

resp.text: Hi David – We appreciate you telling us about your positive experience with our Berryhill Road location. Thank you for partnering with us for your dog’s needs.

name: Yanis Calderon
text: I took my dog ​​and he told me that it was not serious and then he told me if there was a lack of commitment to the animals and they sent me to the emergency room and he died

name: Marlene Rogers
text: They took very good care of my dog, Daisy.

resp.text: Hi Marlene - Thank you for choosing us to help care for Daisy.  We appreciate it and will be sure to let the Berryhill team hears your feedback.  Be well!

name: Shana Carter
text: Everyone at this Banfield is amazing. They knew me and my babies by name. Changing vets was the hardest part about leaving Montgomery. Dr. Randle and Dr. Irrazary were the absolute best. The patience they showed my babies was amazing. I'll never forget it.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the positive feedback about Dr. Randle, Dr. Irrazary, and the rest of the staff, Shana! We’re happy you enjoyed your experience, and we’ll be sure to pass on your kind words to the Montgomery team!

name: Emma Chemey
text: Thank you, thank you, thank you to the kind and generous staff of Banfield Pet Hospital for helping us out during #HurricaneIrma. We bugged out of Tallhassee early this morning and they were generous enough to board our 3 cats and bunny for free until our room was available at our hotel. We were able to spend the next few hours getting a few hours of sleep, catching our breath, while enjoying the wonderful hospitality of Montgomery. We were so lucky to be able to evacuate and we continue to be so blessed by the goodness of wonderful people making this difficult stressful time as smooth as possible.

name: Chase Chesser
text: Dr. Randle was very helpful in treating our dog. She took us in on very short notice, and we felt very comfortable leaving our dog in her hands. The office called us the following day to check back in on our dog. I highly recommend Dr. Randle and the clinic.

name: Nikissia Craig
text: I drove three hours to have my dog seen at this Banfield in Montgomery after being turned down by closer Banfields. I was out of town on a trip in Alabama when my dog became very ill. The front desk assistant, Pauline made calls for me to try to help with getting my dog seen. After no luck on both our ends, she promised that if I brought my dog there, they would see him. After arriving, I met Teal, who was pleasant and helpful at the front desk. Pauline was great and Dr. Rowe was excellent. Dr. Rowe was thorough and caring. I was clearly in distress when she explained how sick my dog was. She was encouraging, very knowledgeable, and non-blaming. She even counseled on how to prevent another serious incident if possible. By the time I arrived in Montgomery, my dog had a fever of 105.9 degrees and was in danger of hospitalization. Pauline apologized repeatedly for the fact that I had to make a 3 hour drive to get my dog seen. I knew that she had advocated for me, and she was patient with me as I made multiple calls to her for assistance with locating closer Banfields earlier that day.The staff stayed late to try to stabilize my dog, and they showed me and my dog the best customer service and treatment that I've ever had from Banfield. To put their service in perspective, I've been a Banfield customer for six years and in three different states. Even my relative who helped me make the drive stated that she'd be bringing her cat by after witnessing their quality of service.

name: lotlotmonroe
text: They treated us great and stayed after hours to help our doggy

resp.text: We appreciate you telling us about your positive experience with our Montgomery, AL location. We hope that your doggy is feeling better! Thank you for partnering with us for your pet's needs.

name: Stephanie Gardner
text: I've only ever had a good experience with this vet. Two of my three dogs go here, and both are on wellness plans. The staff is always very nice, and I've never had to wait longer then fifteen minutes to be seen (if that).

name: Erika Staiger
text: I've been so touched by the kindness I have met these past few days, but I wanted to say a special thank you to the staff off #banfieldpethospital number 1115, of Montgomery, Alabama. My friends and I arrived in Montgomery with seven hours to go before we checked into our hotel, with two cars full of pets, fresh from the path of Hurricane Irma. They graciously allowed our cats and Dory to stay with them while we waited for our room to be ready so that they didn't have to spend an additional seven hours in the car--this on top of a four hour drive from Tallahassee, and a seven hour ordeal from Tampa for my critters a few days earlier. They fed them, let them use their litter boxes, and gave them lots of love and attention. Best of all, they graciously declined to charge us for the visit. We've been really blessed to have run into so many nice people here in Alabama so far, but I wanted to take a moment to shout out these guys for going above and beyond their call of duty. I don't think any of us will forget this act of kindness any time soon. If you happen to be in need of veterinary services in Montgomery, AL be sure to give these people a call.

name: Cynthia Chesterfield
text:
The care my pet received was adequate.  Nothing special, but adequate.  You can tell the staff have been through extensive sales training from the way they push the Wellness plan (starting at $500 per year per pet).  They avoid answering questions about how much the items covered in the wellness plan actually cost, which is why I politely told them no each time they brought it up (on average 3 times per visit).

What has made me decide to NOT use them again is the number of follow up exams they required (beyond the industry standard according to 3 other vetinarians).  Each of these follow up exams was another $30 (not including medication, scrapings, etc).  All 3 of the other vets said that the follow up exam is included in the initial exam costs.  When this was brought to their attention, their response was "Well, YOU chose to bring her back to us.....you didn't have to."   HUH?  You told me it was necessary.  And now that you have my money, you are telling me I was the sucker for bringing her back?  Well, kudos to you.  I am hoping this review keeps other people from being suckered by your glossy advertisements and the "If you really care about your pets you will flush $1000 down our toilets" sales pitches.

Best advice:  STAY AWAY unless you are super rich and are looking for ways to blow some money unnecessarily.  There are too many other vets out there that care about animals AND humans.

P.S.  Please don't give me the Public Relations approved "spin" response we see below ("we strive to provide our clients and their pets with high quality medicine and exceptional client experiences on every visit").  Put your money where your mouth is and then talk to me (that means refund the last 2 visits minus the meds!).

name: Misty haskett
text: Dr Randle and her staff out the best I have ever been to!!

name: Christen Henson
text: This is the best veterinary care around ! Dr Randle is very gentle and sweet with my puppy! Very professional and clean facility!

name: patty rovnyak
text: I took my dog to the vet this afternoon. He had been to the vet two weeks because he had a couple seizures and they thought he had epilepsy and put him on medication. Last night I noticed his belly was turning black in some places. So I took him back in. We saw a different vet. She took a look at the black spot and said she didn’t know what it was, went to see if it could be a side effect from medication. She came back and said no but she said she still didn’t know what was causing the blackness but wasn’t concerned and then spent 20 minutes trying to convince us to buy their wellness plan. So I ended up spending $40 for a sales pitch. Vet could careless about what was wrong with my dog.

resp.text:
Hello Patty, We want you to know that we hear your frustration and dissatisfaction with your experience and would like to learn more about what happened. At your convenience, could you please reach out to our Client Advocate Team with your name, client ID and phone number associated with your account? The team can be reached at 877-500-2288 or by emailing cat@banfield.com. Thanks for bringing this to our attention.
Take care- The Banfield Team

name: Paulina Rodriguez
text:
(Translated by Google) Very good but expensive.

Muy bueno pero caro.

name: Renarda Bailey
text: They help good with my 🐕

name: Nana C
text: Driving home from the Al. coast to Birminghan Christmas Eve, my daughter found a Chihuahua that appeared to have been hit by a car or thrown out in the middle of no where, southern, Al. The poor thing couldn't stand.  She attempted to find his owner, a vet, a shelter, someone to help.  No success.  Montgomery was the closest place that had an emergency clinic.   2 1/2 - 3 hrs later, we arrived at Carriage Hill.  It was 3:00 pm Christmas Eve.  They treated this hurt dog as if it were a longtime family pet.  Thank you for being there.  Thank you for caring.

name: Chelesa Ferguson
text: My precious dog was dieing of parvo😔(how do I know) Google. I rushed her to this vet to be saved they WOULDN'T now they COULD HAVE but money is the root to all EVIL that they DIDN'T😥😥P.S she died the following day

name: Jennie Couch
text: Dr. Patton is the best! Everyone is professional as well as caring. I have been a client of theirs for over 10 years and have never had any reason to complain.

text: Dr. Patton is the best vet in Huntsville, hands down. His staff is so friendly, gracious, and loving to your pet, and Dr. Patton explains things in a clear way that makes me feel confident we are doing the best thing for my fur baby.

name: K H
text: Love these folks! They are so good with our dog. Very gentle and kind. Best bet in town

text: Dr Patterson is truly an amazing man and Vet.  I have been taking my dogs to him for years and would not trust anyone else.

name: Kristee Rutland
text: They are amazing!!! The Doctor answered my questions and kept me informed. The staff were very very friendly and sweet! :)  i would give them higher stars if possible!!!

name: Bobbie King
text: Love this vet! They care so much for my animals like their own pets. I won't take my kitties anywhere else.

name: Tammy Lynn
text: I ended up here when my sweet boy was diagnosed with cancer. They have taken such great care of my boy. They have such compassion and love for both you and your pet. I will never have my dogs treated anywhere else.

name: Bailey St. John
text: My family took our pets to Northway since I was a little girl. Now that my husband and I have come back to Huntsville, we only take our two dogs to Northway. We love them amd are very satisfied with the level of care they receive.

text: We've taken our pup here for a couple of years now, and we love them.  Always professional and always takes the time to answer our questions fully and address our concerns.  Highly recommend

text: Dr. Patton and staff are very caring and understanding. The staff appear to be knowledgeable and are sympathetic, doing their best to ease both pet AND owner anxieties. I wouldnt take my dog anywhere else.

I left another Huntsville vet because the waiting room was always crowded (overbooked appointments), the wait was long and my dog was just another to be dealt with.  Dr. Patton sees me quickly, knows my dog and her history and does outstanding work.
